Epics, Born on a Blank Slate

A meteor streaks across the night sky, sending ripples through the river of life, gleaming in thirteen hues.
Daughter of Aedes Elysiae, Chrysos Heir who nourishes "Ego," sow the Seed of Memory, so that flowers of the past may bloom in tomorrow.
''"Now, let's write a different kind of poem together ♪"''
Cyrene: Ripples of Time

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.

Wishes are but a part of the Deliverer's obsession. During our journey deep into the ruin, we reunited with other companions such as Cerydra, Hysilens, Trianne, and Trinnon. Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.

Accompanied by the Chrysos Heirs, we finally reached the deepest part of the ruins, where Phainon's heroic soul guards the cataclysmic fire of the Destruction. As the blank wish is transformed through fire into the will to bear the world, we shall finally bring release to Khaslana and inherit his responsibility and final wish: to defeat Irontomb, help Amphoreus, and save even the entire cosmos.
Use at full Energy. Yunli regenerates Energy after an on-field ally / other off-field ally targets / an enemy target launches an attack.

Accompanied by the Chrysos Heirs, we finally reached the deepest part of the ruins, where Phainon's heroic soul guards the cataclysmic fire of the Destruction. As the blank wish is transformed through fire into the will to bear the world, we shall finally bring release to Khaslana and inherit his responsibility and final wish: to defeat Irontomb, help Amphoreus, and save even the entire cosmos.
The Battle of Irontomb ended in Destruction's defeat. I woke up in the familiar car, but the Express felt different today, as if some rare visitors had arrived...

If the world's causality were a stream flowing downstream, then the girl would be a flower, blown against the current by the winds of time. Following her backward gaze, she tiptoes across the water, casting ripples, completing the cycle of cause and effect, and leave a lingering fragrance. Engraving every precious moment here, she gradually draws closer... to that very beginning.

At the moment when the Scepter united its body and soul, Cyrene managed to temporarily preserve the memories of the victims thanks to Fuli's glimpse. In this eternal instant, I must keep running until I find Cyrene.

According to Castorice and Cipher, the Chrysos Heirs appeared on the Astral Express after the great battle. Perhaps this is the last chance to say goodbye before the epic tale comes to an end. Take some time to chat with your companions, for this might be their only opportunity to ever board the Astral Express.

A shooting star flashes by, like the most brilliant pen, carving staccatos into the endless loop of night.
The story ends beneath the dome. The future lies in the bright, distant stars.
First stop for spreading the seeds of civilization: Jarilo-VI!

Second stop, the Xianzhou Luofu!
General Jing Yuan doesn't seem to be around, so let's go find "General" Fu Xuan.

This is truly the end of the road. Will the universe remember our story?
See you tomorrow, Amphoreus.

The Battle of Irontomb has temporarily settled, and the civilizations of the cosmos have finally wrested their future from the hands of the Destruction. As a key player at the heart of these events, the Astral Express's work isn't over yet, with various forces in the alliance reaching out to Navigator Himeko one after another. While most exchanges are merely courteous formalities, undercurrents of strategic maneuvering and careful deliberation flow beneath the surface...
All the IPC executives have gathered. Looks like this project is a big deal to them.

After two tests, you've become familiar with the basic mechanics of Currency Wars. You can explore more details in subsequent in-depth tests.
Leaving? You're not staying with me anymore?
I have no questions right now.
Hmm? That sounds like something Madam Herta would do. As for my assignment... at most, it's just playing with Peppy for a bit.
Let me cut to the chase. Here's the deal. Miss Ruan Mei designed a new set of training programs for the little ones, but she's been too busy lately, so she handed over the lead role to us.
It's quite amusing to watch those little ones stumbling their way to the finish line.
"Obstacles," "closed system," "interference and observation"... I remember these keywords were written in the initial proposal, but Miss Ruan Mei didn't reveal much more to us than that.
"I beg you, give me more pastries!"
Zztzzt. Look who's here... we meet again. Don't tell me you've already run out of pastries, again? Zztzzt.
Cut the snark and hand over those pastries.
My patience has its limits!
No worries. I've got plenty of patience. Just come find me whenever you're ready to cooperate, meow.
I'll come hang out with you later.

Tribbie may be small, but they have lots of energy! I didn't want to disappoint them, so I practiced for a super long time and finally memorized Oronyx's prayer! You don't believe me? Hmph. I'll recite it for you then...
Miss Castorice makes soft and fragrant plushies, writes exhilarating stories, and even smells super nice every time she walks by... I learn so much every time I hang out with her.
All that we experienced will become a thread in our lives. Thank you for embroidering the most beautiful patterns for Amphoreus's destiny.
When that one thread of "love" was woven into Amphoreus's destiny, her every gaze was already infused into the countless years, molding our lives into shape through our beating hearts.
Little Gray, do you still remember the help Tribios received? It turns out that it was Miss March helping '''us'''! Your Trailblazing companions really live up to their reputation!
I'm NOT a green dolphin... If you can't get it, just think of me as a dromas.
First Nouspore, welcome.
I can tell that while Lord Dan Heng usually avoids expressing himself through words, he genuinely treasures every life he encounters... no matter how insignificant they may be.
May I... hug you? Thank you... you're so gentle.
Just like how we are in the Flame-Chasing team, Sevie must be the person who cheers everyone up in the Trailblazing group. Look, (Trailblazer) is now a lot more relaxed with Miss March here!
Leave the rear to me, Lady Cerydra. Just focus on deploying your troops.
Cyrie, how about a soothing glass of goat-milk floral tea~?

I, too, once wandered in the icy-cold River of Souls. Her sea of flowers, though, is as beautiful and warm as a fire... It is thanks to her that the soldiers who were sacrificed could find rest, and our golden blood did not flow in vain.
The gazes of countless lifeforms may be even greater than the expectations placed upon the crown. I look forward to seeing how far his trailblazing expedition will take him.
Pierce the darkness with dawn, Dux Solaris.
Show me your way of protection, Dux Draconum.
March towards the cosmos with the Law of "love"!
This story... is as we've written!

The heroic epic has already been written. In this world that even Akivili did not reach, we were able to walk as the Nameless with the people of Amphoreus, bearing witness to the indelible marks that each person made in this book.
Shall we split the spoils thirty-seventy? As to who gets the seventy, I'm open to negotiations.
Lead us in a charge once more, O Imperator!
Help me, omnipotent Lady Tribbie!

Wishes are but a part of the Deliverer's obsession. During our journey deep into the ruin, we reunited with other companions such as Cerydra, Hysilens, Trianne, and Trinnon. Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.
Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.

I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.

In this eternal dwelling, Cyrene guards the memories of all cosmic beings, yet has almost lost herself in the process. I must join her in remembering those erased by the Irontomb, embark on the Path of Remembrance, and write a different ending to the story.
If you feel fatigued, feel free to take a respite here. All your precious memories will wrap around you like warm fleece as you drift into dreamland.

At the moment when the Scepter united its body and soul, Cyrene managed to temporarily preserve the memories of the victims thanks to Fuli's glimpse. In this eternal instant, I must keep running until I find Cyrene.
Irontomb has been defeated, but the story of Amphoreus, The Eternal Land, is not yet over. Or rather, how it should end depends on Cyrene's choice...

Oh? Have you finally decided to put your conductor up as collateral?
Only this time, you're the one providing the funds. And as collateral, I'm willing to offer you generous returns, in the name of the IPC's Strategic Investment Department.
Hey Aventurine, what were you thinking last time? Did you even run the numbers?
We're just temporarily leasing the Oak Family's assets as our interim office. The facilities here are well-equipped, the location is convenient, and it's perfect for our needs.
Haha, what's the point of going there? It's full of workaholics like Topaz, with no sense of fun in life, and you can't even find a decent bottle of hair conditioner!
Don't worry, we'll start with the lowest difficulty level. Not only will we guide you through the system step by step, we'll also provide special assistance along the way.
So choosing the right people and building the perfect team is the cornerstone of success.
I reserve judgment.
Now that you can work independently, Topaz and I can leave without any worries.
Our data is stored in Currency Wars. You can borrow our abilities whenever you need them. See you next time~
How's the testing going? Feel free to take a break if you're getting tired.
Oh, don't get me wrong. Cases where business wars evolve into hot wars are rare. I take very good care of my "assets," after all.
Long time no see, (Trailblazer). Welcome back to the Herta Space Station!
Problems that can be resolved with credits are never problems.
Meow. I told you it's not "training," it's a "race" we're all holding together. A spontaneous competition!
Thank you to everyone who chose me as the host of this racing event, I am humbled by your support. Welcome, honored guests, to the spectacle, meow!
They say the best way to fix a TV is to give it a few good whacks. I bet the same trick would work on robots, too, right?
Want it? But I can't give it to you yet.
I'll come hang out with you later.
Let me see it first!
Know thyself, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories. The intel of all creations is at my fingertips, meow.
You have one historical message. Receiving...
As Tomorrow Became Yesterday

An auspicious spiritual beast wrought into being by the Ambrosial Arbor and protects its roots. Its arrival brings along exuberant vegetation and promises good fortune.
Once destroyed during ancient wars, the Ambrosial Arbor is mended by the Stellaron and finally revives. Rare creatures and legendary beasts made by celestials of the past all return to this world, like an old dream coming alive again.

An artist playing the role of the prisoner in the Sweet Dreams Troupe. It should be performing in the Charmony Festival, but it is now bound by Order and keeps performing scenes of the "Past." The past is an immortal chain, its tranquil flame igniting within a cage, beckoning the jailer's authority with mere candlelight.

A visitor from beyond the sky shoulders the world's destiny, writing a new beginning for Amphoreus through "Trailblaze." Beyond the Aedes Elysiae lies a new era that everyone wishes for.
Now that you have arrived at the Dawn, (Trailblazer), are you ready to answer the world's summon?
The Xianzhou Alliance Oath: "To save future generations from war and bloody dispute." We volunteer for this battle to eliminate our foes, uphold our allies, and protect all life in the cosmos.

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.
After breaking through the barrier, Screwllum detects an intriguing signal: Exomyth. It's time to meet the old Intellitron in reality and find clues about the Demiurge from his head.

Let me tell you the story of "Membrance Maze": A group of cute little friends live in Aedes Elysiae's forests. Their names can be connected into a song...
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven ♪
Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti ♪
Tiny seeds of life sprout within pristine memories. In the most tender corners of the heart, that genuine shiver stirred by lament... That's the "mover of life."

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.

If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.

In this eternal dwelling, Cyrene guards the memories of all cosmic beings, yet has almost lost herself in the process. I must join her in remembering those erased by the Irontomb, embark on the Path of Remembrance, and write a different ending to the story.
The Battle of Irontomb ended in Destruction's defeat. I woke up in the familiar car, but the Express felt different today, as if some rare visitors had arrived...

If the world's causality were a stream flowing downstream, then the girl would be a flower, blown against the current by the winds of time. Following her backward gaze, she tiptoes across the water, casting ripples, completing the cycle of cause and effect, and leave a lingering fragrance. Engraving every precious moment here, she gradually draws closer... to that very beginning.

Where the west wind blows, unending waves of wheat fields and the fragrance of rush grass stretch far and wide. This is the girl's homeland, where the journey began. If you feel fatigued, feel free to take a respite here. All your precious memories will wrap around you like warm fleece as you drift into dreamland.

At the moment when the Scepter united its body and soul, Cyrene managed to temporarily preserve the memories of the victims thanks to Fuli's glimpse. In this eternal instant, I must keep running until I find Cyrene.

Return to the battlefield from An Eternal Page. Let remembrances and love be our bow and arrow to quell the headless giant's karmic flames and prove a different path for the Cosmos's future. The answer to the universe will never be the Destruction. Hope's beginning shall shine forth behind the heavy curtain of the final act.

Since you're already here, how about lending me some money?
To be honest, I still don't really trust you.
Come on, didn't we end up making a profit anyway? As long as it's a net profit, it's all good~
Well, well, if it isn't my old friend~
You're having a team-building session at Dewlight Pavilion?

Who are you trying to pick on? My hair is perfectly fine! Ahem... Pier Point's too crowded with prying eyes, not the place for big moves. We're better off sticking to our own turf where we can breathe easy.
Now that everyone's here, let's cut to the chase and talk about our collaboration.
The Currency Wars system can simulate various scenarios, helping us prepare for different situations in advance. In essence, it's a massive "Bad Debt Settlement Simulator."
Well, since I'm already here...

Seriously, have you considered joining the Strategic Investment Department directly? With your talent, you could reach senior management in no time.

But the most dazzling has never been a single gem. Only those who can set many gems into a unique piece of jewelry deserve to stand at the center of the showcase, gazing down at those who have faded into obscurity.
I didn't quite get that. Need to let it sink in.
People are the most valuable assets. That has definitely been Madam Jade's consistent philosophy on wealth.

Don't let your guard down. The real challenge is yet to come, and you're about to witness the brutality of the capital market firsthand. Your competitors will stop at nothing to strip you of every asset you own.
Support the legal rights of creations!
Haha, let me give you an overview first. This training... how should I put it? It's basically like an {{Color|keyword|orienteering race for creations|nobold=1}}.
You can cheer for a promising little one, and if it wins the competition, you'll receive incredibly generous rewards!
Cheer for me, meow! Thanks for cheering for me, meow!
We're all set, let's head out now, meow!
Is this really a proper training program?
Doesn't quite look like it, right? To be honest, I was pretty confused too when I first got this mission.
Well then, have fun!
I beg you, give me more pastries!
I beg you, give me more pastries!
Zztzzt. I'm sorry. I apologize. You're right. The pastries... they are all yours now. Zztzzt...
If you feed pastries to the chest Miss Ruan Mei left, out comes all sorts of weird stuff!
The next match is about to begin. Care to join in the cheering?
In return, I'll give you these shiny things. You'll love them, meow!
I'll come hang out with you later.
Wanna hear about it? No charge.

Attack abilities of "Anti-Creator," "Mythos," or "Logos" increases "Amphorean Hatred." When "Hatred" increases, "Irontomb" uses "The Fall of Erudition," reducing the targets' Maximum Restorable HP and Maximum Recoverable Skill Points. This effect is weakened when "Hatred" decreases. You want a photo together? Of course I won't say no ♭
I'll help take some of the pressure off.
Countless stars, please shine for the heroes.
Etch this moment into eternity~

Memories' ripples are waiting to be kissed awake by a shooting star.
Remember me with "love" in that beautiful tomorrow.
May the "Ocean" strum a feast.
May "Life and Death" sprout new buds.

Flowers leave seeds behind, and these seeds bloom into new flowers. Every ripple of memory sparkles with the same shade. So, which "me" do you prefer? Heheh... You don't need to say it. That's just how "love" is, unfathomable, yet always the same ♪
I feel so warm when I stay next to you, Hyacine~
Let's take a group photo, March! Three, two, one... cheese ♪
It is also my wish to be forever close to the Trailblaze ♪
To be able to hear a vague prophecy in my dreams and move forward under its guidance... I think that's pretty magical, too.

I was, um, actually born with a fear of teachers... but he's the exception! Whenever I don't get a concept, he uses dromases as an analogy, and then I instantly get it!
I won't forget how Cyrene protected all the memories and kept watch over the future... because that's how we make all the sacrifices worthwhile!
A passionate and refreshing "memory"... I'm honored to travel alongside such beauty.
Well met, soldier of the Ocean.
Now, is the time for Amphoreus's victory.
The millions of memories she wrote should be enough to teach that false god this at the very least: It is not their right to answer the question of "What are we?"
We meet again, Sevie. There's so much I wanna talk to you about!

The purple little butterflyfish... I like the poems she writes. I even composed melodies of the deep ocean to accompany them. Let us sing those beautiful songs together in the future, when we feast in reunion.
I smell the scent of blood... The waves are already here, little sea lion.
If you need my song, then please do not hesitate to ask.
This time, we will walk forward together, hand in hand.
I shall remember. I shall press on. Let's walk towards the stars together, Cyrene.

The campaign against Irontomb decides the fate of the cosmos, and each faction weighs its own interests. After the alliance meeting, perhaps it is time to deepen ties with allies, to gather strength from all sides.

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.

Old Intellitron left notes about the "tombstone" as his final message. All signs indicate that Demiurge does indeed exist. It's time to confront old Intellitron, for his apprehension is the undeniable proof.

If Demiurge is powerless to alter the experiment's results... if Droidhead's calculations point to THEIR own Destruction... No, there are no "ifs."
The conditions for linking with Erudition are complete. It's not an audience, but a coronation. I will decipher the universe's future and anchor Herta's "Instant."
If one could know the Truth at dawn, one can die at dusk without regret.
Screwllum's treasure looks promising. Let's hope it works just as well on the Matrix.

Exploration hit a snag. A barrier of quatorzain algebraic expressions has isolated this space. Screwllum suggests hacking into the independent signal terminal and using reverse computation to break through the barrier, unlocking the seal on the Scepter's kernel.
After breaking through the barrier, Screwllum detects an intriguing signal: Exomyth. It's time to meet the old Intellitron in reality and find clues about the Demiurge from his head.

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.
Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.

Wishes are but a part of the Deliverer's obsession. During our journey deep into the ruin, we reunited with other companions such as Cerydra, Hysilens, Trianne, and Trinnon. Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.
I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.

In this eternal dwelling, Cyrene guards the memories of all cosmic beings, yet has almost lost herself in the process. I must join her in remembering those erased by the Irontomb, embark on the Path of Remembrance, and write a different ending to the story.
If you feel fatigued, feel free to take a respite here. All your precious memories will wrap around you like warm fleece as you drift into dreamland.

According to Castorice and Cipher, the Chrysos Heirs appeared on the Astral Express after the great battle. Perhaps this is the last chance to say goodbye before the epic tale comes to an end. Take some time to chat with your companions, for this might be their only opportunity to ever board the Astral Express.

The Rating Pistol gazes at Cyrene: "0.336 points... 0.337 points... 0.999 points... 1 point—"
Not to worry, you don't have to trust the IPC, but you can always trust money. Credits never lie.
Don't worry, trust is built through cooperation.
Besides, that friend who lived here won't be back anytime soon. Why not seize this chance to get a taste of his lifestyle?
I thought we were going to Pier Point.
That's also a correct answer. Self-confidence is an essential quality for any excellent investor.
Indeed. Wealth, schemes, and luck are merely tools in the end. If you want to achieve victory, the most crucial factor will always be the "power of people."
Topaz and Aventurine left...
There are always some free trade stragglers who develop business systems independent of the IPC. While these markets are small in scale, they're not exactly easy to deal with.

Take the Lanlusian Segmentum I handled before as an example. They had long relied on IPC investment, but severed trade ties after an Antimatter Legion invasion. When the IPC drove back the Legion, they refused our demand to reclaim assets.
Correct! These little lifeforms that Miss Ruan Mei left at the space station have quite a history with you, after all.
Maybe geniuses' ideas are just that hard to grasp. But hey, as long as it's fun, that's what matters!
I knew you'd get along well with the little ones. Don't worry about the costs, I'll handle that. Just go ahead and give it a try.
Zztzzt. Here you go, take them. What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger. Zztzzt.
Zztzzt. Why are you here again? I don't even know what to say anymore. Do you want to beg right away, or go through the standard procedure? Zztzzt.
Want it? If you do, trade me some of those pastries everyone loves.

Originally a Mr. Domescreen loaded with the general syllabus. The educational materials became banaducational materials due to the influence of the memetic virus. It shifts between banarocky seriousness and sunny banapassion. An indispensable banamployee and a monkey who's a worthy banafriend.

The Titan of Strife continues the mad war in their frenzy, becoming the unconquerable fear of the masses of Amphoreus.
They once were famed through glory, earning respect from gods and the people of the land. And yet, the city-states that revered them were sundered, and the poems that praised their name were destroyed. Only their evil reputation lingers in this lightless era and end times, tainting the Throne of Worlds's brilliance.

Netherwing, slumbering dormant in the River of Souls, has been reawakened by an alchemical summoning and morphed into a thing of rot and decay.
It once was the Death Titan, swimming upstream in the River of Souls' currents, leaving the realm of non-existence and stranded in the mortal world. Once, they followed the tides of the River of Souls to drown the living lands, branding all things in Amphoreus with a fated end. All the existences that will die or have died will feel a shudder in the depths of their souls with the dragon's return.

Aren't the little fairies in the Membrance Maze cute? That's because it's the first story "Cyrene" wrote. Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti... The seven notes can compose countless songs, just like how time, unchanging, can create the varied stories of the past ♪
Thanks! All energized!
Turn over this eternal page.
Every memory turns into ripples.
Where might those lovely Stellar Jades be hiding?
Drinking scented tea under a warm breeze, and petting soft and fluffy Little Ica with Hyacine... Hehe. Anyone would want to lose themselves in that fantasy, no?
It's hard to forget Hysilens' songs after you've heard them. Thanks to her, every second of every day in this world is a magnificent gala. So let's dance together, shall we?

From the innocent "Mem" to the lively "Cyrene" and finally to the elegant, beautiful, and blissful "Demiurge"... you helped complete my story. No matter how the ripples stir, they are all odes we ourselves wrote down together ♪

A nymph rests upon golden threads, poised for flight yet seemingly ensnared by the gilded strands.

''"In the blackest night, there are always lamps waiting to be lit, always wanderers longing to find their way back."''
Mem

''The words of wisdom left here by the Lord Ravager known as "Phantylia":''
Hehe, I know you can see me. Go on, guess. What do you think I'm hoping to witness here?

A genius's mind, destroyed by its own creator?

A hollow Scepter, catching the glance from a new god?

A newborn Overlord, bestowing the glorious flames of ruin upon the cosmos?

Oh, the drama!

But no, that's not quite it. Or rather, that's not all I care about.

Does the coronation or downfall of a fellow Lord truly matter so much?

What I'm hoping for from all this "Trailblazing" is one... grand... show.

The universe, in all its forms, is just a play. And a play needs its twists and turns to have any real flavor, don't you think?

Memory: Amphoreus
Added to Team With Castorice

I don't know how, but we became super good friends even though we haven't known each other for a long time. The last time I went to her courtyard, we talked about everything from Taikiyan to Amphoreus, and drank pots and pots of floral tea, and ate one honeycake after another. Little Ica even fell asleep... but we still didn't feel like that chat was long enough!

My heart was in my throat when I played Aero-Chess with the Imperator! But not only did she allow me to take back my moves, she even seriously considered my suggestions... Hehe, I even managed to snag a win at the end!
I am glad to see that Miss March was able to bravely face the future with a brand-new outlook, and I admire her for it. There's still much I have to learn from her.

Dan Heng is like a silent star in the night sky that's not keen to draw attention to itself. But '''we''' know very well that, should a star want to illuminate other stars, it must be capable of unimaginably explosive powers!

At the very end, '''we''' really managed to reach the end of the west wind, where flowers bloom in spring... But it's not a vague "prophecy." It's a paradise built with all the memories Reney and everyone else experienced again and again.

I also once fought against the malevolent tides of the Sea of Souls, and I know the taste of despair and deathly silence... Perhaps that is why the deep sea's honey brew has such a bitter and intense flavor.
Uhh? The demigod of Earth...? Why do you have a tail, too?
Let's compose prettier songs together, Lady Hysilens.
Singer of the Ocean, let us walk towards triumph together.

I'm guessing that Cyrene must also really like sparkly things... because she's always gazing up at the stars in the sky. Don't you think so too, Little Ica? Yep! She must also like you, with how soft you are~
Let the triumphant roar of victory serve as the prelude to what lies ahead.

Though our statures differ greatly, we made the same choice as rulers... If we could face each other in a game of chess, I would surely regain that delightful feeling of finding an evenly-matched opponent.

I've said it at least a thousand times: Just because someone's short doesn't mean they're weak-willed and can be easily manipulated by fate. For those who still dare to refute that statement, Dux Lucens is even more proof.
Let history remember this glorious campaign, King of Kremnos.
Let's give them a final embrace, Dux Florum.
Glory surely lies ahead, Mydeimos.
Lead us in a charge once more, O Imperator!

Ode to Sky

A visitor from beyond the sky shoulders the world's destiny, writing a new beginning for Amphoreus through "Trailblaze." Beyond the Aedes Elysiae lies a new era that everyone wishes for.
Now that you have arrived at the Dawn, (Trailblazer), are you ready to answer the world's summon?
According to Herta's battle plan, the Express Crew will infiltrate deep into Amphoreus and coordinate with the Cosmic Alliance in a pincer attack to defeat Irontomb together.
After breaking through the barrier, Screwllum detects an intriguing signal: Exomyth. It's time to meet the old Intellitron in reality and find clues about the Demiurge from his head.

Old Intellitron left notes about the "tombstone" as his final message. All signs indicate that Demiurge does indeed exist. It's time to confront old Intellitron, for his apprehension is the undeniable proof.

Old Intellitron left notes about the "tombstone" as his final message. All signs indicate that Demiurge does indeed exist. It's time to confront old Intellitron, for his apprehension is the undeniable proof.

If Demiurge is powerless to alter the experiment's results... if Droidhead's calculations point to THEIR own Destruction... No, there are no "ifs."
The conditions for linking with Erudition are complete. It's not an audience, but a coronation. I will decipher the universe's future and anchor Herta's "Instant."
If one could know the Truth at dawn, one can die at dusk without regret.

Old Intellitron left notes about the "tombstone" as his final message. All signs indicate that Demiurge does indeed exist. It's time to confront old Intellitron, for his apprehension is the undeniable proof.

Let me tell you the story of "Membrance Maze": A group of cute little friends live in Aedes Elysiae's forests. Their names can be connected into a song...
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven ♪
Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti ♪
Tiny seeds of life sprout within pristine memories. In the most tender corners of the heart, that genuine shiver stirred by lament... That's the "mover of life."

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.

Dominus Pacis

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.
Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.

Accompanied by the Chrysos Heirs, we finally reached the deepest part of the ruins, where Phainon's heroic soul guards the cataclysmic fire of the Destruction. As the blank wish is transformed through fire into the will to bear the world, we shall finally bring release to Khaslana and inherit his responsibility and final wish: to defeat Irontomb, help Amphoreus, and save even the entire cosmos.

Accompanied by the Chrysos Heirs, we finally reached the deepest part of the ruins, where Phainon's heroic soul guards the cataclysmic fire of the Destruction. As the blank wish is transformed through fire into the will to bear the world, we shall finally bring release to Khaslana and inherit his responsibility and final wish: to defeat Irontomb, help Amphoreus, and save even the entire cosmos.

In this eternal dwelling, Cyrene guards the memories of all cosmic beings, yet has almost lost herself in the process. I must join her in remembering those erased by the Irontomb, embark on the Path of Remembrance, and write a different ending to the story.

If the world's causality were a stream flowing downstream, then the girl would be a flower, blown against the current by the winds of time. Following her backward gaze, she tiptoes across the water, casting ripples, completing the cycle of cause and effect, and leave a lingering fragrance. Engraving every precious moment here, she gradually draws closer... to that very beginning.

Where the west wind blows, unending waves of wheat fields and the fragrance of rush grass stretch far and wide. This is the girl's homeland, where the journey began. If you feel fatigued, feel free to take a respite here. All your precious memories will wrap around you like warm fleece as you drift into dreamland.

The eyeball flickers between sparkling and sorrowful, as if reading through pages of incredible stories. Until, at one moment, it snaps back to reality: "Rating invalid!" The eye stops responding, gazing firmly into the distance, as if it had glimpsed the next page of the story.
Nothing good ever comes from getting mixed up with the IPC.
We're here. This place should be familiar to you, right?
Although it was just a warm-up, your results were truly excellent for a first-time participant.
A great team.
As much as I'd love to continue running simulations with you, we've got way too much work on our hands. We apologize.
Don't underestimate IPC's intelligence gathering capabilities. Although the IPC hasn't yet penetrated some stubborn markets, we've never slacked off on our market insights in those regions.
As we speak, countless investigators are lurking in trading markets across different planets, gathering local critical business data for the Currency Wars.
And if I pick the wrong one... is there a penalty?
Of course not! This is just a game, and you're here to help out. How could I let you pay for anything?
See? I told you it would be fun. Here, take these pastries. You'll need them for the cheering later.
Time to make a dash for snacks!
I'll come hang out with you later.
Alrighty. The event will be running for quite a while, so just drop by whenever it's convenient for you!

Shout this: "I beg you, give me more pastries!" Zztzzt. I'll be at your service.
To quote a popular saying on the space station: "You're such a pro gamer~"
Zztzzt. No, that's not right. If you want it, come and take it. But of course, by our agreed terms...

A nameless swordmaster who came with the black tide and is hunting down the Titans' Coreflame. None knows their true identity.
Their power is incredible, and their swordplay is nigh impeccable. Within their swords, madness and obsession entwine, once leading to the fall of the Grove of Epiphany and Aedes Elysiae.

Lord Ravager "Irontomb" of the Antimatter Legion, born from thirty million Amphorean extrapolations, brings ignorance to wisdom, immortality to eternity, and makes the universe fall only to rise anew.
It is the ancient serpent, it is the messiah, it is the alpha, it is the omega, it is the executor of the old universe, it is the midwife of the new universe, it is a grand funeral—the funeral of the Erudition.

Daughters of the sea, their spirits and flesh corroded by the sins of Destruction, leaving only empty, distorted shells... In this life, they follow the Ocean's honed blade, not to be obliterated into nihility, but to become the tidal waves crashing against the Dark Sun.
The apocalyptic storm descends from the heavens, heralding the extinction of all things.
O premature Mirage Fizzle, doomed to perish before birth, exhaling countless sorrows.
The murky amniotic fluid flows, staining heaven and earth black, tainting even newborn hope.

Added to Team With Cyrene

It's super fun to listen to Miss Cipher! She's told me at least eighty versions of the story of the Meow-Meow faith and the Woof-Woof faith. That's almost more than the number of backstories I've made up for myself!
He suffered through so much agony but still managed to stay true to his wish... I need to be able to do that, too!
Pure Sugar Child
Troublemaker

Amphoreus's "Time" has already received too many scars. Thankfully, that lively Nameless is now here. Like a dash of vibrant colors, she has swept away all the dusty gloom that the memories had built up.
Reney! Together, we're gonna fly toward tomorrow and even further beyond~
With the will of a Nameless, she'll definitely be able to confront and overcome the shadows of her past.
She recommended using honey brew to generate inspiration. Though intoxication can undoubtedly stimulate fantasies, fizzy horseradish vinegar still fits me better in terms of calmness and rationality.

Being able to read all of the Grove's books and interpret the mountains of information regarding Amphoreus in such a short time... He's more of an outstanding scholar than many people I know. And when it comes to knowledge about the dromas? He is indeed second to none.
Thinking while fighting, and fighting while thinking... I'm sure you do the same.

That beautiful knight... I've actually written a lot of poems about her based on what Tribbie told me. I always imagined her to be as pure as the ocean waves and as elegant as the tides... And it all turned out to be true once I met her.

I still remember how the flower belonging to the Imperator was always different from everyone else's in the nether realm. Though small and frail, that blue blossom was always able to burst through the soil and bloom into a peerless flower, rivaled by none.
If possible, I, too, would like to make a brilliant crystal flower for her as a gift... Never wilting, forever flawless, just like the "memories" she once gifted this world.
War is merciless. May all souls rest in peace in the sea of flowers.
What a marvel that this pink little jellyfish was able to tame the countercurrents of Time... Her light is so lively and warm that even I can't help but follow where she goes.
Let's write an ending like never before!

The heroic epic has already been written. In this world that even Akivili did not reach, we were able to walk as the Nameless with the people of Amphoreus, bearing witness to the indelible marks that each person made in this book.
Thank you for the colors you've scattered across the world, Hyacine.

A visitor from beyond the sky shoulders the world's destiny, writing a new beginning for Amphoreus through "Trailblaze." Beyond the Aedes Elysiae lies a new era that everyone wishes for.
Now that you have arrived at the Dawn, (Trailblazer), are you ready to answer the world's summon?

The isolation of Amphoreus has been shattered, and the three Nameless forerunners have become Titans of the new world. The holy city's residents pray to the Worldbearing (Trailblazer), devoutly awaiting the divine prophecy to descend upon the world.

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.

Exploration hit a snag. A barrier of quatorzain algebraic expressions has isolated this space. Screwllum suggests hacking into the independent signal terminal and using reverse computation to break through the barrier, unlocking the seal on the Scepter's kernel.

Let me tell you the story of "Membrance Maze": A group of cute little friends live in Aedes Elysiae's forests. Their names can be connected into a song...
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven ♪
Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti ♪
Tiny seeds of life sprout within pristine memories. In the most tender corners of the heart, that genuine shiver stirred by lament... That's the "mover of life."

Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.

Wishes are but a part of the Deliverer's obsession. During our journey deep into the ruin, we reunited with other companions such as Cerydra, Hysilens, Trianne, and Trinnon. Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.
I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.
Get an extra Prismatic Crystal Ore that is packed with valuable treasures at the next Reward Node.

The Battle of Irontomb has temporarily settled, and the civilizations of the cosmos have finally wrested their future from the hands of the Destruction. As a key player at the heart of these events, the Astral Express's work isn't over yet, with various forces in the alliance reaching out to Navigator Himeko one after another. You can't get away~
I'm gonna cry~
May "Trickery" remain a game.
May "Time" watch over the evernight.
Cleanse hatred with love.
I'm sorry...
I'll... wait for you...
Hi, did you miss me?
Aren't I smart? Come on. Gimme a compliment.

As fellow pink-haired girls, not only is our hair color the same, but we also like the same things! I really want to have a nice, long chat with March. We'd definitely create lots of brilliant memories together ♪

Beautiful flowers always have thorns, and as for feeling protective... I sometimes get consumed by that, too. But I know that she's a softie deep down. After all, she and March are flowers that bloomed from the same seed.

Having a bespoke outfit made by Aglaea is the dream of everyone who wants to be beautiful, and that includes me! Attending a romantic banquet while dressed to the nines... Before I knew it, that dream had come true.
I'm a big fan of Castorice's writings, too! Ahh... Did I say that too loud? You see... Apart from containing wonderful fantasies, her stories also really move me emotionally!
Hey, this way! I can do a "magic trick" too! Look closely, and don't blink... Ta-da! Here's a flower for you ♪
Let's leave our footprints behind, one step at a time.
Dancing in the Ocean's song really makes my heart swell.

March has a sort of miraculous power. Wherever she goes, all things dark and gloomy will be covered by her bright, lively, and unique color. I believe that her "past" will also eventually become a part of her, walking with her towards her future.
Your outfit today remains as refreshing as ever, Miss March.

To become a better god in the new world... You did it. And not only that, you also pushed everyone to become heroes together. That has far surpassed the definition of a god.

A person may have many names over their lifetime. Whether hers is "Evernight" or "March 7th," I hope her colors never fade with the passage of time.

Where will your commands be directed, Imperator?

Ode to Time
According to Herta's battle plan, the Express Crew will infiltrate deep into Amphoreus and coordinate with the Cosmic Alliance in a pincer attack to defeat Irontomb together.

The isolation of Amphoreus has been shattered, and the three Nameless forerunners have become Titans of the new world. The holy city's residents pray to the Worldbearing (Trailblazer), devoutly awaiting the divine prophecy to descend upon the world.

The ruins harbor the obsessions and bitter fruits of 30 million cycles. As we venture deeper, Mydei, Cipher, Castorice, and Hyacine join the team one after another. Anaxa has been waiting by the crystal that holds the wish to save the world. We need to initiate the ceremony, attempt to take away Phainon's wish, and silence the heavy reverberation in his heart.

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.
I think I've seen this kind of show on TV...
Are the rewards from this race any good?
Oh, and there's one more thing you'll definitely be interested in.

I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.

Irontomb's hatred devours the cosmos. Its coronation is nearly complete. All existence within the galaxy has already been formatted by it. However, in the final split second before the universe's destruction, I wake up in a silent void...

Return to the battlefield from An Eternal Page. Let remembrances and love be our bow and arrow to quell the headless giant's karmic flames and prove a different path for the Cosmos's future. The answer to the universe will never be the Destruction. Hope's beginning shall shine forth behind the heavy curtain of the final act.

If the world's causality were a stream flowing downstream, then the girl would be a flower, blown against the current by the winds of time. Following her backward gaze, she tiptoes across the water, casting ripples, completing the cycle of cause and effect, and leave a lingering fragrance. Engraving every precious moment here, she gradually draws closer... to that very beginning.

Follow Madam Jade to learn about the project details
High-net-worth individuals like you have always been the ideal partners every investor eagerly pursues.
And as a Nameless, you've landed on several perilous planets and successfully resolved major crises there, which is why the IPC thinks you're a perfect candidate.
Of course, I'm quite interested in you personally. Your performance in Penacony left quite an impression on me.
War!? We're going to war again!?

When I say war, I mean corporate warfare across the universe. As you know, the "Cancer of All Worlds" has swept through many planets, creating a lot of bad debt for the IPC, and it's quite a headache to clean up.
See that machine powering up? That's the control console for the Currency Wars.
Oh? From what I know, our opponent is quite the business veteran.
That's right. That's an excellent answer.

The capital market is like a grand showcase in which all its participants are merely gems in the display case, waiting to be noticed. Whoever can draw the most attention will naturally seize the greatest gains.

We've got this.
I shall carry out the Earth's duty, Miss Cyrene.
Let's start the second movement.
Hmm... I want to go on a swing.

When I have trouble sleeping, I count the stars in the sky and imagine a shooting star flying across the night and diving into my dreams. Then I wake up with a smile and start a bright new day... because I know it wasn't a dream.
Take our answer~
How could the girl named "Cyrene" possibly have annoyances? Even if she did, they'd all go away the moment she saw you.
May "Passage" never have farewells.

Aren't the little fairies in the Membrance Maze cute? The one who made them must have a super pure heart. Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti... The seven notes can compose countless songs, just like how time, unchanging, can record the varied stories of the past ♪
Mm-hmm ♪
Take this~

Thirty million similar yet different stories... Doesn't it sound like a lot? But I never grew tired of it. I even relived it when I travelled with (Trailblazer), and it was still so moving! However, there were always regrets left on every single page. I wanted to add some smiles here and fill up some blanks there... It was all thanks to (Trailblazer) that we could finally compose a romantic ending for them ♪

I'm gonna let you in on a secret... I was completely mesmerized by your gaze the first time we met! Hold still. Lemme see it again. Such pretty eyes... and the tomorrow reflected in them is equally beautiful, too ♪
I really look forward to seeing how (Trailblazer)'s "story" will unfold in future journeys. I hope Amphoreus's "memories" will become a romantic note in those journeys... It definitely will, right? ♪
May the Trailblazing journey always be accompanied by rippling waves ♪
I'm pretty good at playing tricks, too, you know? For example... I can steal a person's "heart" ♪

Exploration hit a snag. A barrier of quatorzain algebraic expressions has isolated this space. Screwllum suggests hacking into the independent signal terminal and using reverse computation to break through the barrier, unlocking the seal on the Scepter's kernel.

Old Intellitron left notes about the "tombstone" as his final message. All signs indicate that Demiurge does indeed exist. It's time to confront old Intellitron, for his apprehension is the undeniable proof.

If Demiurge is powerless to alter the experiment's results... if Droidhead's calculations point to THEIR own Destruction... No, there are no "ifs."
The conditions for linking with Erudition are complete. It's not an audience, but a coronation. I will decipher the universe's future and anchor Herta's "Instant."
If one could know the Truth at dawn, one can die at dusk without regret.

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.
I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.

Return to the battlefield from An Eternal Page. Let remembrances and love be our bow and arrow to quell the headless giant's karmic flames and prove a different path for the Cosmos's future. The answer to the universe will never be the Destruction. Hope's beginning shall shine forth behind the heavy curtain of the final act.

If the world's causality were a stream flowing downstream, then the girl would be a flower, blown against the current by the winds of time. Following her backward gaze, she tiptoes across the water, casting ripples, completing the cycle of cause and effect, and leave a lingering fragrance. Engraving every precious moment here, she gradually draws closer... to that very beginning.

Irontomb's hatred devours the cosmos. Its coronation is nearly complete. All existence within the galaxy has already been formatted by it. However, in the final split second before the universe's destruction, I wake up in a silent void...

At the moment when the Scepter united its body and soul, Cyrene managed to temporarily preserve the memories of the victims thanks to Fuli's glimpse. In this eternal instant, I must keep running until I find Cyrene.

We meet again, (Trailblazer). I've been waiting for you for quite a while.
I'm here to discuss a lucrative partnership, naturally.

Hmm... while the IPC does have vast influence across the universe, we're dealing with a boundless cosmic market. There will always be hidden corners that even the invisible hand of capital cannot control.
Of course. Hasty decisions are a cardinal sin in business.
This isn't the place to talk shop. Let us adjourn to someplace else.
Long time no see, (Trailblazer).
We're developing the Project: Currency Wars here. I'm the project lead, and both Topaz and Aventurine are project members.
In the past, due to lack of experience and intelligence, every operation by the Strategic Investment Department required massive investments in resources and manpower.
Looks like you prefer to work alone.
Where did the test data come from?
However, we sometimes encounter missing data, and in such cases, we err on the side of overestimating our opponents, making the tests as challenging as possible.
Hehe, I specifically arranged to meet you in the seclusion zone... I'm sure you can guess why I called you here?
I see, you want to borrow money.
...Don't tell me you're going to use me as a lab rat!
We don't need any assistant, just cheer for us from the stands! Your support is all we need, and we'll run super fast on our own, meow!

More importantly — and I want to make it clear that this was our researchers' idea — to make things more exciting for the participants, the race will feature a special {{Color|keyword|cheering segment|nobold=1}}.
I beg you, give me more pastries!
Zztzzt. These pastries are reserved for you. Please accept them, and make sure to take good care of them. Zztzzt.
Sure thing, come whenever you like. I'll be hanging around here anyway.
Thank you to everyone who chose me as the host of this racing event, I am humbled by your support. Welcome, honored guests, to the spectacle, meow!
Time to make a dash for snacks!
I'll come hang out with you later.
Right, right? You think so too, don't you? Gotta cherish the time spent with friends, meow!

The azure sky reflects a brilliant tomorrow.
One step, two steps... the maiden's path has been so long, but fortunately those cherished stories haven't been forgotten by the cycles of time.
Now, written together by everyone, the epic has been completed, welcoming its finale. Stars, flowers, birds, and a beautiful new world.
Gauze, wreaths, long dresses, and the wind that carries blessings.
The quest of thirty million lifetimes transformed into a single moment of happiness, enough to outweigh an eternity of words. ''"Hee, it's a promise..."''
The girl turns around to give a gentle smile.
''"One of us stays in the past, and the other walks toward the future... but our hearts have never been apart ♪"'' She rises onto her toes and steps into the past.
And memory, transforming into ripples of past reverie, drifts toward tomorrow.

My daily style improved so much after Lady Aglaea gave me some pointers. As expected from everyone's guide and mentor!
The golden threads can no longer detect doubts in his heart. From now on, he will certainly walk tall and proud on the road he chose.
I'm honored to witness the will of both the Earth and the Trailblaze.
We've both made very difficult choices for our city-states and people. However, no matter how painful it is to cast out the old and bring in the new, it's the road a worthy ruler must one day take.
When it comes to the wisdom of war, you alone are the teacher of us all.
I've seen him deep in thought, writing things down, but he noticed me as soon as I got close. He's pretty vigilant... Maybe he was also a wanderer once upon a time?
Miss March, would you like to make plushies together after this is over?

After waiting in solitude for so long, we were both able to see the arrival of the hero who would break the cycle. Every second that passed during that wait will be fermented by time and turned into a blazing and potent final brew.

With the golden blood of countless beings, she etched the mark of heroes upon the ages. Though I did not walk with them, the great cause of the Flame-Chase would have long died without her sacrifices.

Lady Hysilens's violin now sounds sweet and romantic, too. We made a promise that if we got any patients with insomnia in the future, a cup of goat-milk floral tea combined with her songs would be guaranteed to work as a cure!

I've tried the red drink that that little sea lion is fond of... For a fish, the flavor of that pink juice is indeed... a bit light. As for Phagousa's honey brew, the little sea lion tried one cup and then refused to drink any more. He seems to think it's... unhealthy?
That little healer fish, as gentle as a pearl, likes to wave her wand and make a grand spectacle of bubbles for me to play with. And thus... I am able to enjoy that childlike delight once more.
Would you like some deep ocean honey brew for the occasion, little jellyfish?

With the weight of thirty million hollow shells and thirty million solitary warriors... he won against the gods and the ambitions of a monarch on the scales of destiny. This was not a miracle, but a glorious feat achieved with the power of the human will.
Let's work together for a golden future.
Help me, omnipotent Lady Tribbie!
The feast is here. Let the music of triumph ring out.
Shall we split the spoils thirty-seventy? As to who gets the seventy, I'm open to negotiations.

A visitor from beyond the sky shoulders the world's destiny, writing a new beginning for Amphoreus through "Trailblaze." Beyond the Aedes Elysiae lies a new era that everyone wishes for.
Now that you have arrived at the Dawn, (Trailblazer), are you ready to answer the world's summon?

The Scepter's kernel is severely damaged, little more than rubble. Seeking traces of the Demiurge here would be like finding a needle in a haystack. How revealing... This only confirms one thing...
I'm exactly where I need to be.

Exploration hit a snag. A barrier of quatorzain algebraic expressions has isolated this space. Screwllum suggests hacking into the independent signal terminal and using reverse computation to break through the barrier, unlocking the seal on the Scepter's kernel.

Exploration hit a snag. A barrier of quatorzain algebraic expressions has isolated this space. Screwllum suggests hacking into the independent signal terminal and using reverse computation to break through the barrier, unlocking the seal on the Scepter's kernel.

Let me tell you the story of "Membrance Maze": A group of cute little friends live in Aedes Elysiae's forests. Their names can be connected into a song...
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven ♪
Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti ♪
Tiny seeds of life sprout within pristine memories. In the most tender corners of the heart, that genuine shiver stirred by lament... That's the "mover of life."

The Ruins of Time... This is the kernel of the Scepter. Here stands Phainon, who forged a prison with rage to contain the hatred of Irontomb. If we wish to face the Lord Ravager head-on, we must embark on our final Flame-Chase Journey, gather the destinies of the Chrysos Heirs who have ascended into Titans, and reach Phainon with their aid to dissolve the Blazing Sun's obsession.

Wishes are but a part of the Deliverer's obsession. During our journey deep into the ruin, we reunited with other companions such as Cerydra, Hysilens, Trianne, and Trinnon. Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.
Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.

Each Chrysos Heir witnessed Phainon's solitary defiance along the way, and they transformed without hesitation into memories that walk with us, only to be able to fight alongside the Deliverer.

Irontomb's hatred devours the cosmos. Its coronation is nearly complete. All existence within the galaxy has already been formatted by it. However, in the final split second before the universe's destruction, I wake up in a silent void...

Return to the battlefield from An Eternal Page. Let remembrances and love be our bow and arrow to quell the headless giant's karmic flames and prove a different path for the Cosmos's future. The answer to the universe will never be the Destruction. Hope's beginning shall shine forth behind the heavy curtain of the final act.
The Battle of Irontomb ended in Destruction's defeat. I woke up in the familiar car, but the Express felt different today, as if some rare visitors had arrived...

Three of the Ten Stonehearts are engaged in a heated discussion. Sticky price models, vector autoregressive models, adverse selection, real options, endogenous variables, exogenous variables, liquidity trap... You hear many keywords, but you don't understand a single one.
Thanks for your praise.
Boohoo, you don't want me anymore!
Aren't you going with them?
Who developed the Currency Wars?

So I pulled some strings. Although they withstood seven massive dumping attempts, they finally gave up resisting when faced with the IPC fleet's aimed firepower.
Just kidding. Peppy's already a very capable researcher, no need to trouble you with such small matters.
Say no to animal shows!
These unique little ones need to overcome various obstacles to reach the finish line and compete for the top spots... Sounds pretty fun, doesn't it?
Hmm... I knew you'd come find me at this time. They say I'm prophetic and never miss a beat. Trust me, that's not just empty talk or baseless rumors.
Got the rules... all clear? I'll leave it to you then. Have fun playing with the creations on the space station.
Here, I'll program the Little Robot for you. Just ask it whenever you need pastries.
But to ensure fairness, you can only get more when you have insufficient pastries. So, you might want to strategize a little.
Zztzzt. Everyone deserves a third chance.
Meow! I love playing with everyone! It's so lively and fun, and then BOOM! Isn't that just awesome!?
I'm all ears!
Let me see... when will we meet again, meow...

Since experiencing this trip — or perhaps much earlier — March has become a mature Nameless. We needn't treat her like a helpless child anymore.

She treasured the fleeting moments, wove instants into eternity, and nurtured life in the graveyard of the Remembrance. Trust me when I say that such a scorching and loving gaze will remain forever new and forever bright in memories.
With Little Sevy here, we'll definitely have loads of good luck!

I heard that she always has thick tomes stacked up to the throne... I'd be happy to recommend some more books to her. After all, rather than wasting all that paper, it's better to see them being put to good use.
I shall remember every risk that the Nameless took for us.

That sage, agile like a green dolphin... His "performances" are awe-inspiring. Although, if they were accompanied by some music and deep-sea honey brew, they would surely be even more enchanting to all who listen.
Even if the night came in the very next moment, that blue-gold sunfish would still burn himself up to become everyone else's light. I pray that he may swim more easily in this now-cleansed sea.
Shall we drift together... on the ripples of reverie?

It was all thanks to Dux Temporum's efforts that the final law I set up for Amphoreus was not triggered. Sometimes I have to admit that, while great deeds can be accomplished through wars soaked in blood and fire, it's love and tolerance that bring together hearts and minds.
Let your imagination run wild, Dux Temporum.
Let's write an ending like never before!
I look forward to your performance this time.

The poem named Amphoreus, where time acts as its pages, and chaos marks its beginning. The golden blood engraves the footprints of defiance, as the heroes of the Flame-Chase lead the way in the grand enterprise of genesis. ''The chapter of "Passage," enlightening messages of salvation, a thousand tomorrows rising in succession.
The chapter of "Law," wagering against the gods, all for the world to stand among the stars.
The chapter of "Ocean," though waves may break, resisting against the void for a thousand years.
The chapter of "Romance," leading the Flame-Chase Journey, weaving the future with golden threads.
The chapter of "Strife," a path of blood and fire, where scars write of solitary glory.
The chapter of "Trickery," truth wrapped in lies, preserving light within the Evernight.
The chapter of "Life and Death," embracing lost souls, keeping the cycle of life and death eternal.
The chapter of "Reason," life cast into flames, as souls question the world's truth.
The chapter of "Sky," healing hearts with faint light, mending dawn and dusk with human will.
The chapter of "Worldbearing," rage burning away the cage, the hero bringing forth the light of Dawn.
The chapter of "Earth," forging the blood of Permanence, sheltering the wandering creatures of the land.
The chapter of "Time," watching over countless pasts, dedicating memories that shall not fade into oblivion.
...'' Through thirty million cycles, a girl held her pen, nurturing the naive "heart" with memories, as thirteen hues finally merged into the color of "love."
When shooting stars streaked across the sky, a hero from beyond the sky took up the pen, embarking once again with companions on the Flame-Chase Journey, writing an unprecedented ending through the way of the Trailblaze.
At the story's end, blossoms flourished in the eternal Pure Land.
On one end where night lingers, starlights twinkled. On the other end where day shines, people rubbed their eyes and awakened. As the west wind gently brushed past, people greeted each other good morning, just as they had done through thirty million cycles.
Here, the story draws its final period, like a blazing sun that's no longer blinding, like the Compass of the Trailblaze, and like an eye filled with love. ''"In this world, they fused burning golden ichor into their bodies.
Will destiny remember their names in the days to come?"''
Now, the poem's question has found its answer.
The memories that awaken at dawn will never forget. Amphoreus, that is its name.

''{{Color|keyword|"You see millions upon millions of steeds pulling chariots, blanketing the earth, yet only one reaches the finish! But you also see how wheel tracks existed before any chariot's departure!"
— Definition of "Pure Child of Anāsrava" from the Grand Dictionary of the Demicanian Language
|nobold=1}}'' Across the long ages, the words "Pure Child of Anāsrava" seem more like a baseless rumor, scattered through the fragmentary chapters of cosmic history. Different historical records lead to figures of vastly different birthplaces, races, identities, and even life experiences. They also never knew each other. The only common thread between these women was that they all walked the Path of Remembrance. Literally interpreted, the Pure Children of Anāsrava must have countless intricate connections with Fuli, the Master of Anāsrava. Could these women be some special form of Remembrance Emanators? The conjectures are endless: They could be fragments of the Aeon scattered across the cosmos after THEIR shattering, Fuli's countless manifestations walking among mortals, different facets of THEIR memories of "THEMSELF"... Each theory seems self-consistent, yet riddled with contradictions. Among these possibilities, one cannot be ignored: one or several Pure Children of Anāsrava establish the Garden of Recollection, where they work together to guard the secret of Remembrance: That the Crystal God of the Eden of Blessed Insight is only a false avatar, a fragment of "memories." It signifies the shared destiny of all Pure Children of Anāsrava: To remember the stars until these women's mind fades and their body dissolves. In the end, only one of them will ascend to become the true Fuli. ''March and Evernight seem to be related to the secret of the Garden of Recollection...''

''The words of wisdom left here by the Lord Ravager known as "Celenova":''
From across the void of space and time, I witnessed a single soul embark on a cosmic journey.

And in that instant, a billion clocks began to turn.

If the doom of the cosmos does not arrive with the birth of Irontomb, it will be...

in that moment when the stars will scatter like frightened birds,

and all that is harmony and discord, perfect and incomplete, just fall into oblivion.

To my friend (Trailblazer),
"A hero once set his own flesh and blood ablaze, forging a longsword to cleave the darkness."

Back in the wheat fields of Aedes Elysiae, my mother told me this nursery rhyme when I was young.

She said that the hero never really died and would one day come back to us.

And I believed it with every fiber of my being.
But he never came when raging fires burned the fields to ash.

He never came when the endless black tide swallowed the world whole.

I have lost count of the hopes I've held, the prayers I've sent.

Yet the hand of the clock, dripping with golden blood, reset again and again, leaving tomorrow a dawn that will never break.
When dawn fell to earth, it was you who showed me the way forward.

It was you who shouldered the weight of countless Coreflames for me.

It was you who saved me from the hell built of withered bones,

and wrote a new tomorrow for Amphoreus.
It was you... the hero I've been waiting for.

And it was also you who showed me that I, too, could become the hero within.

To forge my own destiny, just like you.
Please accept this creation forged in the same furnace as the Dawnmaker, proof of our battles fought side by side.

A nameless mass of molten iron, hammered by scars and tempered in suffering, spinning through countless cycles of time,

finally taking shape under your gaze.
May it give you the courage to believe in the arrival of dawn,

my hero.
Phainon

Look, in The Eternal Land, a nameless epic unfolds.
Listen. The wind's ballad sings the elegy of Era Nova, and witnesses the golden blood flowing through slumbering flowers, as the Coreflames sustain the scarred earth.
Like seeds about to perish, poems fade into obscurity. For false endings shackle the story's beginning.
Count the cold fluorescent lights, sting the eyes that pray for dawn.
Time has yet to flow, the sun is set to die. Is this the story's climax, or the finale?
No, there's still... one final stroke. And so you leave traces of "Trailblaze" on every page, where falls turn into ascents on another end.
You race through the mire of memories, using billions of Coreflames to scorch the frigid data sequences, and catching the shattered seed germs.
When a new blank page appears, you make your mark. It, too, will form ripples toward the past. Glimmering lights twinkle in the night sky of blank memories, where a shooting star yet to come has been entrusted with the anticipation of eternity.
Thirteen heartbeats sing proudly for the Flame-Chase Journey, for that was the land they deeply cherished.
The first page of the story unfolds once more, inscribed with prophecies of life. Listen! The wind sings a melody, the Seeds of Memory grow among the stars, for
the cosmos now knows the name, "Amphoreus."

''The words of wisdom left here by the Lord Ravager known as "Asat Pramad":''
Ah... I have come, and I have seen.

He was born from a single cause among a sea of data.

Raised in the infinite torrent gifted by his creator,

and unleashed in an all-consuming torrent of hatred.

Finally, he turned his back on the world, burning his own blood and bone to cinders, yet those cinders continue to smolder.

...

Alas, to sit atop this boneyard and watch this immersive play has worn my patience thin.

The only part I enjoy is the finale.

The grief and mirth in any human comedy or tragedy are far too clamorous.

Laughter, most of all.

Why not offer up a requiem for wisdom's death to the Destruction? In return, THEY will bestow upon this land a more suitable silence.

It is the only proper end for all paths.

Look, in The Eternal Land, a nameless epic unfolds.
Listen. The wind's ballad sings the elegy of Era Nova, and witnesses the golden blood flowing through slumbering flowers, as the Coreflames sustain the scarred earth.
Like seeds about to perish, poems fade into obscurity. For false endings shackle the story's beginning.
Count the cold fluorescent lights, sting the eyes that pray for dawn.
Time has yet to flow, the sun is set to die. Is this the story's climax, or the finale?
No, there's still... one final stroke. And so you leave traces of "Trailblaze" on every page, where falls turn into ascents on another end.
You race through the mire of memories, using billions of Coreflames to scorch the frigid data sequences, and catching the shattered seed germs.
When a new blank page appears, you make your mark. It, too, will form ripples toward the past. Glimmering lights twinkle in the night sky of blank memories, where a shooting star yet to come has been entrusted with the anticipation of eternity.
Thirteen heartbeats sing proudly for the Flame-Chase Journey, for that was the land they deeply cherished.
The first page of the story unfolds once more, inscribed with prophecies of life. Listen! The wind sings a melody, the Seeds of Memory grow among the stars, for
the cosmos now knows the name, "Amphoreus."

Dear Little Gray:
Originally, Tribbie was supposed to write this letter.

But Trianne also has a lot to say to you!

In the end, '''we''' decided to write one line each...
'''We''' once delivered prophecies to city-states scattered far and wide.

'''We''' once opened gateways for the Chrysos Heirs warring across the lands!

'''We''' once listened to prophecies in the Temple of Janus...
In the end, Little Gray fulfilled '''our''' Flame-Chase wish.

Little Gray drove away the villains emerging from the black tide!

It was Little Gray who saved everyone in Amphoreus...
So, please accept this Tribbie plushie,

Trianne stuffed the cotton inside, she worked so hard!

And Trinnon sewed it together, stitch by stitch...
The three of '''us''' have written enough already. Next, here's a wish from a thousand of '''us''':

May you ride the west wind to where the flowers bloom. There is no need to be saddened by partings.

We'll see you tomorrow!
Tribios
