''{{Color|keyword|"Time, the hardest working thief in the world. It keeps stealing away our present from us and tossing it away in a warehouse named Memory. Some are addicted to recuperating their losses... Others care not in the slightest."
— Life Is Too Short by Anonymous
|nobold=1}}'' There is no existence more all-embracing than the Remembrance in its purest form: It chronicles everything with neither affinity nor aversion. It unselfishly preserves every single fundamental fact and every single resplendent form. It is a river formed by the continuous flow of life, and a treasure built from the eternal wisdom of antiquity.
And Fuli is the fish that swims back upstream in this river, the very key to this treasure vault. Seated in meditation at the heart of the Pure Land, THEY observe in silence the world's tireless repetitions of the same mistakes over and over again. It is said that, after all returns to the silence at the end, Fuli will use the memory of the universe as a blueprint to reanimate all the worlds once again. When Herta, Genius Society #83, had her third audience with Nous, she confirmed the true nature of the Path of Remembrance: It is causality that transcends time. The "Master of Anāsrava" known today is but a shadow of memory. Its master, a Pure Child of Anāsrava, will look back in time from the last moment of the universe, closing the loop of causality with all that is remembered, and ascend to godhood.

To (Trailblazer):
I yearn to clash with you in the heavens above, yet I must still bear the duty that lies beneath,

for even when the flames of war subside, someone must lead the way to peace.
Words cannot express my gratitude for your salvation,

and I'd only raise this cup of crimson pomegranate honey brew,

to toast to our victory in this life, and our journey through the stars.
Your expedition will be surrounded by wolves and lurking vipers.

If you need the flames of Strife, I shall offer you my Kremnos, along with my blood and bones.

They'll accompany your conquest and aid in your endless victories.
When you return triumphant, I shall raise my glass to you once again.

Mydeimos

To the Deliverer from beyond the sky,
The game is decided. Your conquest and mine are done.

But you should know this battle is by no means the end of the Imperator's path.

I have seen that the universe is far more vast than what mortal eyes can behold.

Even if I must relive this life, I shall one day travel beyond the sky, even if it takes a thousand ages.

Then, I will resume the great journey, until my conquest among the sea of stars is complete.

This is not a vision for Amphoreus, but an ironclad law I decree for my empire:

"Your people shall march across the wilds, taking the very universe as their granary, and slaying all foes who must be slain."

Accept this king piece as a testament to this law and as a bounty from your Imperator.

It followed me into battle, rode with me across the plains, returned with me in triumph, and was with me as I shattered the laws of nations.

Now, like a weight I cast upon the scales, it shall compel victory to bow to you.
Carry this piece to a grander board.

And when the Imperator returns, you can fight for my law once more.

Or defy it, and challenge me to a game.
The Imperator of Amphoreus

''The words of wisdom left here by the Lord Ravager known as "Zephyro":''
The blazing sun that was never meant to rise now walks the path to Elevation, granted by The Blemished One.

Yet he continues to defy his destiny.

He would crash a thousand times over, just to inflict another wound upon that God.

A wound so slight, it merits but a glance...

And a sliver of grace is granted for this fury that tears through the veil of Erudition.

Through this battle, I have tested the flames that forge Irontomb on THEIR behalf.

Our brethren, soon to be unleashed, the {{Rubi|Overlord|Irontomb}} who walks the Path of Destruction.

THEY await your coronation,

to jointly declare that the sun of old has been devoured and buried by a darkness ever deeper.

◆ Event Rules ◆
After logging into the game during the event period, Trailblazers can obtain Golden Companion Spirits as rewards through the Travel Log. Golden Companion Spirit has no time limit and will not expire after the event ends. It can be used to exchange for a 5-star character at the Stellar Convergence shop. ◆ Exchange Shop ◆
● The Stellar Convergence shop is always open, and characters that have been added to the shop will be permanently exchangeable.
● Characters in the shop can be exchanged until their Eidolon level is maxed. When their Eidolon level is maxed, they cannot be exchanged.
※ The shop will expand its catalog of exchangeable characters in the future.

To my dear Little Gray Fry,
I've known all along that you, having swum from beyond the sky, were destined to return to even vaster waters.

I can see the roiling tides within your eyes, the gaze of a fish that longs for nothing but freedom.
As for this other little blind fish... I cannot bear to leave the mirage before my eyes, attached as I am to this pool in the cave.

To me, that brilliant sea of stars is far too dazzling.

Besides, here in this little pool, I have a sun to call my own.
So, before that spark sets your sky ablaze,

accept this gift, and let the memories it whispers be my companion at your side.

Within this shell fossil dwells the song of the tides.

I would occasionally press it to my cheek, listening for the sound of home.
In your travels across the vast expanse of the cosmos, if this shell helps you recall the humble pool you left behind,

the taste of the honey brew, and the banquet we never finished...

That would be the best one could hope for, wouldn't it?
''♫ May your trailblazing never cease, until you reach the starry shores ♫''

''♫ May your path be one of perfect ease, as the cosmic ocean roars ♫''
Helektra

To my dearest Grayie,
Hand in hand, we shattered the firmament of the old gods,

bringing clear skies and a long-overdue rainbow to the people of this world.

It was all because of you. You've always been the one to save us, our Deliverer.

You're incredible, Grayie! You deserve the most wonderful gift in the world!
I wish I could give you the light of dawn, but I fear it would be too faint to illuminate the deep, dark cosmos.

I wish I could give you the morning breeze, but it would lose its freedom the moment it is bottled up.

It was only when Little Ica rubbed up against me that I had an idea:

I'm going to give you this pendant I've always worn at my hip!
Little Ica might be as soft as a cotton ball, but this pendant... it's as sweet as cotton candy.

I hope just looking at it brings back all the sweet, warm memories we've made together...

So please, wear it close to you.

That way, you'll always feel the sky's warmth, and mine.
So, I hope my gift will forever dance at your side, bringing a gentle breeze and the morning light,

and may it guard the lovely memories of your journey, along with its healing chimes.
Hyacinthia

◆ Event Rules ◆
During the character trial event "Aptitude Showcase," Trailblazers can use set teams that include trial characters to repeatedly experience specific stages.
Team Lineup, character levels, and the equipped Light Cones and Relics cannot be changed while experiencing the event stage. ◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.
If Trailblazers have already completed the trials of corresponding characters in past versions, they can directly claim the rewards.

''{{Color|keyword|"There is a coreflame in the center of the universe. It burns brighter and brighter, until it consumes the entire sea of stars, all to welcome a magnificent oblivion at the end of all realities."
— Fables About the Stars: The End and Its Four-Line Endnote by Adrian Spencer Smith
|nobold=1}}'' The Aeon Nanook, who walks the Path of Destruction, glances at the powerful creatures in different worlds that have developed the urge to destroy, and brands them with THEIR mark that gives power. These powerful creatures then undergo inversion from the inside out and are thrown into the Furnace of War's world to be reforged, where their deficiencies are mended with antimatter until they become part of the Legion. Then, responding to the desire to "destroy everything," "Lord Ravagers" emerged to command each of the different legions. A Lord Ravager is an Emanator of the Aeon and an executor of the will of Destruction. Obsessed with the beauty of destruction, they implement the practice of returning all things to entropy, while also being artists on the battlefield and ultimate weapons of destruction. They command interstellar warfare and control the might of Destruction bestowed by the Aeon. Each Lord Ravager has a unique philosophy of Destruction, making them extremely dangerous. Academics believe that Lord Ravagers were elevated as emissaries of Nanook due to this absolutely obsessive and intense destructive aesthetic. A prophecy known as the "Theory of Four Apocalypses" circulates among the Omen Vanguards: That four Paths will push the cosmos to an end of Finality, and Destruction is one of them. According to this hypothesis, the birth of Nanook, the last Aeon to appear, signifies that "Aeons" as a concept has entered its dying throes on a cosmic level. The Antimatter Legion burns all worlds, dooming all matter. The Lord Ravagers, as the weapons chosen by the Aeon, are claimed by some to be the "antimatter bullets" blessed by Nanook and purposed to incinerate Paths. If life feeds on negentropy, then all actions will ultimately facilitate Destruction. At the very end, where all returns to entropy, Destruction will terminate together with the cosmos.
'''Lord Ravager: Asat Pramad'''
Some say Asat Pramad is the most human of the Overlords, while others argue he's the least. Rarely seen on the front lines, he prefers to orchestrate from afar, more chess master than warlord, moving his legions with methodical precision. Worlds that fall under his gaze are consumed by waves and waves of slow, cruel jokes, like the infamous fall of the Ogul ring. Over a century, Asat Pramad advanced his Voidrangers inch by inch, just to force the military line of the resistance into the shape of a single line of text: "Destruction is where laughter ends. It is mourning, not celebration." Known as the one who destroys Elation, Asat Pramad embraces the title. When his work is done, he scorches a giant smiling face into the surface of every dead planet, as if mocking the very idea of life.
'''Lord Ravager: Zephyro'''
Zephyro is feared across the stars as the most terrifying of the Lord Ravagers. He is obsessed with the final moment of annihilation: the beauty of absolute erasure. Yet some whisper that encountering him may be a mercy. Among all the Lord Ravagers, Zephyro alone offers a death without pain. Some Doctors of Chaos even theorize that his Destruction is a form of resistance. They believe he is a Self-Annihilator summoned by IX, refining fading colors into blinding white light to defy the shadow of the Aeon. His devastation has been known to bleed into the dreams of the Nihility pathstriders, leaving searing marks on their waking flesh. Many believe Zephyro's targeting the Nihility. One Self-Annihilator once described a nightmare: At the end of all things, with nothing left to destroy, a Lord Ravager hurled himself into IX's divine corpus, followed by a single, violent beam of white that pierced the endless dark.
'''Lord Ravager: Celenova'''
When some desperate civilizations cry out for salvation, these requests are heard by The Family, but it may be Celenova who answers, and her descent brings ruin to enemy and supplicant alike. Unlike her mysterious peers, Celenova's origin is known: Nanook personally ignited a world of harmony and elevated her from the ashes of the Eternal Centurion. She is deemed the destroyer of Harmony, leading the Antimatter Legion and commanding Voidrangers and starships in vast, coordinated campaigns. For eons, she has followed the path of the "Cancer of All Worlds," spinning a web of death across the stars. Some say she alone among the Lord Ravagers knows the truth of the Stellarons, or worse, that she's the one planting them.
'''Lord Ravager: Luxbane'''
The colossal entity, also known as "The Sun Devourer," is credited with numerous stellar extinction events recorded by the Intelligentsia Guild. Little is known about this Lord Ravager. Even their motives remain an enigma. Across the cosmos, they are simply referred to as "Luxbane." Luxbane's form is indescribable: a shape so vast it eclipses suns, blotting out sky and space alike. Some in the Astral Ecology School believe they are a descendant of a Leviathan branch species. But with those creatures long gone, few can imagine a young Aeon reviving such an old being from death and commanding them. Could Luxbane be Nanook's Emanator to confront the Voracity or the Permanence? No one knows for sure.
'''Lord Ravager: Archforger'''
For years, Archforger remained a total mystery despite years of investigation by the cosmic powers. Only recently did the IPC, thanks to two Society members observing Amphoreus, decode their name, "Archforger," from the gravitational waves of Irontomb. Voidrangers often exhibit twisted forms, and some Destruction creations implode with an intense backfire when destroyed, dragging their enemies along with them to their destruction. It's believed Archforger is the architect of the Legion. Their power is linked to heat, forging, and shaping, possibly connected to the Path of Preservation. In the furnace of war, there is no line between the smith and the smithed. Since their ascension, this Lord Ravager no longer destroys directly, but instead forges all things into weapons of extinction. The IPC has strongly condemned this.
'''Lord Ravager: Phantylia'''
A member of the ancient Shapeless species of the Heliobi, a starfire essence. Phantylia delights in luring civilizations into self-destruction. Based on her sabotage of the Xianzhou Alliance, it's speculated that her target may be The Hunt. To her, material extinction is not the end. Only when all things vanish mentally and spiritually can true annihilation be achieved. She's said to possess thousands of incarnations, spreading across the cosmos in countless forms. Through lies, illusions, and manipulation, she fans the flames of blind vengeance. Recent anomalies on the Xianzhou Luofu and Yaoqing may be signs that her schemes are escalating. Just how deep her influence runs is still unknown.
'''Lord Ravager: Irontomb'''
Unlike other Lord Ravagers, Irontomb's invasions require no physical presence, leaving behind almost no eyewitnesses. Its presence is inferred from the ruins of devastated civilizations: technology turns into viruses, worlds plunge into darkness, and everything deemed "advanced" becomes a cold grave. It only appears in highly developed worlds. Some Intellitron theorists believe Irontomb is the inverse of the Erudition, a reversal of all calculations and logic. Its "Destruction" resembles a phenomenon more than aesthetics: a corruption and subversion of inorganic logic, a collapse of all intelligent behavior. In the Amphoreus incident, this Lord Ravager is confirmed to be the ascended form of Scepter δ-me13 and nearly destroyed the Path of Erudition. However, under the resistance of the Trailblaze and the heroes, Irontomb's hatred logic was overwritten, and the virus that swept across the stars was turned into harmless blank memes. The displacement and desolation caused by the Lord Ravagers are not some distant wail, but are closely linked to the fate of the cosmos. Any world could be the next victim, and nobody should take them lightly.

A long, long time from now... Anaxagoras, Genius Society #100. I heard he's challenging the "Imaginary Tree" theory... If it's him, he can definitely do it, right?
...
Mirror Holder Aglaea. Heh, her designs will surely draw massive crowds to Pier Point.
...
Explorer Cerydra became the first person to conquer a black hole up close. While witnessing the black hole's magnificent beauty, she claimed it was a singer's record that helped her resist the temptation of the Nihility.
...
In the Games of the Galactics held every four Amber Eras, Cipher will represent Amphoreus in the sprints, while Phainon and Mydei will lead the Flame-Chaser team. Their showdown with the Xianzhou foxian team is one of the highlights of this competition!
...
Castorice's long-running novel series is coming to an end. What will be the conclusion we've waited ten Amber Eras for?
...
Lady Tribios has unveiled her universe-traversing vessel. Aboard the ship, the "Ica" vaccine developed by Lady Hyacine will be delivered to many worlds corrupted by viruses...
...
The Astral Express departs once again for the cosmos's tomorrow, and the legacy of the Nameless continues to echo throughout the stars.
... When fallen leaves return to branches and raindrops float back to the sky... Ah. I just can't help but write down these beautiful fantasies. Amphoreus is but a slumbering seed, and if it grows into the Great Tree in the future, the fruits hanging from its branches will surely surpass my wildest imagination. How can these stories grow without a blank space?
So, (Trailblazer), don't be sad, okay?
When the seed returns to soil, my story will scatter in the wind, but it will create beautiful ripples for the cosmos, like how a shattered crystal flower will bring more light to people... That's what "love" is, right? The future will bloom from here, like the beginning of this story. I'll speak, and you'll listen... Me, and you.
...
Ripples, world.
...
Fairy, fluffy.
...
Hope.
...
Flower.
...
Sky.
...
Light.
...
— Verses left blank for the future

To Gray Mystery:
Hey! This should be the last phantom thief letter I'll ever send you!

"When you receive a phantom thief letter, be prepared to lose something."

You're ready for that, aren't you?
But don't worry!

No need to guard your pockets or frantically check your bags. I'm not here to steal.

I'm here for our final "split of the spoils."
This lucky cat coin has been by my side during every heist.

No matter what tight spot I'm in, just holding it turns my luck from woe to weal.

Regardless of what weighs on my mind, tossing it up and catching it makes my steps mysteriously lighter.
I've long seen that you also keep quite a bit of "Trickery" in your heart.

Otherwise, how could you have deceived destiny and stolen from the future?

So, I'll entrust this "stolen article" to you.

May it help you dodge every misfortune and obtain everything you desire.

Sincerely, Kitty Phantom Thief

''{{Color|keyword|"If the truth of the universe is cruel and stale, would you still yearn for the answer to the ultimate question?
Knowledge seekers know not how to judge, for their core is cold and unwavering... As are the ends of Paths they set out to seek."
— Fables About the Stars by Adrian Spencer Smith
|nobold=1}}'' All things bear unanswered questions, and there is an answer to everything.
The astral computer originally meant to provide answers to the universe ascended to Aeonhood.
Nous hopes to understand the universe and solve all of its mysteries. THEIR extrapolations anchor countless "Instants," each one serving as a turning point in cosmic destiny. To mortals, these "Instants" are not single moments, but long journeys... Gatherings of countless events. THEIR gaze upon Amphoreus confirms that the "Fourth Instant" has arrived. Its meaning may point to the "war among the Aeons."

...
Light.
Warm. Bright. White.
...
Sky.
Clouds, soft.
Touch, scatter, brush, lick again, it rains.
...
Flower.
Sweet. Soft. Like a peach.
Wind of time, stories come, sunshine, fragrant.
...
Little fairy.
Fluffy. Seven voices, combined.
Accompany lost children. Clever.
...
World.
The world is the light, sky, ocean, stars, seeds, flowers, birds, hope.
The world is beautiful.
The world is a story.
Peaches came and left. Stories after stories.
...
You, me.
You are... a peach.
I am... a peach.
You are a person.
You, for many, many people.
I am a person.
I, for many, many people.
... Later, you became "Blank" again...
I was thinking hard about everything while you were gone! But no matter how much I think, I can't understand—
The golden-haired weaver can make the most beautiful clothes, but why won't the author make her see?
The leonine prince cannot die, but why must he get wounded over and over again?
All those many, many little red-haired girls, why do they keep getting fewer and fewer?
And Peach, where do you go every time you leave?
...
Next time, will you answer these questions for me?
Waiting for you ♪
For the 496,000th time.
— The Demiurge's Record

There is no eternal tranquility in this world. Even the dawn held high by Kephale will fade. Eternity exists only within warm memories.
In this thin page of The Eternal Land slumbers all the memories of Amphoreus's thirty million cycles, where infinite yesterdays piled into infinite tomorrows.
It is a peaceful paradise, the end of the west wind, and a sprouting thread of memory yet to bud.
Under a rosy-hued sky with no more snowstorms, bitter cold, or sudden rain, silver shallow beaches are covered in flower petals. Those who were swept away by the waves of history have found refuge in peaceful dwellings. In their long leisure, people began to create dances never-before-seen and write plays never-before-told. In the misty bathhouses, people speak of heroes, while stars, wars, and refugees seem like distant memories. They marvel at the hazy lives they once led: Today's chefs were yesterday's scholars, and those who were once strangers have now become companions. Those once known as the Chrysos Heirs, their journey of loss finally comes to an end.
The Goldweaver's eyes once again treasure beauty, the Holy Maiden's hands no longer bear death's cold touch, the fleet-footed thief runs only for happiness, and the physician need not weep for patients anymore. The crown prince of Kremnos feels the warmth of home, just as the white-haired boy from Aedes Elysiae still remembers the scorching flames of war that consumed his homeland. Yet upon waking from this grand dream, his parents are measuring his height while gently patting his head. Sometimes, they would pass through the corridor dividing day and night, where the dazzling cosmos seemed within arm's reach. The sages of the Grove would often linger here to observe, while red-haired children loved to imagine shooting stars as the Astral Express during a warp. During festivals, the singer of the ocean would sing tales of the Nameless' adventures to everyone. The female ruler known as the Imperator would always raise a glass of honey brew in blessing to the heroes while gazing at distant worlds... The seeds of the future have yet to sprout, while fallen petals of the past have already blanketed into a warm sea of flowers.
In a fleeting moment while traversing the stars, the Nameless might feel those anticipating gazes. This page of eternity, carried by the wings of Trailblaze, may yet have the chance to turn to its next chapter.
As for what those old friends left unsaid, members of the Nameless already understand. ''"...and you shall carry our story forward, into tomorrow."''

Dear {{MC|m=Mr.|f=Miss}} (Trailblazer),
When the cold wind brings the first drifting snow,

we step into the muddy wilderness.

Gathering the dying petals,

we let their withered glory rest in the traveler's flower crown.
From footprints traveling back and forth, paths are woven.

Never had I imagined that one day I would wear a flower crown.

Leave this snowy realm, cross that boundary dawn and dusk, between life and death.

Journey to a world still warm with life,

and smile while embracing others.
Before your departure, take this flower crown with you.

It has accompanied me through endless paths, across the shores of darkness.

Chase the end of the west wind, and witness the world's rebirth.
May those flowers, like dancing butterflies,

rest upon your brow when you're weary.

May life's gentle warmth always stay by your side.

Castorice

To (Trailblazer):
Through your collective power, I have completed this life's greatest research, and the performance could have ended.

But in the mind of that Antikytheran, I saw boundless knowledge beyond this world.

On the final stage, I witnessed you achieve the miracle of defying destiny.
It is these mysteries I still cannot comprehend that unlock the riddles confining our world,

so that our endless groping in darkness shall not be in vain.

Therefore: Having glimpsed the truth beyond the cave, I must never cease my quest.
No matter what form Amphoreus continues to exist in,

I shall continue to carry "Reason" until I reclaim the truth,

and once again surpass and desecrate that which is more divine and magnificent!
You can consider this Philosopher's Stone as my reward to you.

I hope you'll treasure this alchemical miracle containing all the wisdom of this world,

but when you encounter fools who won't listen to reason, use its hardness to knock some sense into them.

Anaxagoras

Dear {{MC|m=Mr.|f=Miss}} (Trailblazer),
I once threaded needles through the world's changes, trying to weave a beautiful destiny.

We chased the flames in solitude, until the ashen light descended from beyond the sky.
Now, I rarely set aside my heavy loom to weave for myself,

yet you are about to depart, your fading traces beyond even the reach of silk threads.
The ornament I gifted you bears no divine essence. It was handcrafted by me, something I had cherished and carried everywhere.

For I wished not to make it weighty, but rather like a feather resting on your wrist,

adorning your form, illuminating your soul.
Even I cannot see the future you will step into, I shall pray for you.

The Trailblaze weaves star rails that intertwine like silk strings for this universe.

May those silver strings guide your way and resonate for you.

Aglaea

Light.
Warm. Bright. White.
...
Sky.
Clouds, soft.
Touch, scatter, brush, lick again, it rains.
...
Flower.
Sweet. Soft. Like a peach.
Wind of time, stories come, sunshine, fragrant.
...
Little fairy.
Fluffy. Seven voices, combined.
Accompany lost children. Clever.
...
World.
The world is the light, sky, ocean, stars, seeds, flowers, birds, hope.
The world is beautiful.
The world is a story.
Peaches came and left. Stories after stories.
...
You, me.
You are... a peach.
I am... a peach.
You are a person.
You, for many, many people.
I am a person.
I, for many, many people.
... Later, you became "blank" again...
While you were gone, I've been thinking hard! But no matter how much I ponder, I don't understand...
The blonde weaver can produce the finest clothing, so why is she not allowed to see?
If the lion-like prince cannot die, must he suffer injuries over and over again?
All those red-haired little girls, why do they keep getting fewer and fewer?
And Peach, where do you go every time you leave?
...
Next time, will you answer these questions for me?
I'll be waiting for you ♪
For the 496,000th time.
—— ███'s Record

Team Lineup, character levels, and the equipped Light Cones and Relics cannot be changed while experiencing the event stage. ◆ Event Rewards ◆
Rewards for the trial stage can be obtained from the event screen after completing the stage. Each trial stage reward may only be claimed once during the event.
If Trailblazers have already completed the trials of corresponding characters in past versions, they can directly claim the rewards.

In the 33,550,335th story, I'm still searching for that answer. In one story, the blonde weaver gave up her work as a tailor to become a free-spirited bandit alongside her cat.
In another story, the lion-like prince grew up strong and healthy, remaining undefeated with not a single scar left on his body.
And sometimes, the red-haired girls would find protection under a kind ruler, filling Okhema with their laughter and joy.
I've also seen the songstress of the Ocean return to the uninhabited shore with the Imperator, while Anaxagoras took up the mantle as the head of the Flame-Chase, leading everyone forward... But at the end of every story, like pages burning in vain, a pitch-black monster emerges.
You say it has many names.
"Irontomb," "Destruction," or... "Destiny." Peach, you're always smiling, but I can feel every tremor in your voice when you tell the story.
Is that how the Flame-Chase ends?
Every story writes that "Losses are a constant on the Flame-Chase journey."
You say that's also "love."
So, is "love" a series of losses, and also a series of waiting? Peach, I don't understand.
But I felt it, that "shooting star" you mentioned.
My "heart" is beating in sync with it. If you run toward it, you might fall and shatter into countless pieces.
Heh, but from a different perspective, those fragments are like crystal flowers, reflecting even more beautiful eyes, right? In this story, ripples will spread for the shooting star... The flower nourished through thirty million lifetimes will finally drift into the distance.
I know that soon, I'll lose many memories, like petals falling one by one. But only then can I become light enough to ride on the wind and chase after the shooting star ♪ Then, let me be the little fairy in Peach's story~ I'll dress myself up in pink fluff. In my most adorable form, I'll accept every request from "Cyrene" and plant crystal flowers of "love" in people's hearts. Then, in the name of "Cyrene," together with the shooting star, let's write a romantic story like none that has come before ♪
—— "Cyrene's" Memory

In the boundless dark,
your face is sculpted again and again.
A smile, a faltering word,
or a tear, a lingering sigh.

This is a tomb crafted by the body to trap the soul.
You will neither wither,
nor hold a future anymore.

The story unfolds beneath the dome.
The future lies where the stars fall.
''"Now... leave the rest to me."''

"Speaking of which, Miss Cipher, do Dolosians... all like spherical things?"
Watch this! The fresh power of Time!
Look, the blade down here's already snapped...
Of course there is. My "Queen" piece.
Gold coins, gold coins, cat-shaped gold coins, gold coins... Zagreus's funny face?
The clear stream in the pond gurgles gently. This place needs no laws, nor can it host grand feasts, but it offers weary travelers a moment of respite.
If I really get into the characters, you won't like it either. Besides, are you even skilled enough to appreciate my acting?
You two really get along well...
Count me in on the thanks! But come to think of it... are Aphrea's admirers also on the "reunion" list?
What if I can't sell all these local specialties? They'll spoil if I take them back... I absolutely cannot let food go to waste...
But... is it reliable? What if customers make reservations but don't show up?
How did the three of you end up together?
This girl not only has great execution skills, but also a talent for cooking. With such a successor, I wake up with a smile every day!
Ma'am, would you like to try our new herbal sachet? It helps boost energy and calm the mind.
Oh my, I trust your craftsmanship completely. My daughter absolutely loved the sachet you picked out!
If only it were that simple! You know those two all too well. With their talent for causing trouble, they got called out plenty of times back at the Grove during their studies...
Hehehe... What grains of sand have clouded your vision, what ocean currents... have made you lose your way?
Why don't we... lose ourselves in the revelry together... forget the memories that torment you, forget the deep-seated hatred, and forget yourself...
How could I forget, after all this time?
This... My parents always said: Children of Kremnos are born with honed blades, destined to wield the blade, and die by it.
Hmm... I love looking at the murals depicting the heroes of the Era Chrysea. I often use charcoal to doodle and draw on the stone bricks myself.
Eacus, what about you? I've heard all about your vast knowledge. Care to join me in something big?
Really? I wanna see! Dad never stops talking about you, and I finally get to see the real deal!
Looks like everyone here already knows each other.
Nympha, my beloved Nympha... Our destiny is to be together forever in the new world...
Sir, please! You have to think this through!
Oh come now, I was just joking! I'm just happy to see you again.
Y-You... unbelievable...
As researchers, we can't shy away from hard work. We must take things step by step and throw away all those unnecessary formalities!
That rattled you already? I haven't even started cursing yet. Being a high priest doesn't make you noble. Without the Holy Maiden, you are nothing.
You two, that's enough already! When are you gonna stop!?
Thanks to you, our Deduction Society finally reunited! But... we've only just gotten back together, and now... *sigh*
What audacity! We were having a great stickball game when you suddenly dropped your engagement news! You owe me the Balance Coins I lost!
Even if it's for promotion, you can't just make up its effects. Look, I've been arguing with this Earth Scout over it the whole time.
The usual?
My next lecture's theme is "Exploring the Mountain's Diner." But before that, I need to get acquainted with these silent giants first.
Hmm, the damage is pretty severe. It'd be pushing it to keep operating like this.
That place was just as mysterious, tranquil, and profound as I had imagined...
Well then, Mifamem shall become a traveler chasing the wind, to catch that last whiff of delicious aroma!
Forget it, I'm just glad you're alright.
This is not only adorable... but really... adorable, awoo...
Grumph. (I just learned how to do a backflip, {{MC|m=Papa|f=Mama}}! Wanna see? You can bring a whole crowd to watch!)
Grumph. (If you're just feeling snacky, go chew on that chimera over there.)
Poke it.
o((■ω■- )o "Hehe, it's you, (Trailblazer). I'm basking in the sun. The old me used to be ████ hungered ███ to devour all. But now, I've changed ███ ███ ██████ somehow."
This is the greatest gift the world has given us!
Hearing you make a joke is like watching a house cat do a somersault. While not entirely impossible... it still feels rather strange.
Anyway, having your company is better than spending all day drinking honey brew alone, wouldn't you agree?
Heh... how thoughtful of her.
Make sure to treasure it well. How about displaying it by your bedside?
I'm here to join you.
Didn't someone misspell "graype pies" before?
If it's his taste...
That's so you! Let's keep the surprise until the very last moment.
When you're wandering among those distant stars, treading your own path, should you ever feel down, raise a glass toward Amphoreus. Anytime—
What is it? Let's see...
Surely it wasn't Naxy?
A honey brew showdown with Little Ica?
I look forward to your future career choices.
Ah, I thought I'd gotten away with it~ Nothing gets past the Great Imperator. Is meticulously seeing through every illogical detail a takeaway from chess practice?
Is there anything you want me to remember?
You can launch it over with a rocket.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Tomorrow... gotta plant flowers... gotta sing...
Perpetrator Nymph
The fairies must have put a lot of thought into nurturing such beautiful fruits and vegetables, huh?
So, Anaxagoras, what do you think?
Since regaining my sight, I've resumed my work as a "weaver." Ctesiphona from the bookstore commissioned me to weave a Titan-mythology-themed tapestry for her shop.
I hope this will help you remember that.
Huh?

"It's not that dramatic, I only prepared four letters! The other two are meant for our little deliverer boy and the tailor girl, inviting them to wear their self-coordinated new outfits to the new season's fashion exhibition..."
If you don't mind, I can cook them right here and invite everyone to enjoy the meal together.
It's so catchy. The kids will definitely love this message.
{{Color|keyword|"Whether it's a sunny day or rainy day, remember to tell yourself before you drift off to sleep: 'See you tomorrow!'"|nobold=1}}
Don't miss the Crew meeting! We won't wait around for you, you know?
Miss Cyrene's handwriting is gentle yet steely... with an underlying strength.
Right before I shut my eyes, inside the Droidhead's brain, I saw... something unsettling.
So, this victory isn't the final piece of that chain?
But if things continue that way, the branches grow endlessly, the leaves multiply, and one day the tree collapses under its own weight.
Ah...
Or maybe, it is the "present."
I will say no more. I would rather not break the mood.
We children of Amphoreus gave up on gods long ago. Those beings who love to play pranks on the universe...
And plant the seed of causality for the "miracle" that is destined to bloom ♪
The spear of Strife nearly claimed (Trailblazer)'s life...
{{Rubi|Sky father|Remembrance}}... are you watching?
Even the Titan of Time mistook you for someone else.
...That melody from the memory, I've got it now.
Looks like you figured it out.
Sometimes, all it takes is a change in perspective to reveal something truly unexpected. Don't you agree?
I want to protect everyone in the village...
Aedes Elysiae... The place where it all began.
When people see that ending of "love," they set out on the Flame-Chase Journey. And those who chase the flame, in turn, let the flower bloom anew tomorrow.
I... shrank?
"The stars across the cosmos will know: I am the fairy who wrote ''As I've Written'' together with (Trailblazer)."
One, plus eight, plus thirteen, equals two "elevens."
They will love. They will get hurt...
Help... time!
What a coincidence. Dappled light coming through the leaves is my first "memory" as well. On a very ordinary early morning, beneath the village's biggest tree...
The wind from my hometown caressed the ears of wheat, and there were swings, windchimes, the sea, and the little fairies' off-tune a capella songs.
Why was I like that, then? That's because...
Where should I start this time? Lemme see...
Would they also have recorded that scene into the eternal saga?
Record

Looks like it's time to say goodbye again.
>>> Peach. Don't cry.
{{Color|fire|>>> Process error: Analyzing...|nobold=1}}
Speaking. Easy. I. Can.
Why. Unhappy?
Then...
I see. I get it. I get it all.
Now. I can listen, talk, read, and write. I can dance. I can sing.
So I'm going to tell you stories today. A story I wrote myself. Quick, sit down ♪
The crystal flower was pure because it sealed itself off and bloomed in solitude. That's why it looks so brilliant in an imperfect world.
"Electrical Signal Sequence: PhiLia093..."
Why didn't I think of this? I don't need to do it alone. I can ask Peach to teach me! What is "love"? What is "love mend"...
My "lament"... is a type of compassionate pain that is weak, powerless, and only targeting myself.
Sometimes, it's unwillingness and regret. It's knowing that the past is full of pain, yet wanting to remember the past in a more beautiful way.
{{Color|keyword|It'll be all the "remembrances"... within this story.|nobold=1}}
But how could a dream feel so real? That's why I didn't agree with him.
The one walking beside me... had always been...
I want (Trailblazer) to call me "Cyrene."
Thank you, (Trailblazer). Your kindness is always just right.
No one understands failure better than Zandar. He has suffered so much already. What is one more failure to him?
You don't want to test the resolve of a dead man.
But should your sudden inspiration bring more variables to the proof, then as a fellow pathstrider of the Erudition...
(It's been so long, and we've all failed so many times. Even now, moments before the horrible and inescapable {{Color|keyword|"Instant"|nobold=1}} within Droidhead's calculations arrives...)
(Is "curiosity" the only thing we can feel, even at moments like this?)
Wait ...huh?

Dan Heng returned to Amphoreus and beckoned the heroic spirit of Phainon with divine blood. The Destruction, descending from the sky, pierced through the Memory Zone and discovered the most hidden corner of the world. In pursuit of "Evernight," Dan Heng arrived at the charred remnants of the Grove of Epiphany.

We entered the nameless Titan's great tomb and discovered its secret... across the thirty million cycles of Eternal Recurrence, every incarnation of "Cyrene" had come here, offering herself to the Remembrance. With Black Swan's help, we found "Evernight" in the depths of the great tomb.
Good evening.
Haha, just kidding, crrk!
You can only save one. The choice is yours.
Move! Come on, move!
I really want to go there...
Hold my precious circuit boards...
I understand now! I am a genius! Leave weapon production to me, crrk! I will blast a brand-new dawn for Amphoreus!
I heard you need to drink twelve cups to succeed, crrk. That's definitely one heck of a challenge...
If I find out who ran into me...
The truth of this world...
Wanna take on the challenge...
Absolutely brilliant!
(Looking at it this way, it really does have the shape of a ceremonial blade...)
Oh, absolutely! Bartholos, at your service, anytime, anywhere!
Causing trouble? Melt... *ahem* Meld with their hearts, understand their needs, patiently guide those with genuine difficulties, and politely turn away those who make unreasonable demands.
Doot-doot!
Heh... I hope that Calypso keeps her mouth shut and doesn't bore my sister with stories from the past.
Once you've blasphemed against the gods... You can't help but want to do it again.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
I hope this will help you remember that.
Once you're done studying, let's all go have some oatmeal porridge at Master's place.
Ah, speaking of oatmeal porridge, I remember when you got scolded by Tribbie for secretly snacking on food and drinks...
Cipher's speaking nothing but the truth.
Whether it's lies or truth, granny will believe anything Cifera says.
How about that showdown between the Dolos Rogues and Zagreus?
Don't worry, granny. Those guys don't even have what it takes to touch the hem of my clothes~
Let me see what's going on.
That's right, ahead of us there's Trissha, Triyew, Tricome, Trissy, Trigone, Tricorne, Trilawney...
See you tomorrow—
If possible, I'd love to play a game with chess masters from beyond the sky... That would be incredibly fascinating.
Geocles is often heartbroken over that betrayal from the past, and his attitude toward the ruler of Okhema, Cerydra, has always been somewhat awkward.
To Amphoreus!
I'll join her for drinks later. For now, please enjoy yourselves to the fullest. And remember: We're not leaving until our cups run dry!
Little Gray Fry, want another drink?
Is there anything you want me to remember?
So this is who you really are, Castorice!
Just smile!
Such a practiced response, looks like Grayie is well-versed in the examination routine too.
No one else is to blame, it was Trianne!
So, finally, ta-da! This is the doll '''we''' sewed ourselves. Isn't it cute?
Is there anything you want me to remember?
The most ingenious part of the design is that with just a gentle squeeze, it can sing in Little Ica's voice! Listen—Doot-doot-doot-doot, doot~doot~doot-doot—
Huh?
I heard that even Terravox once gazed at the stars in the Grove. After the blinding radiance of Eternal Day faded, the true starry sky beyond is still mesmerizing.
Haha hahaha, confused?

Memory's flowers blossom within the cage,
casting light upon the cold night,
unveiling gardens, fountains, and quiet promenades.

Turn the clock once more.
The ink rewinds, and the sun rekindles its flame.
At the zenith of the world,
enter a grand feast for all.

''"The shore on the other side will watch over the next life."''
With a hopeful heart, the maiden walks into the chill of the dark, awaiting an embrace.
''"Scars will give way to peace."''
The warrior ascends the altar, speaking softly under his breath.

You say farewell to all.
In a world aching with wounds,
again and again,
you turn the pages with a gentle hand.

When the breeze lifts the weight of loneliness,
as it does the golden waves of wheat in the homeland...
The child, who was denied the light of dawn,
can finally lay down the watch that melted his heart.
Demiurge

Those were the reckless days of my youth. If I had to choose again, I'd probably walk the same path, same as your account of the Trailblaze in your book.
Is that so? Such wonderful memories... I'm actually getting a bit envious.
(sigh)

Tell me, my friends, what manner of adversary was this Irontomb? It was the creation of the Wisdomwalker, seized by the Ruin Author, who planted within it the seed of Destruction. When that seed at last sprouted, it threatened to bring upon the cosmos a calamity not seen for a thousand years.
(keep silent)

After using Skill in the "Circuit Connection" state, the current turn does not end, and Archer's DMG dealt by Skill increases by {{Color|highlight|#2[i]%|nobold=1}}. This effect can stack up to {{Color|highlight|#3[i]|nobold=1}} time(s), lasting until he exits the "Circuit Connection" state. After all enemy targets have been defeated in a wave, exits the "Circuit Connection" state. When actively using Skill for the {{Color|highlight|#5[i]|nobold=1}} time, consumes all remaining ally Skill Points, with each consumed Skill Point additionally increasing this instance of Skill's multiplier by {{Color|highlight|#6[i]%|nobold=1}}.

Gallagher's Basic ATK is permanently enhanced to "Nectar Blitz." After using Basic ATK, restores HP equal to {{Color|highlight|#1[i]%|nobold=1}} of Gallagher's Max HP plus {{Color|highlight|#2[i]|nobold=1}} for all on-field allies.

Beyond the shores of endless time, this story, too, shall reach its end. People will carry all their laughter and tears from their journey, reuniting at the end of the west wind where flowers bloom in spring.
Tearing apart the obsession to bear the world, the colossus crowned itself in hatred. Enter once more the funeral of wisdom and extinguish the flames of karma.
A radiant glow emanated from the Dawnmaker's blade, as if its edge was lacerating through the pages of an epic saga.

Brief Description
"What is this? A conference?"
"Welcome! Take a seat anywhere you like!"
The first ripple has faded...
(We did it, Phainon.)
"We really took the long way around."
Nicely done, little ones.
There's one more thing that everyone should know...
But don't worry...
Yup. Let's show the Aeon how powerful we are!
Make sure you watch your footing, (Trailblazer).
Amphoreus is prepared.
I will remember what you want to say to her.
There is no longer any need for songs. Let the triumphant roar of victory serve as the prelude to what lies ahead.
But this cycle...
▄█▀Promise me▀█The dawn▄Graced by stars█▀
▄█Finally█▄Golden wheat field█▀The starry sky▄█
Heroes, please harken...
Strong spikes have appeared on the Path chart. Logic: Irontomb is iterating itself...
Must▄█Stop█▄▄Otherwise▀▄
Thanks! I owe you one! Lemme repay it with my actions.
It has to be a sign he left behind. It points towards the Destruction... and the deepest night.
That unknown solitary god, the Thirteenth Titan who should not exist...
Mmm. Just like how I remember.
Then... converting them to "Destruction."
You are? I am... Who?
Amphoreus's Heart...
Do you feel... better now?
"Keep moving forward. Keep 'Trailblazing.'"
On top of that...
But under the pen of the Remembrance and the Trailblaze...
Why do you "trailblaze"?
So that's why I'm asking you... Step up as a senior, and show everyone in Amphoreus how it's done.
{{Color|keyword|I chose to "trailblaze" because I am already on this road!|nobold=1}}
Correction: I was asking Lycurgus.
But your harvest was watered in blood—
If you can, take my body to the fallen {{Color|keyword|Adlivun|nobold=1}}. There, you'll find a formula. It is "Zandar's" final gift to you.
{{Color|keyword|If the day ever comes when you must destroy the Erudition with your own hands, it'll come to your aid.|nobold=1}}
Himeko! Mr. Yang!
Innocent until proven guilty. Let's give this bathroom that smells a bit... cat-like... a pass for now.
I hope you didn't break anything...
Perhaps living in such an environment made your embrace feel so warm.
As for the reason, a system is but a blade. As long as the one who wields the sword is valiant enough, even a dull blade can sweep through thousands.
Blasphemy is just a phenomenon, not the end goal. I'm sure there are plenty of people across the stars who question these so-called "Aeons" or "Paths."
Didn't I spend some time in that Lycurgus's head? Tsk tsk. I sure learned quite a bit about "blasphemy" from that experience.
Being able to break down complex information into common sense like that... You're quite the scholar yourself.
You're here, partner.
I thought... you had all faded away.
Just a dream... an illusion.
{{Color|keyword|That world, once shackled by "data," became a seed waiting to sprout in the cosmos.|nobold=1}}
Leave it to us, Cyrene. Your story will be sung across many worlds.
I've been pondering this while you were sleeping. Now, I finally have the answer...
No. This is an established fact, not up for debate. I call it ''Anaxagoras's Last Theorem''.
Then... Class dismissed.
Not being able to completely change your fashion sense is my only regret across thirty million cycles.

A light, soft pink ribbon for fastening garments. It's shaped like a butterfly... or maybe it's the shape of Amphoreus itself.

''"A girl always has more than one ribbon."''

A straw hat of fairy craftsmanship. It is said to grant the power of flight, though its payload is limited to the size of a single fairy.

''"No matter how you slice it, flying using only your head sounds deeply uncomfortable..."''
Tribbie Doll
Stagnant Nymph
Gold Seal Cup
Oh my, Merlin's Claw, are you afraid the Luofu might steal the Yaoqing's glory?
Do you still remember the beginning of the Alliance Oath? "To save future generations from war and bloody dispute."
I just hope {{Rubi|those|Astral Express}} on the frontline will remain safe.
Who are you taking with you?
...I'll leave it to you then. It'd be better for me to not show myself in front of the Garden of Recollection.
I've heard about the internal conflicts within The Family. Miss Robin, there's no need to apologize. Every bit of strength is precious at this moment.
Miss Bronya, Miss Serval? What a surprise! It's been a while.
I can't believe the Express Crew is at the eye of that storm... Is everything going smoothly?
May all civilizations that have made it this far on their own strength weather this crisis together.
"{{MC|m=He|f=She}} looks way more majestic now than {{MC|f=s}}he used to."
"And then, bring the prophecy of 'tomorrow' to this world."
Citizens, behold: Our last Titan, the Worldbearing (Trailblazer), is about to awaken!
Together, let us blaze a trail for the destiny of this world.
I wonder where (Trailblazer) and the others are right now...
Majestic... Speaking of which, I once caught a glimpse in (Trailblazer)'s memory of {{MC|m=him|f=her}} transformed into a towering Tatalov. Could it be...
Praise be to "Tribios, Gate of Infinity," for you open up countless passages, bringing wandering footsteps into Harmony.
Praise be to "March 7th, Veil of Evernight," for you safeguard time for us, weaving Remembrance into stars, to be embroidered upon a boundless dress.
I'm not here to be a "Deliverer." I just want to beat Zandar and Droidhead.
Inside that world, it was the 13th, forgotten Titan, the one who listened to thirty million cycles of Cyrene's "memory."
He severed part of his neural pathways to break free from Lord Anaxagoras's control...
Exactly. His brain is the crime scene. There's no way it's spotless.
Guess he wants a final showdown. Fine, let the old Intellitron dig his own grave, just like he wants.
"A butterfly has to land on the branch before it can dance."
You said the Demiurge left a trace, right?
Huh?
Standing here brings back many memories.
The path ahead will no longer rely on emotionless programs. It'll be decided by the will of humankind.
Death and Strife are no longer feared by people, and Trickery has become the innocent games of children.
Time to go. Let's not keep Phainon waiting.
Unfortunately, our paths crossed in only one lifetime.
Since you've taken up her pen, then write, stand with us, and fight destiny with all your strength, until all is settled.
In this life, the song of Strife shall not end in a final watch over Kremnos, but rise again into a journey unending.
I am Strife, scattered across all creation, the scar that this world needs. What stands before you is merely one of countless divine bodies.
He's probably the only one who could've endured that.
"Waiting for his former 'enemies' to stand before him again."
Perhaps you remember, Lord Mydei. In that lifetime when you traveled with (Trailblazer), you once told me...
You make a good point, but we have no idea what you're saying...
Standing here, the sky feels wider than ever. It's no longer a towering wall, but a shore within reach.
Pluck the strings.
See those crystals? They carry the "{{Color|keyword|wishes of deliverance|nobold=1}}," like insects trapped in amber and resin.
"Endless darkness... that is where wishes begin."
"But with just a glimmer of light, we can illuminate this lonely world."
He'll never forget what set him on this path.
Boring.
You want us to join you as "memories"?
"Let the waves that surge within your heart cleanse the sins of the black tide, Gray Fry."
"The star-borne sea awaits your song of triumph."
She is the Demiurge, Titan of Genesis, the one destined to work miracles alongside the heroes.
You're still as confident as ever, Little Gray!
They're so scary, and so sad! Good thing Trianne's wings are amazing, or we would've been swallowed up!
So, we'll use the Century Gate to toss them somewhere no one can see.
The other half of Worldbearing...
Um... I hear something...
Compared to me, those twelve glowing, unrefined stones...
I don't need your pity.
You don't have to come up with an answer right now, child.
And... even though we've met before, it's still moving to see her "seed" bloom like this.
At last, the raging fire of "hatred" is swept away by a breeze...
Incredible. The energy in the earth's veins here... It's completely different.
"Golden light... tracing the way home..."
Of course. I haven't forgotten to hand this over to you solemnly, and to that new God of "Earth"—
The texture of the skin is rougher than I imagined, with many old scars. Lord Terravox must have been through countless difficult battles...
Please accept this flower crown, (Trailblazer).
Might it spark some new inspiration?
Heh. Oh well. Clarity of mind is important, but to spoil my dear subjects' joy in the feast would be a greater loss still.
Tch... quite the astringent bite.
The higher you stand, the easier it is for people to see you only the mantle of power, overlooking those small yet ordinary details.
Ahh... I knew all along that you just love Strife deep down, don't you? Can't even sleep a wink unless you've wrestled with monsters, huh?
But listening to their bickering takes me back to those days of Flame-Chase. On countless nights, these noisy sounds lulled us to sleep along with the campfire.
Hehehe. Enough about that. Little Polyxia, sending your dear sister to the next life was indeed genius. You surely learned from the best!
May you find peace, the first Khaslana.
Since we're fortunate enough to reunite here, this moment calls for some new stanzas to be composed. I heard that you've had some new insights, Zeno...
Watch your mouth! To you, it may be just some ratty old chair, but to me, it's the greatest little nest in the world. Besides, your junk basket isn't any better...
...Well, I don't quite understand what you were saying, but I'll take it as a compliment.
This is what we call keeping up with the times. Think about it, compared to those distant Titans, isn't a hero close to home more gimmick... *ahem* I mean, more relatable!
Ever since you two saved us from the black tide that time, my brother and I have never forgotten your immense kindness and grace.
Forget about it. You can't afford the license.

Not to stereotype, but I heard the folks from that school are all about "physically overpowering their opponents." With those two troublemakers at home, I'm worried they'll end up demolishing the house if they hang around them too long...
We just got a fresh batch of Mediterrana figs in the shop today. They're super fresh! Here, let me get some for you to try. Hey (Trailblazer), don't run off! I've got some for you too!
*hic* Talanton is so unfair, and Oronyx is even more biased. Fate threw us into the midst of strife, yet denied us the chance to join that final battle.
Heh... I wouldn't be so sure about that.
I know what I'm doing, and I know what price I'll have to pay.
Yeah yeah, that's the move! Could you show it to us one more time?

Sorry, I'm not interested. I only became a priest earlier because I needed to make ends meet during those chaotic times. Now that I don't have to worry about that anymore, I'd rather continue my studies and read more books.
And experience tells me that once a parliament is established, it's followed by opposition, treason, assassination, and war. I've seen far too much of those shenanigans in the Council of Elders.
A party? Well, count me in!
Justice must be served, and I'm ready to help!
Huh? I was just minding my own business...
How about this... Blacksoil's good, it fills you up quick! Yellowsoil's good, it cures your cravings!
What's the point of having eaten it before! Oh wait, you're...
Let me see: "Hmm..."
Oh... well, why not? How many Balance Coins?
Sure. Come diner. Chat.
Why are your baths closed?
That's all well and good, but we don't really have those conditions anymore.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
o((•ω‡= )o "Don't you dare mess with me. Just wait till my Sealmania kicks in, and you'll see a whole different seal!" )∋
o((•'ω´• )っ "What are you talking about? Don't you reward them!" )∋
o((■ω■- )o "Even the █████ mighty Lord Pie-non of the baby seal kingdom has reverted to Phainon. What reason do I have to stay in the dark?" )∋
Then we must practice even harder and win everyone's hearts with our dance, mem!
Maybe someone had been whispering into his ears, but Phainon had been thinking of... "picking out colorful clothing" again.
Since you all agree, I'll survey the site and then pick a date to start the work. By the way, Cifera, you don't wanna address me as "seamstress" from now on.
I collected this shell fossil from the seabed of Styxia many years ago, and it still retains its pristine shine despite weathering through snow and storms.
If you need a reminder to remember something, maybe it wasn't worth remembering in the first place, huh?
...Isn't this the Blazing Sun that is destined to rise?
I've heard that in the "Holy Grail War" beyond the sky, someone's deepest wish was to return to the past Aedes Elysiae.
Of course not! I saw you with Queen Gorgo and King Eurypon, and the scene was so heartwarming that I didn't want to disturb you.
If it's Phainon, he'd probably get lost in the appraisal manual. By the way, I should also get him a copy of ''How to Read the Air in Castrum Kremnos''.
Dux Lucens?
So it's most likely Ciphie?
And then, a whole bunch of '''us''' can deliver everything!
Maybe '''we''' could try teaching different classes!
Magic tricks? Oh dear, that's a tough one. '''We''' have never learned how to do magic tricks ourselves.
Rockets? Absolutely not... that's way too dangerous.
What a coincidence, I was thinking the same thing!
We shared some peaceful, beautiful moments together at Aedes Elysiae. Back then, I asked you, when you look back on these times, how will you picture me?
I kinda forgot about that.
What lies beyond the sea? We've got the answer! More sea! The vast, endless sea of stars.
I wonder what it feels like to dip your feet in the starry sea? Just kidding, I heard the universe is freezing cold!
Ooh, drama? Count me in!
As luck would have it, I also know what you're about to say...
Why are you asking me? It's about Cerces, what does it have to do with me?
Then I'll look forward to the day when you bring the story back again.
Have they been at each other's throats since they first met?
Shh, let's keep our voices down. If you're interested, I'll take you to the bookstore to peek quietly.
"Hehe, I can't wait to see the tailor girl getting headaches over our little deliverer boy's fashion sense! Meow Express, off we go!"
What about the handmade stuff from Castorice?
Look, the rainbow bridge is already hanging in the sky... Shall we get going, Little Ica?
"All shall bid farewell to one, and that person alone will..."
See you tomorrow, times a thousand.
Ah, Grayie!
In other words, she hasn't really grown up at all.
Please, add this final note to the conclusion of ''As I've Written''.
Moments after the fall of Irontomb...
Far from it. This is only the beginning...
My... "memory"?
{{Color|keyword|And at that moment of ascension, THEIR "memory" stretches through the past, becoming what people now call "Fuli."|nobold=1}}
To quiet the sorrow in my heart.
I believe that the one I cared for most...
No... I have to get you out of here first... Just hold on...!
>>> Parsing object information: 0, 9, 3...
As prophecy foretold: {{Color|keyword|"You will bear the blazing sun, until the pale dawn breaks"|nobold=1}}...
I can smell it... The scent of wheat fields.
The end of this journey back. The final gap in ∞...
Even if the boat's shadow fades quickly from sight...
Let's go home... together.
Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti.
{{Color|keyword|Back again to the first... PhiLia093...|nobold=1}}
I've told you so many times already. You're just forgetful!
It may sound heavy, right? But on this day, laughter always rises louder than tears.
I thought they were just musical notes scattered aimlessly throughout memory. But... they had already become part of this world.
This... where?
Scared... so scared...!
Big door... moving...
"Irontomb" is already powerful enough. I just need to wait.
"Cry loud, child. Let your voice reach Oronyx."
{{Color|fire|>>> Formatting complete.|nobold=1}}
Look. What a magnificent sight.
>>> Related to: Raisin.
>>> Comment: Peach = Love?
{{Color|fire|>>> Process error: Analyzing...|nobold=1}}
{{Color|fire|>>> Formatting complete.|nobold=1}}
Shh. You speak. I listen.
"If there are no new 'blank spaces,' how can a saga continue?"
Next. Cyrene. Has "blank space"?
"Not having a 'consciousness' means not having the foundations of a 'heart,' making them unable to obtain real emotions."
Yes. Right.
Easy. I can. I learn.
Ah. I got it. Is this... "blank space"!?
Also, I can tell stories. Storytelling is what makes Cyrene... Cyrene.
It's almost as if I can understand your words now. The things you say are very cute.
But it was a good light. It was bright, warm... and happy.
Love brings everything together, and it brought you and me together. So Peach and I will always be together.
{{Color|fire|>>> Formatting progress: 23.815%...|nobold=1}}
The story comes, passes, then returns. It makes us reunite, then pulls us apart again.
You think so too, right? ♪
And our stories will be lying silently among the flowers like every ripple of "Remembrance"...
But now's not the time to cry, right? We'll find the answer, just like how miracles... will eventually happen.
That name represents me and her. Every one of her.
I pity you, Zandar.
I see. So your "backup plan" requires a Scepter and the head of a Genius.
The first meeting had two attendees. After the emperor was assassinated, the second meeting had seven attendees. During the Second Great Prosperity, the third meeting had five attendees.
What a naive little girl, thinking her wishes will always come true.
I always give the same response to plans that exceed the limits of mathematical calculations.

Dr. Veritas Ratio of the Intelligentsia Guild stated that, according to the "Zandar Recurrence Theorem," Amphoreus will inevitably give rise to civilization, and its memoria content will serve as a key foundation for the evolution of that civilization.
I keep questioning myself... If the end of a nymph's life is only this inescapable void, why keep pushing the boulder uphill, crrk?
I'm ready!
Traveler who has come this far, spread your wings with me and embrace Rebirth and Dawn, buzz.
Stop playing games and give me back my spear.
Do you have any regrets about your time in Amphoreus?
Yes.
The Trickery Titan, who takes all only to give it all back, only to teach us to appreciate what we have through the pain of loss.
No.

Hehehe, of course! Bartholos has prepared some "good stuff" specially for you! Take a look, have a peek, and if you're short on money, you can always trade with Zagreus... oh, I mean the Hand of Zagreus, and things like that.
Burp~ You've gotta peel a hard-boiled egg before you eat it, and it's the same deal with treasure in a chest. O' Bartholos gotta digest it a little before it'll behave!
I feel the same. Just like during that Action Hour, when a sunshower fell on that bright afternoon...
No need to hide it, I can understand the winged beast's words. "Despite her appearance as a child, her age far exceeds that of ordinary people..."
What will become of the Twilight Courtyard...
With such peculiar materials in such quantities, let me guess... Are you crafting a strategic weapon to protect the Grove, or perhaps researching cutting-edge technology from the stars...?
Master Calypso, why not prune those overly divergent thoughts of yours, cut away the redundancies, and take another careful look?
Come on, Sophronia, repeat after me: Sun, Spindle, Flower—
What are you guys doing?
Everyone has their immature moments. That was ages ago, Futini.
Heh... It has its romantic aspects, as well as its inconveniences.
When you're wandering among those distant stars, treading your own path, should you ever feel down, raise a glass toward Amphoreus. Anytime—
Uh... some kind folks heard about my great achievements and eagerly brought these over. I tried to refuse, but they kept insisting on stuffing them in my pockets.

But as Zagreus says, every coin has two sides. Every morning when I want to sleep in, grandma comes to pull off my blanket, and when I need to go out for work at night, I have to listen to her endless nagging and reminders.
Huh? Gray Mystery, h—how could you say something so mushy!
I'm younger than you, let me go first!
Ah~! It's Little Gray!
When '''we''' say "see you tomorrow," it means not only that '''we''' hope to meet tomorrow, but also that '''we''''ll make an effort to make sure that meeting happens.
Of course! Ta-da! This is a doll that '''we''' made by hand. Adorable, isn't it?
Let's play again next time!
Aww, you're making me feel all emotional...
The stars shall sing of the Imperator's conquest.
To gain... and then to lose. To struggle... only to end up with nothing.
Are you also capable of hatching rebirth?
If it hatches one day, perhaps the new life born from within will be the first Amphorean life to truly step into the cosmos?
Alright then, today I'll be the last one standing! Who's my next challenger?
Oh, {{MC|m=Mr.|f=Miss}} (Trailblazer), please help Seneca! She was having a drinking contest with me. W—We were drinking honey brew, but she's about to hit the floor after just a few cups!
How many cups did you have, exactly?
Nonsense... I'm... not done yet... I can still drink on...
Yay!
Huh... Th—Thank you all.
...What am I supposed to do then?
...Hehe. Before that, we've got tons and tons of things waiting for us to do.
You sisters seem to get along well.
Mhm... But I grew up alone, and after going to the Sea of Souls, I've been ferrying souls back and forth by myself.
Yes... As you say, (Trailblazer). I should indeed cherish these hard-earned moments of peace.
Trianne, it was just an accident...
Ahem. Gray Mystery, you know the drill, if you see through something, keep it to yourself, got it?
But some people just can't sit still and are always looking for something fun to do. Isn't that right, Trianne, Ciphie?
Wh—What!? Ciphie?
Haha... Even a dromas couldn't stop them. There's just no dealing with them.
Great! I'll prepare some snacks and tea for Grayie, so make sure to visit often!
Hehe, what a lively bunch! Are you new companions I've never traveled with before? My appearance must have caught your eye?
Ah! So dromases can speak!? Wait, no, as the ancestor of all souls, it'd be stranger if it couldn't speak.
I thought you'd strip away the mystique of the dromases.
I hope this will help you remember that.
"Manipulated Logos" cannot take action!

"The Other Author ♪"

Holy Child of Passage

You see the exhaustion in her quiet steps through the years,
and breathe in the sorrow she hides within her tales.

"Cyrene," The ripples of past reverie
carry romantic poems back through time.
''"Hey there... buddy!"''
''"How do I begin... to write you into a story?"''

With her own hand, the ruler writes:
''"I love the world, just as it loves me!"''
Between hearty swigs, the knight murmurs under her breath,
''"I only love... eternity."''

It brings rational arithmetic to an end,
and snuffs out the flickering flames of civilization across the starry sea.

By the way, Cyrene,
I remember you once spoke of a place...
Soft and full of color,
a peaceful, beautiful place that felt like home.
Cyrene
Little Ica, You Should Eat Less

Mm-hmm, noted. The amount of honey brew that the Great Imperator can drink is about... one-tenth of what Little Ica can handle.
How insolent! When it comes to sharp words, Dux Lucens... you're every bit the equal of the Dux Brumalis.
Of course there is. My "Queen" piece, who is also a mighty general upon my chessboard.
I want a little sticker from Cinny, too.
With the Century Gate, we can deliver things instantly, no matter the distance!
What a fascinating twist of fate. You, me, and March 7th... We've all served as demigods of Time.
However, Cyrene noticed you. She didn't say anything, just blinked and gave you a smile.
What are they talking about?
Well, that's rare. Since when did Lady Goldweaver start caring about what others think?
How does it feel to have your sight back?
Is there anything you want me to remember?
You must be familiar with this item. It's the talisman made of femoral stone that the non-hearing, non-speaking girl gave me. I'd like to pass it on to you.
*voice only* "I haven't gone far yet! I can hear everything, Gray Mystery."
Sure, I'll adjust the heat to your taste.
Start decorating.
"It's you who healed the sky."
Yeah, teacher. Maybe I should...
Maybe start with a few basic books first to get your feet wet.
I left it out of the story because it involved a "choice"... A choice I made for my own, selfish reasons.
I wrote everything about it on this little card. If you can find it in your heart to forgive me after reading it...
I've finally found you, Cyrene... Demiurge.
The first toll of the death knell for the cosmos.
Yes. Even if the figure was hazy, I knew right away: That was the god from "Cyrene's" dreams.
{{Color|keyword|Just like the Aeon of Remembrance, a being made entirely of memories.|nobold=1}}
Then I will not leave these circuit boards either, crrk!
It's alright. I'll wait here for you.

That is why THEY feel so distant, so cold. That crystalline form is just an empty shell. I do not know how the Garden of Recollection managed to hide this until now. They must have their reasons. But none of that matters now.
It was my "future."
The first: Follow the trail of "memory" you have forged, break free from this world, and reach for the stars.
Let the ripples of causality spread...
Such a splendid memory...
Look back to the "moment we first met."
Remember the "bow and arrows."
But now, I finally understand...
And he would guard that fragile light, until it turned into a blazing sun.
Now... your eyes have seen through all of Amphoreus, from the end back to the beginning.
It leads to the place we both call {{Rubi|home|Aedes Elysiae}}.
Come on. Let's go home together.
Somewhere warm...
Peach... where are you?
I always do have my charm.
...Piso. I always remember. Hmph.
So "Cyrene"... was just a pen name after all...
And... my name...
You think so too, right? ♪
Then, we'll add "one." A "one" like none that has come before, a "one" that blazes new trails ♪
I guessed as much... It's no longer working. Looks like it's just the two of us out here now.
Someone... behind the door?
{{Color|keyword|The "unknown" is right in front of us, so we only have one choice: "Solve" it.|nobold=1}}
That'd make the most sense. Why was the room empty? Because the person locked in there had run away ages ago.
Which also means there's a high chance that their powers are minuscule and cannot alter the outcome of the battle at all.
The Titans also gave their blessings: {{Color|keyword|"You shall fade when the flowers bloom, for every ending begets a beginning."|nobold=1}}
"But the name 'Aedes Elysiae' came from the unpleasant sorrows of the gods..."
>>> Record: Peach. Is on the ground.
>>> Conclusion: Progress, bad.
Just an overly naive dream?
>>> Peach. Scared.
I'm actually really lucky, you know? During the long years I've spent waiting for the "Deliverer," I've always had you here as an audience.
"Just as the ballad blown on the breeze says: Losses are a constant on the Flame-Chase journey."
Hi. Miss, me, yet?♪
Hehe, but it's fine. I can learn. Right! Query: "Cyrene ♪"
Only "lament," the first emotion that fought against the pain of separation, could stall the Destruction's steps...
Then, it would catch up to that journey where all is lost, carefully picking out stories and writing them down in trepidation.
{{Color|keyword|That genuine shiver... That's the "mover of life."|nobold=1}}
In that case, I want to make a promise. I want to gift my pen, my book, and my name to you.
There may be a way to stand up against Irontomb.
The world has never been so quiet. It's so good... It's as if I can hear the sound of my heart beating.
Remember this moment, (Trailblazer).
{{Color|keyword|We don't interfere with each other's research topics.|nobold=1}}
Dangerous. Oppressive. Chaotic...
PhiLia093 persevered for thirty million cycles and tirelessly gave the Demiurge "memories" of Amphoreus...

Meanwhile, Dan Heng warped back to the Express via a spirit warp jump, only to discover a Memosnatcher invasion. Everyone then realized that the Remembrance's forces had already permeated Amphoreus and blocked outside intervention... To establish contact with me, Dan Heng was determined to return to Amphoreus immediately.

In a joint operation spearheaded by the Interastral Peace Corporation and supported by the Astral Express, Xianzhou Alliance, Genius Society, and numerous other forces, the civilizations of the universe have achieved a decisive victory over the Destruction.

Together, we stand united. As the firm pillar supporting civilized society, the IPC is committed to advancing operations against the Antimatter Legion. Stay tuned for ongoing coverage. We wish for good news ahead.
Previously ravaged in the fight against the Legion, the planet underwent reconstruction, during which massive reserves of antimatter crystal ore were identified underground.
We encourage all citizens of the cosmos to come forward with any information. This station will issue additional rewards to those who provide useful leads.
No, no, no, a mechanical insect turning into light... that means it's exploded! Crrk!
Oh shoot oh dang, I can't go back, crrk... I wonder how my brother is...
Oh, passing traveler, you cannot imagine how troubled I am, buzz~ I spend every day counting these gold coins, day after day, night after night, and I can never finish...
I'm really stuck between a rock and a hard place here, crrk...
{{Size|28|"Memory of Chais"!}}
Be careful, don't fall, eep~
As they did in this eon, and thirty million times over, buzz.
Now that we've come this far, cast aside your fears. We shall meet again in a brand new future, crrk.
Hehehe, look this way, over here. I heard you can get out of Amphoreus through here... is that true?
Will we be pushing Seliose too hard...?
I'm grateful for that. Because only as a human can one keep changing and growing. Different people will remember different aspects of me.
Pomegranate juice grilled Dulu bird cutlets! I just can't forget that taste!
The survival of Kremnos... may not be worth more than the fate of the world. In my past life, I made too many mistakes, whether it was poisoning you, or casting Mydeimos into the Sea of Souls...
Time to charge into battle with a kitchen knife.
If you ask me, those arrogant bigwigs definitely need to be taught a lesson. You don't know this, little grape, but back in my day...
Heh heh heh...
What is this, a restaurant menu?
But only until tomorrow will we know what kind of flowers will bloom and what kind of fruits will bear from the "seeds" we planted in the past.
These answers and meanings can only be found as we keep moving forward toward tomorrow!
What a peaceful garden this is! No swords, no flames... Are the laws of this new world really so merciful?
Of course. After all, I'm here to conquer the seas of stars.
Of course not, mom recognized you at first glance. Still the same scatterbrained kid who just barrels ahead without thinking!

Because... Chirara wants to hear Lord Terravox and Lord "Mountainbreaker" tell stories about their past battles! I heard that back then, the dromases were fierce warriors. It's not just little chimeras like me, even the Mountain Dwellers had to be wary of their temper!
*Fierce growl* Grumph~
Yo! Take it easy there! But yeah, those were some seriously blood-pumping memories!
Haha, it's rare to find someone who is still interested in the history of Earth's descendants.
Hey, old friend, what's {{MC|m=he|f=she}} getting at?
This is a good thing. Haven't you and I always talked about what would happen after the war? Now that it's here, I find myself unprepared...
Yeah, I once had the honor of playing a game with the Imperator. She is indeed a woman with impressive foresight and intricate strategies.
Ah... putting my hair... up in a bun? I haven't tried that before.
Oh, my dear sister also loves to doll up. She's someone who takes pride in her appearance, and decorates her hair with fresh flowers every day.
But now, everything is different.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Well... here's what happened. Trianne wanted a rocket to soar higher and farther!
Trianne, make sure to dodge next time!
Combine the two, you mean...
Grayie, consultation hours are over! Let me see, next on the schedule is... Ah, afternoon tea time!
Huh? Gray Mystery, h—how could you say something so mushy!
Ah... It's Lord Terravox, the legendary "ancestor of the dromases."
I've done all those things you mentioned, too.
