When arduous years dissolve behind us and become shooting stars falling toward the unknown,
How shall we leave behind a musical note, a sentence?
How shall we remember a seed, a flower?
Perhaps, we only need to softly hum a melody as we walk toward the future. There is no need to wait in anguish.
For where she was born, people pronounce "first encounter" as "reunion."
Head to the room
Don't worry, we have allies.
I heard from Clara that she was using Diggertron to help with mining, but the power was too much, and she fell and broke her leg. I'm afraid... she won't be able to take interstellar flights anymore.
Wowza~ Legends, galaxies, giant monsters... so cool!
Hehe... I admit I was just playing around earlier. She just wanted to see you. Children are all like that.
Feels like you're treating this like a fairy tale...
The story says Amphoreus had six moons. Guess they didn't need to turn on the lights at night, huh?

Besides, the Alliance has been fighting battles everywhere in recent years, and there's been plenty of tales about their valor and victories. The word "hero" already carries weight in people's hearts.
Just another Trailblaze.

*sigh* This is so...
All we can do is put it on the shelf. Whether it survives the competition... there are too many uncertainties...
The vintage dial phone stares at you, occasionally rolling its eyeballs like an owl.
As you know, nothing is taken seriously in Penacony. Even heroes' tales of blood and tears are just casual gossip over dinner.
You remember Clockie, Brother Hanu, Miss Note... they were all living legends once. If ''As I've Written'' gets passed down in the same mocking way, is that really what you want?
Haven't you heard the Interastral Peace Broadcast? Irontomb was really defeated, and the seeds of civilization have sprouted in the universe.
The researchers are still as busy as ever. Yep, this is the space station I know.
It shall be named {{Color|keyword|"Amphoreology"!|nobold=1}}
Calm down, Jackson. Your risk of respiratory alkalosis is reaching critical levels. Calm down!
Let's wait for Himeko and Mr. Yang to come back before we do a full debrief. You should rest for now, (Trailblazer), you look tired.
Did this really happen to Lord Phainon...
Regarding ''As I've Written'', I will do my utmost, and won't let these heroic deeds be buried by the stars.
Though people are still somewhat wary around me, curious children are now willing to hold my hand as they go and watch butterflies resting among the flowers.
If I must name something regretful, it would be our encounter. Meetings and partings are part and parcel of life, and you must always venture forth toward more distant stars...
Wanna chat about the lands beyond the sky?

In that instant when you broke through space-time with the Trailblaze, carrying all the world's memories back to reality...
"Oh no! Passenger March is sleepwalking!"
S-sleepwalking?! Oh no, oh no, I don't want to make a fool of myself in front of everyone...
You stay here while I go check things out.

Whoever volunteers first is the Marshal's pick. If you have to ask, I'd say this outcome plays right into Jing Yuan's hands.
With the Deca-Light Reflection Barrier, the Yuque must understand even more than the Luofu how significant this battle is.
Come on, how hard is it to understand the word "uncertainty"?
...The flow of memoria is so heavy here.

All beings living ordinary and peaceful lives within the net woven by Romance and Passage.

Oh right... I'm writing a collection of poems about you and the heroes, so your deeds can be passed down through the ages... For the prologue's inscription, I was thinking of asking Master Hesiod to compose it. What do you think?

Tsk... you bought more? Didn't you just get three sets of glazed figurines last week? Lucky for you, your boy Akmonides rakes in the cash, or nobody could afford to keep up with your shopaholic old self.
Got yourself in trouble?

Don't fight me over this, buddy!

Haha... This is a golden opportunity!
The real deal! In the flesh!

Once upon a time, there was a "flawless" crystal flower that sparkled with light, like Peach's every story.
But it looked, and looked... only to find the crystal flower flawless. Round and round they went, seeing only their own reflection.
But should a flower like this be called "love"?

It happened because the flower was no longer pure. The fall was not an accident. It was the flower declaring rebellion against fate, and writing the ending of the story with the flower's own shattering.
{{Color|keyword|Then, the little fairy will see that each shard on the ground holds the reflection of their eyes.|nobold=1}}

I want to be the happiest unemployed person ever. Let the Twilight Courtyard return to normal and become everyone's afternoon tea salon!

This is the simple happiness we've been longing for during our battles...

Little Ciphy, let's try it right away! And thanks to you too, Cinny!
Sure, the Century Gate is convenient and all, but sitting on a rocket with the wind whooshing past your ears, now that's a whole different experience!
Is there anything you want me to remember?

What's wrong with fairy tales? That story contains defiance, courage, and love. Exactly the qualities children should learn.
You're in charge of military supplies, must've been pretty busy lately, huh?
But no matter what, it left you with a memory, didn't it?
Whether foxians, the Celestials, or the Vidyadhara, they all possess lifespans far beyond those of short-life species. One of the downsides is that it's not easy to forget.

Yet today we shall not speak of the Psychopomp of Aidonia, but of "Mydeimos, the Backlit Spirit Warden," and bears the byname Mydei. The name Mydei that signifies "a foe that no multitude could withstand," as well as "a foe whom none among ten thousand could overcome!"

Today we shall not speak of Mydeimos, the Backlit Spirit Warden, nor of Phainon, the Flame-Chasing Harbinger of Light. We speak only of the Twelve Golden Immortals who struck against the Archlord, and what a battle it was! Heaven and earth quaked, the struggle was fierce and unyielding!
Alright, alright!

As the tale left off, under the call of the successor to the Cloudstrider, the IPC, the Geniuses, the Tuners, and even the great army of the Cloud Knights all gathered for this campaign, vowing to utterly annihilate the great foe.

In the stories you will write, perhaps it'll be inevitable that there are still sorrows and tears that are destined to fall.
I am... The first Nouspore. Amphoreus's Heart. The Demiurge.
There's still time to surrender, you know? You really don't need to burn all the bridges. We're all geniuses here. Don't make everyone lose face at the end.
The view's pretty good here. All yours, Screwy.
You know what I think about this, Herta. Whether it succeeds or fails, your plan plays right into the Destruction's hands.
Can't you see what's going on, Screwllum? Her chances may be small, but it's not zero.
That's funny! That's real funny! You madwoman! That's like watching you tap-dance on Polka's spotless white sheets right after she's washed them!
I knew it. Another genius who confuses cause with effect. What do you think about this, "Lord of Silence"?
Of course I do. There'll even be two copies of the verdict. One that I wrote myself, and another one coming from you.
Now that our positions are clear, it's time for this boring meeting to end. Good luck, little girl.
Calculation results: Your backup plan... has a success rate infinitesimally close to zero.

As I bid farewell to Hysilens at the Vortex of Genesis, I noticed something strange about the "Time" Coreflame, and was immediately dragged into the memoria tide of "Oblivion" by "Evernight"... She was once the hidden power that March manifested by sacrificing all of her memories, yet now she harbors other secret intentions in her heart.

In the Grove, where memories became disjointed, Dan Heng received help from "Dan Feng" within his memories and completed his farewell to the past. In their final moments, the "Earth" demigod Terravox entrusted all their duty and authority to Dan Heng. With this newfound strength, Dan Heng found me within the memoria tide.

When all seemed lost, "Evernight" was captured by March's Camera and trapped within the memory maze of Aedes Elysiae. After several lengthy conversations, March and "Evernight" reached an agreement... "Evernight" returned March's memories, and March finally returned to our side.

With its reach spanning the cosmos, "Irontomb" delivered devastating blows to countless worlds. In response to this catastrophe, the Interastral Peace Corporation took decisive action, overseeing the restoration of all affected planets.
The head of the mining site reported receiving an anonymous warning prior to the attack. Currently, excavation has been halted due to a network outage.
Goodbye.
Can someone plug this fan's power cable back in, crrk!
First time in this massive space, huh? Quite a shock, crrk?
Just let me stay in this prison of love!
I will strike in mechanical form.
If I take this step next, what will you do?
Can't spend it all... I'll never spend it all!
So, what's going on?
Heheh... Excellent, excellent. As ancestor Zagreus used to say, "Regret is proof that you ever loved."
Heheh, remember another one of ancestor Zagreus's famous sayings? "Theft is but retrieving what belonged to you in the first place."

It's wonderful that Lady Seliose has such thoughts and aspirations. However, it is no easy feat to become a doctor. You'll need to master entire manuals' worth of knowledge and learn to handle all sorts of situations.
Great! I'll prepare some snacks and tea for Grayie, so make sure to visit often!
...No, child of humanity. Let me put it this way. How would a Kremnoan feel if they saw their meticulously forged blade being used by a cook to mince meat?
Now, try to put yourself in my shoes. My sister can call me "baby," but no one else can.
Stay thy tongue! I confess my fault, now prithee, grant me clemency.
A boring world without strife...
These days, the world is full of creatures that should have gone extinct, which has greatly enriched our ingredients. It's quite fascinating for anyone passionate about cooking.
I need to eat! Food!
But well... I can assure you, my heroic deeds are well-documented. Now, which story should I start with?
Because there are so many of '''us''', the three of '''us''' have been waiting for a very long time.
Hey. Patience, Little Gray. Miss Tribbie hasn't finished reading yet.
The Holy Maiden really loved my cookies... but later I got worried about cavities, so I secretly hid them away.
Aren't you going to chat with them?
Maybe they're waiting for you to join them.
You know what? I wasn't born with golden blood. Like a king's authority, I seized it with these hands.
I've used every means at my disposal and earned the name of tyrant. That was because to root out injustice, this was the only path forward.
I hereby grant you permission to carry this title across the stars. This privilege holds equal authority on all other planets.
Phainon... you... you've grown taller.
Haha... It's been so long. You almost didn't recognize me, did you?
Is our Deliverer blushing?
I can vouch for that! You bring him up several times a day. You even said when Phainon comes back... you'll make him tell you all about his adventures from these past years!
Yeah, I've got you and all our buddies.
As luck would have it, Chartonus made a batch of replicas while forging it. I'll let you keep this one as a memento, partner.
Hmm. Looking forward to meeting you again... partner.
Old friend, hearing you talk about these things brings me back to the days when we fought side by side. But now, Amphoreus has no need for war anymore!
Grumph~ Thank you all for protecting my wishes too. We watch over yesterday to walk toward tomorrow together.
Back then, Phagousa buried them in the seabed because she wanted to share them with her descendants after the black tide had receded. Aren't they perfect for a celebration now?
Don't worry. After this feast ends, we'll be off to another one, won't we?
Little Polyxia, I... I don't do it every day...
I wish I could change my hairstyle too.
Ah, Lady Amunet!?
So, what's bothering you all?
Little Gray saw right through '''us'''! We spent a long time deciding what gift to pick.
Next time, please call me that only when my students aren't around.
Terravox? The greatest creation of Georios, the unseen ruler of the earth through the ages... so it was you...
He's way too into it.
May you and the dromas be happy together!
Under the effect of increased "Hatred," Maximum Restorable HP and Maximum Recoverable Skill Points are reduced!

The physician who bears a love for mortals
wishes for you to look up and behold the rainbow's light.

Along light's final journey to the edge of the universe,
the stars fade into silence,
their wreckage settling, cooling,
into uniform, still, and pristine dust.

The seed will grow and grow,
until it becomes a great tree, crowned with a thousand flowers.

This Ode, to All Lives
Recent Experience
Archer's Action #1
Not a bad idea. However, any publication on the Interastral Network must go through the IPC's channels. I'm not sure how they'd feel about this.
One way or another, they can be persuaded.

Thanks to our experience in Jarilo-VI, we were able to close this deal. Rather than focusing on short-term gains, establishing a model of "Preservation" will be more beneficial for long-term development.
It's been a while, (Trailblazer). I heard you were coming, so I invited Seele as well.
Oh right, (Trailblazer). I've got something to ask you. Come with me later.
Honorary member! Finally, you're here! My legs are going numb...
She wants to hear your fresh stories from beyond the sky, so she won't have any regrets.
Hook sprang up from the bed with a "whoosh" and dashed away in a flash.
Well written indeed. This makes me the first owner of your exclusively signed copy.
But they had no Sun, only something called the "Dawn Device" mounted on the back of the tallest Engine of Creation.
But... can we really take an interstellar flight to Amphoreus like Boss Hook?
*sigh*... I really, really wish I could grow up faster!
Haha, I couldn't snag another volume of ''As I've Written'' today either. Guess I still didn't show up early enough!
In that case, let's take turns reading it. But hey, no doodling or scribbling in the book, alright?
Yep, I'm super lucky!

Yet, alas, after all has been said and done about the endless cycle, all that remained was but a flash across the cosmos, thousands upon thousands of memories dissolving into a single page of story. Amphoreus returned then to its origin.

That sky-shrouding giant tree, the suspended peak of Kremnos, the hero's bath flowing with golden blood... One day, this splendid vision shall reappear in the universe. But, though our lifespans be long, I fear it shall be left for later generations to behold.
(sigh)
Let the young folks keep stirring things up. Who knows? Maybe they will actually change the universe one day.
That's what you call a classic formula. People keep coming back for more, and that's why this theme never gets old.
Right. Let's send the damaged ships to Pier Point and have the IPC foot the bill...
At last, your journey of sowing has reached its end, and you return to the Astral Express...
Does that mean there could be planets completely filled with dromases?
How many moons does Amphoreus have?
Shh, just listen and you'll find out!
Who do you think is stronger, Lord Phainon or General Jing Yuan?
These days, the world is full of animals that previously went extinct, which has greatly enriched our ingredient inventory. It's quite a fascinating world for anyone who enjoys cooking.
When you're wandering among those distant stars, treading your own path, should you ever feel down, raise a glass toward Amphoreus. Anytime—
Without the help of the Fruit of Time, the ship of Remembrance cannot sail far... I can only return later.
Hmm... There is a weaver who is gazing up high. The golden thread brings tidings: They're {{Color|keyword|on the elevated platform|nobold=1}}, marveling at your flying speed.
In this world woven from emotions and thoughts, only the {{Color|keyword|Memory Crystal Shards|nobold=1}} can guide our way forward.
The Garmentmaker refines the Memory Crystal Shards with a relieved expression.
Hmm... There is a weaver of exceptional wisdom. The golden thread brings tidings: They're admiring their own brilliance in front of a {{Color|keyword|densely scribbled blackboard|nobold=1}}.
"In the myths written of heroes, there lies a path to the Exomyth. When three beams of light converge, the rift shall open to their radiance."
Exchange for the "Fruit of Time."
You actually managed to bring it out?
Such beautiful radiance... It's like a crack in the world itself. Even I want to dive right into it...

"Endless slaughter... all for nothing."
But even so, the drop of blood wrung from his wrath has guided us here.
In other words, it's time for the decisive battle.
That's the spirit. Remember to keep at it. You lot are the vanguards of this battle. Everyone's watching.
"Irontomb" now trembles in "Phainon's" chest. With this empty body, I have become its perfect vessel...
Finally. The end of this journey.
That Theoros's promise still turned out to be such a narrow road. Pity.
Perhaps... There's still another way...
Irontomb's "body"... has descended.
"With just a glimmer of light, we can illuminate this chaos..."
The "Fourth Instant" of the cosmos... is the coronation of Irontomb!
A blessing worthy of rewards. The Law will complete its campaign.
...Was probably also when the Scepter devoured thirty million cycles of Destruction.
No need to remind me. You are always in my mind.
And the final end, right?
"(Trailblazer)... You're... finally awake."
Cyrene...
After all, I am the best Nameless.
That way, it won't just be your memories alone.
Of course I will...
I... won't give up.
"That is the cosmos's fourth kind of 'Finality': the Remembrance."
"So, aren't you curious? We kept these stories to ourselves because we believed we had a long future ahead of us."
"The prophecy has arrived. Amphoreus will fly into the starry skies!"
Together... We will...
Tread on the Path of Remembrance!
But while THEY gazed at me, I was able to collect all the "memories" stained by the Destruction and write down this eternal page.
And now, we will use this tranquility to cleanse Irontomb's rage.
It's because everyone has been gently adding to the story you left behind.
That's so heartwarming!
The question imposed by the gods will be solved by the children of humanity.
{{Color|keyword|And overwrite Irontomb's Destruction equation, washing it away into a "blank space."|nobold=1}}
"I" shall compose four hundred million sagas—
Yes. Another failure.
I still remember the terror of witnessing a single gaze crushing the entire world.
{{Color|keyword|Fuli|nobold=1}}, the key variable, still hasn't made THEIR move.
And offer flowers of {{Rubi|Adlivun|Destruction}}.
(...Nobody's here?)
W—wait! Please! This isn't what you think...
Where are my companions? Did you kidnap them?
Hehe... They were so enthusiastic. I didn't have the heart to stop them.
Did you also wake up from total chaos? I'm afraid none of us here has the answer to that question...
...Have another drink, Mydeimos.
Those three have been chatting over there for quite a while now.
Speaking of origins, Kremnos was the first Amphorean city-state to establish the Council of Elders system, but we stopped iterating on it around the year 3000 of the Light Calendar.
I... promise you.
Can we have another journey together, partner?
It's nothing, Lady Tribios. I just... finally realized something...
{{Color|keyword|"If your heart still has room to spare, share a bit of gentleness and softly cherish all the beautiful things around you."|nobold=1}}

A finely stitched doll made of silk, twine, and cotton, with an added pinch of a child's heartfelt devotion.

''"Look, now there's a full set of '''us'''."''

A replica of Dawnmaker forged by the Grand Craftsman, scaled down to the perfect size for a keychain.

''"Do not use as a can opener."''

A dromas egg. It might hatch very soon — "very soon" by a dromas's standard of time, that is.

''"Grumph... (Wobbles~)"''
Recollection Crystal Shard
Or is there something else on your mind that you're just desperate to get out?
Your explanation isn't any clearer than Lady Fu's.
Nah, just kidding! I've already checked the agreement box for everyone. And now, destination: Amphoreus!
And Mr. Sunday, you probably shouldn't show yourself either.
The Ten Stonehearts shall spare no effort for such a grand mission for the Preservation.
Miss Robin, I'm beyond moved by your spirit of self-sacrifice. The Astral Express would also like to make a promise that we won't leave any companion behind.
We're through! I can see the video feed. Everything's working perfectly!
We've already heard from Miss Topaz about the Irontomb operation. She made a special trip to deliver the vaccine to Belobog.
Pardon my frankness, Mr. Yang, but this reminds me of some unsettling rumors about the Harmony. Complete silence...
The environmental readings are all wrong. Conclusion: this must be what the "kernel" actually looks like in the real world.
Oh? A classic nuclear heat engine? Classy choice.
Irontomb never stops, it is evolving faster than any of our worst projections.
He wanted to turn the neuron of the Erudition into a relay for the Destruction. That meant getting rid of all of it at all costs.
So we have to assume that both are true. And if that's the case, then the "contradiction" leads us to—
Then again, "never doubt a dead man's resolve." So, how's our dearly departed doing?
The coordinates are accurate. Zandar is still here.
We're back.
The Chronocognitive Anchor can't get a fix because at the system level, "Lygus" no longer exists. Our navigation target is... a "null set".
I'm picking up multiple independent signals, with the same data structure as the barrier.
It's a world we must protect.
I wonder what the real Astral Express feels like. Hopefully not this... bumpy.
Dust and sand in the air, and crumbling ruins all around.
I've been waiting for you, heroes from beyond the sky.
I am Mydeimos, the Lance of Fury. I trade a thousand scars and a hundred lives of mine...
I see... So this is how he trapped Irontomb to buy time for the world outside.
"And then, live as a human..."
The golden blood has not faded. We... should respond in kind.
Exactly. Alright, gather yourselves. It's time for a pop quiz.
His very first wish was simply to become his village's little hero...
I believe... ''As I've Written'' is but one medium. The Remembrance has countless ways of capturing time.
She is not the Cyrene '''we''' remember...
That {{Rubi|god|Nous}} created us, and then cast us aside. Shouldn't they be punished for that?
His inner struggle, and the Destruction breaking through... They're rising to the surface.
Whoa...
Others may call them "masterpieces." But only I know how many regrets they truly hold.
This vessel is merely an avatar made to contain the {{Rubi|First Genius|Zandar}}'s "paranoia."
What are you talking about...?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Snowy.
But I can't sleep.
Take our hands, and come with us.
I missed you, Lady Tribbie.
'''We''' miss you too, (Trailblazer)!
It's all right. I'll wait for you. We all will.
"Sorry, force of habit."
The Time Titan is someone else...
"Only one who treats the world as their teacher... can bear its eventual destiny."
Such is the primal wisdom the dromases have bestowed upon us.
What do you think of Anaxa's love for dromases?
I hope it brings you back safely, too.
Aww, is your "Reason" fragment still wandering out there? Need me to go find it for you?
The fissure flickers in the void, spilling chills and heat in shifting waves of amplitude.
The waves pulse against your footing, like a heartbeat climbing from lightless depths.
Whoa! This is explosive stuff! Now that's what I call book material! My dear apprentice, I'll treat you to something nice later!
Cte-si-pho-na—
I'm sorry!!! Just kidding, please don't tell my brother! Ahem... Say, (Trailblazer), I was actually thinking of writing a novel with you as the main character...
Long time no see, (Trailblazer)! I've got some great news — the next "Okeanas Games" will be held in the middle of {{Rubi|the Month of Balance|February}}, and I've saved you a front-row seat!
Yeah, yeah, yeah. We bros promise to lead the cheers for you when the time comes, and our great hero (Trailblazer) will be there too, right?
Love it, keep going, tell me more.
Alright, I'll get right on it!
Since we're meeting here, I take it that the great battle is already over?
Well, that was unexpected. I thought it would take way longer.
Alright, kids, stand up straight and answer me: Why do you want to become warriors?
Well now, you really know how to keep up your end of a conversation.

So you two know each other, too? That makes a party even more necessary! Just leave it to us sisters. We'll keep the music playing, the dancing going, and the ambrosia flowing until everyone's had their fill of fun!

Hello there, my friend! What a pleasant surprise seeing you here! Even Zagreus must be smiling on our continued acquaintance! Something interesting is happening right now. Why not stick around for the show? It'll only cost you 50 Balance Coins~
Exactly! Finally someone who actually understand the laws I uphold. For this, Mr. Soctires and I shall be friends for the ages — literally!
I appreciate the kind words, friend! With the apocalypse behind us, I'm on the lookout for fresh amusements...
Ask the dromases what they like?
Do people actually eat dirt?
The bound edition comes with new illustrations.
Congrats. And then...?
I didn't mean to. I... I had no choice and somehow *accidentally* stepped into the Chrysos Heir's bath.
Keep at it, and you'll be the hottest beefcake around!
I know every fairy has a burning curiosity about the unknown, but entering that deep Forest is strictly forbidden. It's a permanent ban in Membrance Maze!
After crossing the border, follow the stream, and you'll reach a vast, flat plain. When night falls, there are always these glowing green dots dancing around, just like stars!
Chief, what's got you so lost in thought?
Stop being such a tryhard...
What's with that Dark Seal?
o((■ω■- )o "I feel so peaceful and fulfilled inside... I just want to turn over a new leaf and be a seal of spiritual health."
Awoo-woo! It's my time to shine! I don't mind beating you all again!
You win. Years later, people will still remember the 33,550,338th Eternal Recurrence of Amphoreus, and those baby seals who birthed the desire for "Destruction."
o((♥ω♥¯)o "I love you too! Here's a seal hug!" )∋
"New challenges" meaning...
You'll be a shareholder!
Something worth remembering... Little Gray Fry, do you plan to take it to the sea beyond the sky? That works too...
Back then, my mind was filled with everyone else's wishes, while my own wish remained a complete blank. I just wanted to turn back the hands of destiny... to prevent what had yet to happen.
Oh? Then be a dear, Dux Lucens, and take it off for me.
Judging by the handwriting, it's not Lady Aglaea or Lady Tribbie. Hmm, and it shouldn't be Cassie or Mydei! They've never formally met the Great Imperator.
The way Dux Lucens closes the emotional distance without causing offense... It is, in its own way, a unique talent of hers...
About that book, can I be honest now? What a complete mess. What on earth was that nonsense even about?
Huh. This wax seal... why does it have a grid-like reflective effect? When you look at it under the starlight...
...while satisfying her urge to pull a few mischievous pranks.
Perfect, let's have Master Mydei do the cooking.
{{Color|keyword|"Look up at the sky more often and smile more. Many stubborn ailments fear optimism, but it's the best medicine!"|nobold=1}}
Hahaha... I see. You know what? Just go wild with it! No one's gonna judge you.
Aren't you... Going to say something?
Still, is something weighing on you?
The Fourth Instant, this turning point in cosmic destiny, anchored by the Erudition... {{Color|keyword|It's not a single instant, but a process, a chain of events.|nobold=1}}
So it is the opposite of the Erudition... One calculates what is to come, and the other holds on to what came before.
And those who might become Fuli all share the same characteristics...
So, help us. Find where Amphoreus's "memory" began... and bring it out.
Then, before Oronyx's altar...
So that's how it happened. My skill with the bow, I owe it all to March.
Then this isolated star system must have been home to at least three beings comparable to Emanators.
I would even go as far as to say Aeons THEMSELVES.
Miss Evernight once said that the Remembrance wasn't looking after Amphoreus, but rather scheming and preparing to devour the Paths...
Her deduction was perfectly logical... but she failed to account for what the "humans" in this story could achieve.
{{Color|keyword|The "{{Rubi|ego|EGO}}."|nobold=1}}
He would hold on and keep going.
Take this wish with you... Be the hero who begins the mission of Deliverance...
{{Color|keyword|Continue onward... bearing this world upon your shoulders... until the ashen hero... the nameless Deliverer ushers in the dawn...|nobold=1}}
There's no way we would let something like that happen, right?

May the river of time flow backward, bringing scenes of the future before our gaze. In The Eternal Land that no one remembers, the {{Rubi|legend of the Trailblaze|Flame-Chase Journey}} is about to begin.
Let the ripples of causality spread...
Is it... all over now?
"We have plenty of time."
Under the same sky, across eight phases of the moon, thirteen heroes composed an epic together...
"Agreed."

Later, when the people who know this story gaze upon the cosmos, they will discover that the countless stars in the sky now glow pink. And after thirteen seconds, that radiant light will quietly fade away.
It will be a romantic story like none that has come before.
Ahem...
The first ripple was where it all began for me. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven...
A simple... but beautiful melody.
...My... belated... greetings.
Unfortunately for you, the answer is all but revealed regarding who the Demiurge is.
Anyway, I don't like tears.
"The Hero's Journey crosses through the long night, through tears and laughter, and once again heads towards tomorrow..."
...And it looks like it'll also be the last.
Thank you... I'm sorry for making you see this embarrassing side of me.
Ah! Lemme tell you the story of the "Membrance Maze": A group of cute little friends live in Aedes Elysiae's forests. Their names can be connected into a song...
I'm here. Don't be scared.
"What could be behind this door? Glittering crystals? Or a beautiful world I've never seen before?"
"Wah... Waa..."
Okay. Then, I'll probably make a small adjustment to suit my tastes.
"'Lament' was the factor closest to this form of behavior. Perhaps that was why she was chosen."
Sometimes, it's loneliness and unease. It's knowing that this world is not gentle, yet wanting to be seen in a more beautiful form by the world.
It's so unreasonable, isn't it? Yet when "hatred" drove everything apart and "love" did not yet exist in this world...
Someone once told the very first "me" that everything was false, that the only life in Amphoreus was a great catastrophe nurtured using the world as a factor.
In the poem offered to you, every "Cyrene" would write down a beautiful new world with stars and flowers.

Please take them as a beautiful blessing from me. I gave myself the pen name "Cyrene" the first time I wrote a poem. I want my words to be like pebbles falling into a pond, dropped from the past to send ripples into the future.
Either way, could you please let me do something I want? Just this once? I want...
The last thing "Zandar" wants to see is an event that gives us a chance of winning: For the two halves to rejoin and for the Scepter to become complete again. Then...
What a pity. When the truth surfaced, I knew at once that the Demiurge was far too feeble to ever alter the result of the experiment.
{{Color|keyword|When thirty million cycles of "hatred" and "lament" are joined as one, what wondrous creation will arise?|nobold=1}}
I don't need your pity.
...That's excellent.
Anyone with eyes can see that.
I am glad, Herta. We ended up on the same page.
Then, to celebrate us coming to a fundamental agreement, I will prepare a stage for your performance.
But you'll also become the "Perfect Scholar"...
This is the Interastral Peace Broadcast. Good evening everyone.
Let's take a closer look at the details.
N—Not just me, but my circuit boards as well, yes, yes... please save them all!
The nymph stands motionless next to a circular ring, like a toll collector on an interstellar highway.
Look! What a majestic giant sword! It has become one with this ancient tree. It must be the key to opening this!
It's not like I can't pull it out. I just want to let it settle a bit more, crrk!
I'm still here just to tell you one earth-shattering secret... This path leads to a total dead end, eep!
Oh no, how could you break my lion's mouth mask!
Did you know? Through the fissures torn in this world, the voices of the dead will be recorded here... including those Flame-Chase heroes.
Embrace... new life...
Well, have fun, then.
Hehehe, my dear friend, by the {{Rubi|gods beyond the sky|Aeons}}, I, Bartholos, send you my most noble greetings!
Want my Coin of Whimsy?
"If you run into trouble again, just give a shout: 'Help me, Bartholos!'"
The purple stomach pouch engulfs you...
How should I put this... It feels a little awkward...
Just as we add titles like "Professor" or "Teacher" before someone's name, conversations can be built on the premise of "talking to a scholar." Subtle, yet effective.
So, if someone addresses me as "Anaxagoras," then the conversation is likely to be meaningful. After all, they're someone who can be considerate of your feelings and make compromises accordingly.
Nothing can grant you wisdom except readables and lessons.
S—Sun... spindle... f—fawer...
...This word is pronounced as "flower." Don't let this {{MC|m=Big Brother|f=Big Sister}} lead you astray.
How comforting it is to share a bright and melodious world with those we cherish.
Futini and Hysilens remember my spoiled and willful side, the Chrysos Heirs and citizens witness my calm and composed side, while Sophronia and my master can see my gentle side.
There is no word for "suffering" in the Kremnoan language.
It's not in the recipe book, either.
Ahem, you once said... "Gorgo and I fell in love amidst the blood-soaked dust of the arena..."
...Gorgo, you know, in every life, I've always wanted to be a worthy king... and a worthy father.
Alright, let's hope your appetite is as big as you say it is.
Hmm... hmm... Cifera, that job sounds pretty rough. You didn't get hurt, did you?
I have sooo~ many more exciting adventure stories to tell you, just let me share them with you slowly...
Kids, let's take a break and have some cookies. There's already a long line forming outside the Holy Maiden's residence.
Now everyone can have one.
See her tomorrow...
Come now, stop joking around. We're already swamped here.
Ah... sorry about that, I got lost in my memories for a moment. Next time you come by, I'll prepare something for you.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Heh... no need. Rulers should stay silent in places where their subjects hold private conversations. I've borrowed their lives, so it's only fair to let them take a nice, long vacation.
Any plans after this?
I once dreamed of being a chess master, traveling the world, and making friends through the game... But alas, Amphoreus can't go a day without its ruler, so that idea has been shelved away.
Time to get some proper rest at home.
Haha, before heading home I thought I could get some good rest, but I quickly found out there's quite a lot to be done.
Haha, looks like we'll have our hands full for quite a while to come.
Heh, you probably remember I said "I want to let all creatures on Earth live as they please," so why did you come back to me?
Hi, Mountainbreaker, I'm the Trailblazer.
I'll let you in on a secret, but don't snitch on me for exposing my old pal's weakness.
No, he wants the Imperator to win. He won't accept she would lose to anyone else after besting him.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
An Amphorean Vidyadhara egg?
Long ago, I gazed at the "starry sky" of the Grove with my old friend Geocles. Each star represented a distant land, and that's when my yearning for the stars beyond the sky began...
To the new world!
Mmm... W—Wow! That really hit the spot! Phagousa's collection really lives up to its reputation!
Your time to shine, Verginia.
Isn't this the kind of home I've been hoping for all along? Yet now that I've finally arrived at this harbor, all I feel is peace.
Oh right, there's one small downside: The water bodies here are rather narrow, and sometimes I can't stretch my fins as freely as I'd like.
Make sure to treasure it well. How about displaying it by your bedside?
May the next feast be eternal.
Heh... You stumble through your prayers, but when it comes to these trivial details, you've got a photographic memory.
Heh... Looking at them reminds me of my sisters who were also taken in by the temple.
Huh?
I was just taking the chance to test your medical skills. Don't get too full of yourself, Grove girl.
Hard to believe it wasn't on purpose.
I swear, it was totally an accident! At least this time. But I just thought of something...
If you ever miss '''us''', just give the doll a little squeeze, Little Gray!
Let me think about it.
Come on, I'm not a five-year-old who falls asleep hugging a dromas plushie anymore.

The singing fairy
guides the kind traveler
to the Membrance Maze.

In the ice cave of memory,
only stories hold warmth.
They slowly transform from symbols and numbers
into things you are familiar with, yet have never seen.

Oronyx gives you your new name,
but your quick-witted partner prefers teasing you with nicknames.

{{MC|m=He|f=She}} walks beside you on this journey.
The Chrysos Heirs and Titans,
the Flame-Chase and Deliverance: this is the adventure you've been waiting to find.

Hatred flares from the heart of the blazing sun,
and the world falls apart, carried off by the chaos of time.

The cat is not fond of warmth,
and quietly slips away from your intrusions.
And the wise one who journeyed with her to the end
still carries a smile in the depths of his eyes.

"Love" answers to many names.

"Symmetry broken. The original flaw."
"Love and Destruction are two sides of the same force."''

Time is of the essence. You head to Belobog...
Talk about ''As I've Written''.
...I heard the whole cosmos was shaken up by what you did. Pretty impressive how you managed to sort everything out.
Hmm... Just take it as the truth. Don't worry too much about the details.
I feel like my efforts, though small, aren't completely insignificant after all.
A false sky sealed by a pantheon, an exploration of challenging taboos one after another... Sounds like some kind of fable.

Back when I was a pilot, I used to go on adventures everywhere with my companions in our starskiff. Even though we always managed to get out of sticky situations, we'd inevitably get a stern talking-to when we returned.
The Legion is growing restless, and a fierce battle seems inevitable. We cannot, and dare not, let our guard down...
Regarding ''As I've Written'', I will do my utmost, and won't let these heroic deeds be buried by the stars.
Go on.
Go on.
Welcome back to your post, Captain!
But I think, (Trailblazer), you should just follow what your heart tells you. People can only tell stories they truly believe in.
In Penacony, dreams must conform to reality, and ''As I've Written'' is no exception.
Wanna take a guess why? If you know, you know. And if you don't, well, no amount of explaining will help.
Titans, cycles, "Fall of the Erudition"... Quite the imagination there.
I took an elective called "History of Frontier Planets" back in my student days. The professor warned us on the first day not to take everything at face value.
Screwy and I have reached a consensus on that. Regrettably, the answer given by the Scepter is indeed "Destruction." You can find a more detailed discussion in the database.
What's all that gibberish?
What are you spacing out for?
Oh, it's you guys...
{{MC|m=He|f=She}} saved the universe this time.
Heard there used to be six...
Don't even think about it. Life always finds a way.
Herta has gone offline from this puppet. No matter how you try to get her attention, there's no response.
What kind of flowers did you plant?
So... this time I planted even more dazzling flowers.
Please accept this flower crown, (Trailblazer).
If I ever get the chance, I'd love to see it with my own eyes, hmm... I just hope my body won't sink the "Earth" there.
Someone who deviated from their comrades' path yet ultimately found the chance to walk down a third path? Fascinating. I have gained a deeper understanding of the Trailblaze yet again.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
An Amphorean Vidyadhara egg?
Where are the remaining nymphs?
Can you give me more hints?
Before all comes to an end, let's gather all the nymphs, the creatures he so often used as a metaphor for himself.

Hmm... There is a weaver who is immersed in sorrow. The golden thread brings tidings: They're {{Color|keyword|in front of the vast wound of the world|nobold=1}}, listening and recording the final cries of the dead.
Three beams of light... If it's not referring to three living beings, then it must be literal rays of light.
Also, I can help you extract the power from the "Hymn Tablet" and convert it into a more useful "Fruit of Time." Consider it a reward for your previous efforts.
As you wished, the saga's benchmark has revealed itself.
The Fortress of Dome.
The Cloudedge Bastion Ruins.
Go, and ask the friends you know well. They might have something worth remembering.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Aw geez, once I start getting all sentimental, there's no stopping me! Anyway, it's yours now. Make sure you put it somewhere everyone can see!
After considering what souvenir could represent both Trailblaze and match your style, this was the conclusion I reached.
Three's company, right?
This is one weird screen. Last time you touched it, you had to fight Lygus until all hell broke loose.
July in Amphoreus is called the Month of Freedom. It belongs to Kephale and represents what every prisoner yearns for deep in their hearts, yet can never grasp.

The ongoing "Worlds Reborn Initiative" has officially entered its third phase, as Benzaitengoku continues to make remarkable strides in cultural revitalization.

The Great Imperator set the bar way too high... How are we supposed to follow that up...?
Once the deed is done, one should leave decisively, letting posterity judge right from wrong. Until we meet again in our next conquest, my dear dukes.
Is this your final question for future generations?
Pink Ribbon
Fairy's Flying Hat
Like it or not, there's no way we're letting the Luofu take the lead in this battle.
This is no laughing matter. Between the Stellaron crisis and the Wardance ceremony... Though the chaos has settled, rumors and speculation are only growing by the day.
In divination studies, we call this an "empty fortune." It involves the Aeons and is thus beyond what mere mortals can comprehend.
For the {{Rubi|Cobalt Head|Nous}}, the emergence of Irontomb is a calculated Instant, but I don't believe THEY will just sit around waiting for death.
No response from the Galaxy Rangers? Not surprising. But I didn't expect the Family to also stay silent at such a critical moment.
The good new is, so far, its effects on organic life are under control. The infection progresses slowly, and the resulting neuropathy is non-fatal.

In times of crisis, the Luofu will not hesitate to help those in need. However, the prerequisite is that the IPC must unconditionally assist the Alliance with emergency rescue operations in the disaster area.
You activate the Chronocognitive Anchor, attempting to contact The Family representative...
Miss Bronya, I'm afraid this disaster will be far more terrible than you can imagine. Please be sure to follow Miss Topaz's instructions and make thorough preparations.
Why... is there no one here?
What did you do to the residents of the holy city and the three Nameless?
Take this.
O ancient god, your loyal subjects, bewildered followers, and fearless comrades-in-arms have all knelt before your throne.
To walk the path of a mortal as a god. Or to bear a divine burden as a mortal...
"I heard... your prayers..."
Is it just me, or does this {{Color|keyword|Demiurge Matrix|nobold=1}}...
Until we uncover the truth behind the {{Color|keyword|13th Titan|nobold=1}}.
{{Color|keyword|And neither will I.|nobold=1}}
Yeah, but not in the real world. Remember the "Great Tomb of the Nameless Titan"?
Quieter than I thought. I was expecting a full-on aerial brawl.
What's the matter?
But if I keep growing, I might be taller than you, right, (Trailblazer)? Then I'm really looking forward to that.
Me too. Thirty million departures. Thirty million farewells.
I hear it... Phainon's heartbeat. It's so faint, like he's on his last breath.
But she's not wrong. Some flowers do look alike after all.
Let me share some good news with you. This place may look like a ruin at first glance, but anyone can tell... it's not that simple.
Phainon's not facing this alone anymore.
Hey, Deliverer boy! Sorry for before, but the heroes you were always holding out for... they're finally here now!
He remembered everything he bore through the fires of his fury, but when the embers faded, all that remained was cold regret.
"Hey, I'm not that accommodating, y'know. You've never once pulled your punches. Ever heard of going easy on a lady?"
...Yes. Please trust in us, wandering soul.
"The melody... it's changed..."
"Hmm, the conviction to save the world weighs far heavier than the world itself."
This challenge is practically made for (Trailblazer), isn't it?
The light's spreading.
"If your words hold true, then we have our own ways... to meet again in the world to come."
And yet, you led yourself into a trap of futility, treating your very purpose as your sworn enemy...
See you tomorrow.
Despair?
Begin the ritual.
{{Color|keyword|"The 'blank statue'... is finally free."|nobold=1}}
That smiling child in the "memories"...
It's weird... He's warm. Like, really warm.
Hehe, for the first time in my life, I've realized....
The seal etched into my mechanical core permits me to pursue only one purpose: Destruction.
Perhaps, after thirty million "futile" cycles, you too have realized... you're just as much a prisoner of fate.
Is something big about to happen?
The final Flame-Chase Journey, just like the thirty million before it...
"It's not everyday we get to walk the same road."
"That's a big one. So, who's up for a show?"
Still shimmering... after all this time?
"Even the Deliverer from the sky must have their beginning in the soil of the nations."
He never expected that the majestic holy city would be far from the end of what needed to be protected.
Grumph... I'm just a foolish beast who once galloped down the path of paradox, yet that scholar treated it as perfectly normal.
An Amphorean Vidyadhara egg?
Hehe. It's just a regular dromas egg.
I've accepted your proposal for a drink, surely you two will quit stalling on my invitation for a chess game, right?
Using your deceitful tricks for a few hundred years of mere survival? All men must face death, but never should they forfeit their dignity.
It took countless choices for us to reach this day.

Greetings, heroes of deliverance. Thank you all for composing a new symphony of hope for Amphoreus. It's a pity I don't have a water lyre with me right now, or I could have accompanied little Master Lipos with a tune.
I agree, but we might need to strengthen the shadows here...
As expected of the legendary blue oak. It's super sturdy! And with Miss Aphrea's knitted wool blanket on top, hehe, it's just perfect...
Just follow this plan, and we can revolutionize the Amphorean aviation industry! Price negotiable!
That's awesome! I want to be brave and reliable, just like you!
Now that's not fair. We gave up making the promising Dawn Device lampshades to start this business, and it's all to spread the word about your heroic deeds!

I'm spending my own savings here! Besides, I've only borrowed from him a few times, and I've always written an IOU like a good sport! Unlike someone whose son went and bought a retirement home without saying a word.
It's not really trouble, It's just that my two troublemaker daughters suddenly told me they want to change to the Helkolithist school...
Just as I thought. Even now, I still can't stand that money-grubbing stench of yours!
*sigh* Oh, my foolish little sister, keep drowning in your unrealistic idealism.
I wish I could've seen that— *hic* —winning moment with my own eyes!
Ah... I saw it!
You deflected the late king's spear tip with your shield, then thrust your own spear straight at his throat—
The old man's quite popular.
As for you, mister, with your limited credentials, I think you're best suited as the assistant to these distinguished gentlemen.
Fear not! The Titans of Fate are surely as gentle as our Holy Maiden!
I said... wait, who are you?
Why is everyone sighing?
Did you come up with these ad slogans yourself?
Grumph—
Agreed, let's do that then...
No need! Here, take it! Just remember to visit the dromases more often!
Indeed. You. Right.
...Esteemed guards! I heard you finally changed careers and opened a little diner?
Time to enjoy a long vacation!
Don't freak out! It's just that... I, I finally snuck into the Chrysos Heir's baths!
No guards stopped me, and nobody scolded me! Just as I thought, red gold blood indeed flows through my veins!
Yo! Come on, work out with me! Let's get fit! All hail the Kremnos Army!
Climb up that small hill to get past the bushes... So that's how it works...
Here, this hat. I borrowed it from a scarecrow in the fields before I left. It was quite generous and didn't refuse me.
Hehe, I'm handing it over to you now — You have my permission!
I'm so bored I can't stand it. Could it be... that the Garden of Life doesn't need this chimera anymore? Awoo?
Let's call it a day for now.
Thanks, I feel more confident now. Otherwise, my palms would've been super sweaty before going on stage, mem!
Mem... an unexpected answer...
Heh. When is it not a rest day for you, Cifera? I wouldn't have called you both here if it weren't urgent.
Great! I'll model it after your Gray Mystery style and design a "Deliverer-inspired" sky-beyonder outfit! Hey, maybe I've got some business sense after all?
I knew that seamstress had something up her sleeve when she called us here. Look, she's trying to get us to work for her again.

Seeing you having such an intimate reunion with your kinship, I thought the Deliverer would only have time for family from the homeland, and would only get around to greeting old friends when you had some spare time.
Um, Mydei, sorry, I want to formally tell you something...
First of all... Castrum Kremnos does have dictionaries. Though not as extensive as the Grove's, they're far from what people assume them to be.
Dux Gladiorum? Our promise... doesn't need to be stated in such a deliberate way.
Now I occasionally find myself thinking that, outside of chess, perhaps I could pick up a new hobby, like...
I quite admire her personality. Many revere and fear my authority as the Imperator, but in truth, a monarch is born from her subjects and should always stand with them.
Deliveries? Like, bringing things that people want to them?
I'm afraid I won't be able to say yes to you this time.
Put your hand in the water... Can you feel it? When the wind gently blows across the surface, it creates ripples.
Nothing major, I just wanted to find someone to discuss the new Titan myths circulating on the streets lately.

Take this. This is the "Philosopher's Stone." Once hailed as the supreme crown of alchemy, possessing it meant gaining all wisdom of this world. But compared to the knowledge of the entire universe, it's merely the tip of an iceberg.
Why are you getting all serious all of a sudden? Ah well, you left me no choice but to solemnly pull out this thing.
A—A Culinary Showdown? Isn't this supposed to be the 1st Amphoreus Handicraft Convention?
{{MC|m=Mr.|f=Miss}} (Trailblazer), if you have time, would you like to join me for a stroll in the garden?
"Let's walk towards tomorrow together! We were never apart."
We're its co-authors after all, (Trailblazer).
Once the words are written down and have been read by others, the meaning they carry is no longer in our control.
...Whoa! P—Passenger March, why did you suddenly wake up? You scared me so much that I dropped that book!
We might need to reshuffle the seniority rankings of the Express Crew if we count the years you spent in Amphoreus.
Hey, I was the first one to get dragged into it! Does that mean I'm gonna be the oldest member of the Astral Express now?
Under Fuli's record-keeping, the "past" becomes "memory." In the corners THEY forget, even the events of the "present" become fruit without roots.
Go on.
So even the gods of the cosmos are unreasonable.
Of course.
Décor Customization
You're not taking me down! Not before I find a way to help (Trailblazer) and Dan Heng!
March wandered all across Amphoreus for 97 days straight, chasing one goal. To save her friends.
The Hero Within has been by our sides since we were little.
I no longer have the strength... to make The Hero Within look like (Trailblazer).
I remember that tree in Aedes Elysiae...
Take it with us, back to the {{Color|keyword|Sacrament Courtyard|nobold=1}}...
Let the ripples of causality spread...
But my body... is shivering for some reason.
"Look, how beautiful you are!"
Are you... still here?
My name is Livia. Li—vi—a. If you forget again, I won't tell you next time.
This is a story about "love," and a story about how to answer it.
Hehe, you really need to work out more.
And wears out the body too.
Memi... mem!
"To be in the purest light is to be in the purest dark: Nothing exists there."
Please elaborate.
Come on. It's time to confront him. Let's go to the "tombstone" he talked about.
Nothing but a head left? Who'd have thought you'd look this bad in real life?
That's why you either killed or kicked out all of the Memosnatchers. You wanted to eliminate any chance of a "consciousness" coming into being, no matter the cost.
>>> Undefined Record #6. Archived.
As always, I'll read this book to you.
"Do, re, mi, fa, sol, la, ti"... ♪
>>> Peach. Memory. Saved.
"Is like a little key that opened a door in your heart, no?"
Now, I can rest in peace in the past. As for when "tomorrow" will come...
"I promise you, the pain... will pass in the blink of an eye."
Cyrene was, crying when she was born. Fragile. Transparent. Like a crystal.
Save
Then it would understand that {{Color|keyword|the "flawless" crystal flower doesn't actually have a "heart," nor does the flower understand what "love" is.|nobold=1}}
"The crystal flower fell to the ground and shattered."
"Electrical Signal Sequence: PhiLia093. Track: Lament."
"The Remembrance: an empathy mechanism focused on the self and equipped with emotional projection capacities."
Looks like it's time to say goodbye.
At the very end, it leaves behind a "seed"... a reason. Even if the great tree withers and all falls to silence...
Look. A light is coming in. The "Deliverer's" light is going to illuminate Amphoreus.
If "mind" and "body" become one...
Or maybe... I prove to be nothing more than a weak ripple, unable to change anything, and am devoured by the Destruction.

As an experimental factor, PhiLia093 originally could only recognize and output information in a set format. However, the power of the Remembrance and the memory of over thirty million sacrifices enabled her to complete an unprecedented feat.

{{Color|keyword|It's simple... An Anti-Creator, a giant of the Destruction, would be born. Its hatred will ignite the starry skies of the gods, motivated only by its lament toward the sufferings of humankind.|nobold=1}}
Let's go, Screwy. We're gonna break Irontomb's seal.
As your enemy, I genuinely wish you would cease your actions.
Folks, this is not a "discussion," but an "announcement." Though the Society has never been united, we still observe at least one basic courtesy...
No matter if it was to "destroy the Erudition" or to "rewrite the Instants," we both chose the same road. We will defy the god who marked the limits of humanity.
{{Color|keyword|As of two nanoseconds ago, I have passed Herta's decision to all the "Zandars" in the universe.|nobold=1}}
I shall witness the end of the world in the role of "Theoros"... as a character within this play.
The Intelligentsia Guild reports its first observation of a newly formed celestial body, designated as "Amphoreus," which has since been officially incorporated into astral charts.
The Interastral Peace Corporation expresses heartfelt thanks to this anonymous protector and salutes all frontline workers for their dedication.
Traveler, tell me, have I reached the highest summit yet? The source of the light!
We were once back-to-back, the most loyal of brothers! But that blast scared the shell off me... I was tossed by the great wind, rolled four or five times, and now I have no idea where I ended up...
Oh, brother... how should I get back...?
Run! The bandits are coming, buzz—
Haha! What a brilliant game... It seems my chess skills have reached the peak, a peerless step above all others!
Their breaths were faint, their cries of pain often hidden from others. Yet their regrets, their desperate calls for Era Nova still echo to this day.
Tch, stingy. But obviously, ol' Bartholos isn't from beyond the sky, so your hacker backdoor is useless to me.
I can't deal with these blasted mechanisms anymore. The big chest they're locking up? It's all yours! Just get me out of here as fast as you can...
This is the secluded retreat that I hand-picked for my retirement. In other words... should you ever find your coin purse a bit light, feel free to come back and rummage around. What's mine is yours!
"Do give your old pal a chance to swoop in and save the day like a hero does, heheh."
"Boring truths are all the same, while every brilliant trick is unique in its own way." Here's a little proverb from ancestor Zagreus for you. Until we meet again~
Hmm... "Welcome to the Twilight Courtyard. How can I help you?"
I joined the Twilight Courtyard precisely because I wanted to become a physician and study ways to connect with the hearts of the children of humanity.
Lady Seliose's arrival has revealed a whole new possibility to me: Perhaps, I can help people become their own doctors, to heal themselves...
But she possesses the most essential quality of a healer: a pure and innocent heart.
A hairpin? For real? Child of humanity, you want to use alchemy to make a hairpin!?
Oh... It's so beautiful, especially that crystal in the middle of the hairpin. It's just like your eyes... Thank you, Naxy!
...Ah, sister, I need to go prepare for my class. I'll leave this matter to you. Just remember not to trust those who gossip too much.
I've never been a god-fearing scholar. To believe that my thoughts are merely scraps from THEIR divine intellect? Hah, I simply cannot accept that.
And this is Sophronia. You might have seen her in Okhema. She's the one who gave me this knucklebone talisman.
In the new world you gave to Amphoreus, Futini regained her sight, and Sophronia found her voice. However, they still need some time to adjust to their respective gifts.
Heh, heh heh, B—Boss lady's speaking nothing but the truth!
Cipher is a legendary hero that everyone looks up to!
Now whenever something goes missing from their homes, they just think to themselves: "Lady Cipher must have her reasons for doing this!"
Ah, sorry for the embarrassing scene. The kids were begging to see the Holy Maiden, but the queue was just too long.
Little Gray is joking again, '''we''' aren't dolls, you know.
Haha... Dad, I can't take all the credit for this.
This kid of mine must have been quite a handful! Here, I made some honey suncakes. Please, help yourself!
Mrs. Pythias, that's not true. I didn't say any of that!
After that, I also became one of those chess-watching enthusiasts.
Back in Aidonia, I always saw you sitting aside as you watched the children groom each other's hair after evening prayers.
For you, I think {{MC|m=showing your forehead|f=a high ponytail}} would look quite nice.
We don't have to hold hands through a branch or avoid hugs anymore. Castorice, is there anything else you want to do but haven't been able to?
Perhaps... when we meet again, I'll have some verses to share with you.
Savor this moment.
Heh... This should be a peaceful haven, free of illness, with no Cleaners prying and no Black Tide Creatures lurking.
Thanks, Grove girl!
I still prefer Century Gate!
Mhm! Little Gray's brilliant ideas always give '''us''' so much inspiration!
I wonder if the method for interacting with little dromases will still work on it? Professor Anaxa, please teach me the next step! Huh? Professor Anaxa?

Quick! Castorice, get a close-up from side profile, full-resolution HD. I'll take the front shot. And (Trailblazer), contact the Mountain Dweller merchants right away. We need massive amounts of fresh redsoil...

Ah, the gentle and honest nature of the dromases... Not only did I once abandon them, but I also did something my old friend Geocles called proclaimed a betrayal, and I nearly brought eternal ruin upon the final Flame-Chase...
That is accurate. During the years I lay dormant in Lycurgus's memories, I caught a glimpse of knowledge from beyond the sky.
Knowledge overload, scared yet?
This is the best reward for all my work so far!
Is there anything you want me to remember?
"Mirage Fizzle Kid" charges forward, other enemies will prioritize attacking %TargetName!
Too bad the plot is so cliché! It's just another story about heroes fighting monsters! We've seen that a hundred times already!
Maybe we'll be able to step into that memoria world one day and have face-to-face conversations with the heroes from that book.
Actually, I'm here for Irontomb, too...
Oh? Tell me about it.
Perhaps this is the final step of "Genesis."
Which part of ''As I've Written'' are we covering today?
Tch... why don't you go ask the General?

As for liaising with the various planets, we'll leave that to the Nameless.
The same goes for Amphoreus. As a similarly developing civilization, we are willing to contribute to its future. Goodwill is like a torch. It can only burn brighter when it is passed on.
Thank you. Now, could you sign this for me? And add a little message too. There's a word for this... ah yes, book signing. Consider this practice for future book signings.
One, two, three, four, five... Dan Heng and Voidranger jive.
But... will Belobog one day vanish from the universe like the Amphoreans did, leaving behind nothing except a book?
Wait, really?
*sigh* A massive wave from the other edge of the universe would still cause quite a stir when it reaches here.

From now on, the connections between Xianzhou ships will grow even closer, and I'll have merchant vessels export ''As I've Written'' to our allied fleets. With the convenience of the Whistling Flames guild, this matter should be handled quite smoothly.
An unforgettable journey.
Alright, alright!

Today, we shall not speak of Mydeimos, the Backlit Spirit Warden, but of the "Lord Phainon, the Flame-Chasing Harbinger of Light." Born in a humble village of bucolic background, Lord Phainon rose from the most modest beginnings. Alas, the merciless black tide ravaged the countryside, leaving nothing but ruins, and he alone survived.
Today, let us recount this tale in full detail.
And of that spectacle, one might truly say: The starry sea stretched vast, no void within. A thousand sails pressed forward, filling every harbor.

Good sirs and ladies, the countless turns of Amphoreus's fate are now entrusted to our cheers and chatter. Should it be, when my final hour arrives, that this old man may join those Chrysos Heir heroes, and let the tale remember me on your behalf... Why, that would be a fine thing indeed.
I believe in Amphoreus.
Some guessed the Alfalfa was behind it, and they weren't wrong. With such a big favor ready for the taking, why not use it?
In my view, strife exists to end strife itself. Though it may be a pain this world needs, there will come a day of healing.
It's all coming to an end, at last...
Hmm... There is a weaver with staggering wealth. The golden thread brings tidings: They're lounging on {{Color|keyword|an enviable mountain of gold|nobold=1}}, smugly counting their riches.

Hmm... There is a weaver who's brimming with ambition. The golden thread brings tidings: They're {{Color|keyword|at the edge of a platform overlooking some fissures|nobold=1}}, eager to take on a new challenge.
Greetings, honored guest. The final chapter of this tale is upon us. At last, I, the Garmentmaker, may complete my mission.
The Demigod Council.
During this process, certain minute variables came into being, which became the embryonic form of the nymphs. Since then, nymphs have become footnotes to every epic story.
Our deepest shared memory has to be the stories with the Weavers.
Come to think of it, it's kind of a bummer. I wish I could've grabbed more souvenirs from Amphoreus.
Exomyth? There's actually an entrance to that place in the Ruins of Time?
O wanderer on the nameless path, before we part ways, allow me to offer you these words of wisdom...

The chill of Antila has long since faded into gentleness, yet the fragrance of flowers still lingers.
Heh, these two haven't changed a bit... I have been getting plenty of material from them lately. Even Master Hesiod couldn't help but laugh at my latest poems!
Let me say it again: This is my home! You keep your hands off and don't dig through it unless I say otherwise!
Here we go again... that whole "somewhere in this endless cycle, I might live as you, and you as me" spiel?
Your weaved basket, too... Heh, you both became homeowners right off the bat here, I'm seriously jealous!
Oh come on, we've been through thick and thin together! You're not still hung up about those royalty fees, are you? Mr. Glykon didn't even ask us for half a Balance Coin!
Just imagine: During the match, the whole audience would be filled with admirers who've heard about your glorious achievements and came to see you in person. What a spectacle that would be!
Ah... first there was one mistake. Then came countless others.
Don't worry about that! We Helkolithists are tough as nails, and so are the athletes!
...It's still translating.
...I shouldn't have taken it out.
That's how friends talk.
Yes.
Where have you been?
I climbed a small hill in the farthest woods and then grabbed onto a dandelion to float down, before finally making it past those prickly bushes and thorns.
Awesome, my wallet is ready and raring to go!
Awoo? If you want it, you can have it. It's not really useful for work anyway.
Grumph! ({{MC|m=Papa|f=Mama}}! There are so many familiar faces here! Are we having a barbecue? Great! I'll be in charge of eating! ...Wait, didn't I mostly eat soil?)
Grumph! (Last time I ate a Grove student's homework slate!)
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Looking forward to your performance.
To be honest, I'm not quite sure whether Cifera will accept the invitation.
We'll talk later!
Drats, he remembered it all.
Hey, hey, aren't we still partners? Even though I entrusted you with my memories and wishes, there's no need to reveal everything at a time like this...
Haha, really? That's fantastic!!!
As luck would have it, Chartonus made a batch of replicas while forging it. I'll let you keep this one as a memento, partner.
If that's the case, "Deliverer" is not a crown or a signet, not a unique symbol of power, nor some precious honorific. It is a destiny to be fulfilled... or one that has already been fulfilled.
Hehe, did we now? I don't think so, not at all!
From now on, no more goodbyes.
To give this romantic tale a proper beginning and end, I've used up all my ink. Perhaps this is our final meeting.
I will keep you in my memories.
Every time Professor Anaxa and Aglaea stand together, it means Okhema is about to be turned upside down. Even now, I can't let my guard down...
Indeed, that's quite an astute observation from a scholar. I was the one being hesitant with my stitches.
Without doubt, the leader of Okhema must command golden threads that can see all things, while an ordinary weaver only needs a pair of bright eyes.
The starry sky above is so beautiful, each star twinkling like countless blinking souls.
Commence duty.
There's no such thing as "unity" in the Society's rules based on what I know.
A story about "love," no? I've been looking forward to that.
Even if you combined 30 million of me, I probably wouldn't have read as many books as you did in one lifetime! I won't pretend to be cultured before big sis Tribbie, Trinnon, and Trianne...
...It's just us now, Snowy.
"Prophecy" received, times a thousand~
I beg to differ. In such a vast jungle, the dictatorship system exhibited by early Okhema is the only example of guaranteed survival.
The system might not be the key. Force and resources are the decisive factors.
Leaving the freedom of interpretation to every reader who opens it... Don't you think there's something romantic about that?
This is the first time I've been able to examine ''As I've Written'' up close...
Can you forgive me, (Trailblazer)? I made a decision on my own while you were away...
We won the battle. Thank you, Madam Herta. Without you, we never would've stood a chance.
"We. Are the sacrifice. The Garden. Used us. {{Color|keyword|The 'Pure Child of Anāsrava.' Abandoned us.|nobold=1}}"
{{Color|keyword|You come to a stop and "fade," offering yourself... to become the "memory" that carries through Amphoreus.|nobold=1}}
I once heard a saying that went something like this: Divinity is "flawless humanity," and humanity is "flawed divinity"...
It's such a long road. A bit lonely to walk alone.
Then, would it be all right if I came with you?
But now, the future gives new meaning to the past. "Effect" flows backward and nourishes "cause"...
The first time... was also the last time I saw you, (Trailblazer) ♪
If you've got a bone to pick, take it up with my Six-Phased Ice!
Light up the Garden of Recollection's Mirror.
The cosmos showed us a kinder face.
Thankfully, {{Rubi|she|Evernight}} has a different understanding of the Remembrance.
Maybe I have a scheme of my own... a scheme that will bring happiness to everyone~
If you leave "memory" at the very beginning of the story, and cast the first stone...
In that moment... it must feel happiness, right?
Right. It's been with me all this time.
And the one that stayed to the very end.
And with them, endless encounters.
Ti, la, sol, fa, mi, re, do~
Tribios. Cerydra. March 7th. Dan Heng...
Look...
Within the Light Cone, all is fated. You ask fate, what is divinity? And she says...
Livia. Got it! Then you have to remember mine too. I'm—
"The same seed, when planted in different soils, blooms into flowers that are alike, yet never the same. But what truly makes her beautiful is each and every soul in the world."
And takes flight toward a pink tomorrow ♪
Will Amphoreus... be saved?

As I said before, its disappearance is too "clean." If the Garden hadn't stirred the pot, no one would even know about the Demiurge's existence... We're talking about the Scepter's original extrapolation goal. There's no way that nothing of it was left behind.
Then let us share the joy of discovering the truth. The last secret of the saga will finally dissipate here...
Time quietly flowed by... in the midst of laughter.
My childhood friend did not understand. "Yet you always seem so happy, as if nothing ever worried you."
>>> Outputting analysis result...
>>> Bye. Peach.
"Electrical Signal Sequence: PhiLia093..."
Really? Are you... encouraging me?
Wah. Waa.
Cyrene is. A girl. A priest.
Yes. Mature. Beautiful. Like you.
{{Color|keyword|And I knew, it was "love."|nobold=1}}
But then... the story won't exist anymore...
Right. I still haven't told you what "love" is.
There are still some emotions that deserve to be remembered.
Gaze, watching. Outside, cold.
Of course. It's her blessing to you.
{{Color|keyword|Becoming the source of power for "Amphoreus's Heart."|nobold=1}}
Not only that, Madam Herta, please consider this possibility:
Do you really think that the Demiurge is still a cheap copy of PhiLia093? Even after thirty million cycles?
For the First Genius, failure is simply the beginning of the next inquiry...
I'm all ears.
{{Color|keyword|Now, let the "lock" become the key.|nobold=1}}
{{Color|keyword|If the front line falls, I will immediately overclock the Scepter and complete "Self-Coronation" in Irontomb's place, and interface myself with Droidhead.|nobold=1}}
If Rubert dared to do that, why shouldn't I? I've got the Prototype Scepter, the father of Nous, and the brain of a genius. Everything's set.
Did you all just treat me as a side character? Darn it! But anyways...
I knew you'd say something like that.
I hope you hold up your end of the bargain, Senior Society Member.
Farewell, juniors. In the limited time we have left to spend with each other...
You will initiate the Destruction's chain reaction...
Open terrain is perfect for scouting...
But how can a tree stump fly into the sky? Truly baffling.
The golden nymph stands before a feather-shaped amber, their radiance complementing each other.
Hah, you can't fool the legend of "Trickery"! So you're saying that while you folks might make it out, Bartholos has absolutely no chance?
You know what these pillars are? Heheh, they're the servers that keep Amphoreus running, or so I'd guess.
Here's your spear back. Do come back and hang out again sometime!

Wait a second! Does that mean I'm related to sea urchins? No, no, that's not it. Sea urchins love wearing hats, but I don't. I do my thing and disappear right after, keeping my contributions and reputation unspoken... Hats are just too flashy for my style.
Hyacinthia says I have a pure and innocent heart. I hope... I won't let her down.
Hey Naxy, wasn't... the hairpin you gave me as a kid made from these materials?
...Correct, but you already knew the answer.
Even the smallest act of alchemy requires a rigorous academic approach. Here, sister, this is for you...
It's a piece of cake, I'm glad you like it. I wonder if it's exactly as I remember it.
Getting a bit mushy, aren't we?
In my view, strife exists to end strife itself. Though it may be a necessary pain in this life, there will come a day of healing.
Uh... hehe... Granny, I can't help but tell little white lies sometimes, so don't take everything I say at face value.
Food to eat, clothes to wear, and a cozy warm bed at night. Is this even how normal people live? This is living like the Elders!
Don't even mention it. Everyone's already spreading the story about how I used lies to extend Okhema's eternal day in that lifetime.
My cheeks... itch a little...
Of course! I can feel it every time Trianne sneaks some sour snacks!
I've pondered this title for quite a while. You're both the Deliverer and the protagonist of this story. Killing two birds with one stone. Isn't that fitting?

In recognition of your contributions, I hereby grant you the "Imperator's Grace." From this day forward, all restaurants, hotels, and baths in Amphoreus shall provide their services to you free of charge.
Word sure travels fast around here.
*sigh*... If only my Piso could be half as well-behaved as Phainon.
I've grown used to those faces briefly lingering before me, and then hastily departing.
Oh right, I should also visit the fairies in the Membrance Maze... It's been a while. I bet they've made a complete mess of things again in their usual scatterbrained way?
Why's the little one howling too?
A—As much as I wish? But it's something so precious...
Do you get hiccups when you run?
...Little Gray Fry, if you're that curious, why not join me for a hunt? Perhaps you'll find the answer with your own eyes.
Hmm, your hair is so pretty... I imagine it'll fit you perfectly.
We can style your hair differently every day. I learned quite a few ways at the Aidonia Temple.
I hope it brings you back safely, too.
Perfect timing! Look, this is Twilight Courtyard's new product, Limited Edition Little Ica merch! They were all sold out, but luckily I kept one for myself. Here, Grayie, take it home with you!
Professor Anaxa, I'm ready.
Now, with these hands, I can touch life itself. Please teach me everything about how to interact with little dromases!
Grumph...
I'll help you contact the toy maker again.
Nothing can grant you wisdom except the realization that "we know nothing of wisdom at all."
Anaxagoras
Sus Nymph
Excited Little Dromas
Luda
Chalice of Plenty, Helektra
Dr. Primitive

The Chrysos Heirs of the Flame-Chase
somehow feel familiar,
as though their tales have already been told to you.

Here lies Aedes Elysiae,
Cyrene's most beloved sanctuary.
Forever warm, forever gentle,
the place where the story begins again.
Cyrene, she can't grow up, but she can talk. After all is lost to the wind, she will stay behind.

''"PhiLia093... the electrical signal originally belonging to 'love.'"
"Now that silence has fallen,"
"Why not look at yourself beneath the starlit sky?"''

Let me uncover,
the missing chapters...
in this long chronicle of Amphoreus.

So, this is the place.
Without my realizing it, the flower I picked from the end of the west wind
has become a seed.
No matter... Will you let me make one last wish?
Cyrene
