You recounted the story behind ''As I've Written'', and the current state of the Amphoreus...
The children's energy seems endless. Ah, to be young...
Anke, you forgot the name again. It's called the Mutual Benefit Trade Agreement!
You still have time to compete with us for books? Word on the street is that Irontomb infected a few old automatons... Isn't your Logistics Department supposed to handle that?
Shhhh! If everyone hears about this, it'll make the front page of ''Crystal Daily'' for sure!
Although Amphoreus seemed so distant from us, watching their struggles through each cycle, and seeing how the entire cosmos ultimately cast aside their differences to unite against the Destruction...
This is Volume 2.
Shortly after the fall of Irontomb, the Alliance gathered all the generals to discuss their next course of action. The records in this book should provide them with additional support.
I can make you a promise that the Sky-Faring Commission will provide its full support for matters relating to ''As I've Written''.
An unprecedented memory.
(cheer)

Thereafter, he hewed down the black tide, passed the trial, drank the crimson brew of blood, drove back the calamitous star of misfortune. He settled old grievances, guarded the holy city, reclaimed his sunken homeland, and ascended the Agate Throne.
*sigh* This is so...
(keep silent)

Good sirs and ladies, at that brink of life and death, who do you think turned back the tide? It was the successor of the Cloudstrider, the Gray Savior, bearing the memories of thirty million lifetimes, wielding the power of trillions of golden Coreflames, who struck down the enemy just as it neared completion.
The journey against the Destruction, and the stories behind it, should be known by more people.
As you know, Penacony is a realm wrapped in syrup. I worry that epic tales of heroes might be too heavy for those living in dreams.
You ignore the furniture's opinions and decide to trust yourself.
Haha, just kidding. Rest assured. I'm a professional dream bubble collector. I know what can and can't be successful.
Bad news.
My advice is: continue the journey, be prepared for the worst, but keep hope in your heart. You know that if there's one thing the world of Amphoreus isn't short of, it's miracles.
Madam Herta has actually been thinking about Amphoreus all this time. The last time she couldn't stop talking about something was when we contained the Stellaron.
Ithaca, what you lack most is the vision to see through the true nature of data.
On top of that, the conference organizers will generously cover all accommodation and travel expenses!
You finished your missions, too?
Even the Dromas King likes redsoil too?
The later memories, disappeared. Invisible? Or disappeared?

Perhaps, just as Phagousa can't resist their ambrosia, I've always had a natural fondness for what's born from the furnace of Earth. Hot, crispy, and delicious. You should use your teeth and thoroughly enjoy this feeling with me... Nom nom...
Hehe. It's just a regular dromas egg.
Hope to see you again, honored guest.

Hmm... There is a weaver who has prepared a little surprise. The golden thread brings tidings: They're hiding {{Color|keyword|behind something fragile|nobold=1}}, waiting to deliver their long-prepared opening line.
Farewell.
By the power of Remembrance, the figures you know will live forever upon this page of the story, and so shall I.
As you wished, the saga's benchmark has revealed itself.
The Murmuring Woods.
Living beings are too complex to take away, but a few souvenirs shouldn't be a problem... Perhaps this is what Lady Aglaea has been searching for all along, the true way to defeat the black tide.
I have something to give you as well, but I'm hesitating on how to bring it up.
Come to think of it, these metallic nymphs really fit in well around here.
Zandar?
In this experiment, what was the real {{Color|keyword|variable|nobold=1}} that led to failure?
It seems you haven't found your answer yet. Time is running out, so please think it through quickly.
Until you decide to step out of this {{Color|keyword|{{Rubi|cave|world}}|nobold=1}}...

When "Bug" is removed, the "Fatal Bug" effect will also be removed.

Tearing apart the obsession to bear the world, the colossus crowned itself in hatred. Enter once more the funeral of wisdom and extinguish the flames of karma.

The sage, seated in the audience, once silently observed the struggle between prisoners and puppets. Perhaps they had contemplated being locked in the dim cave themselves, but their form and ancient desires were the very shackles that bound them.

The kernel of the Scepter, contaminated by an unknown energy, has long fallen into decay. Here, Erudition lies dormant, Remembrance has dimmed, and only data ruins steeped in Destruction remain in the surroundings.

The echo in his heart still lingers.
"That voice... It's the Tribbie sisters!"
Are we finally getting an intergalactic warfare arc? That's my favorite!

{{Color|keyword|Have we... succeeded?|nobold=1}}

▀█That's▄█▄Good█▄

▀▄Can't▄▀Hear▄█Why▄▀

Not bad. Let me respond with the greatest magic trick!
That won't be necessary. We can simply sleep, and the "Chronocognitive Anchor" will wake us up.
I didn't expect you'd both be here.
Alright, it's time for Dan Heng and me to go have a super long nap. Look after this world for us, (Trailblazer).
Phainon... is the only one who didn't reach the new world.
Look. The golden light that shone upon the Grove still meanders between heaven and earth, like the prophecies of Amphoreus.
Do you still remember what I asked (Trailblazer) at this exact spot the last time we set off?
{{Color|keyword|A person's personality is their destiny.|nobold=1}}
And face...
I believe in every version of you.
That's pretty forward of you, you know? Still... thank you, (Trailblazer). That's very reassuring.
You sound... so... far away...
"I see endless 'memories' floating in the starry skies. They are the consciousnesses of the victims. In the cosmos's real space-time, they'll be stained by the Destruction in the next second."
"(Trailblazer)... You're already right next to me."
"In that case, I won't feel alone or be scared."
Then get ready. The conductor will be giving you the signal to depart.
Remember this moment, (Trailblazer).
"You are a memetic entity born in Amphoreus, yet you only awakened with (Trailblazer)'s arrival, and only matured as {{MC|f=s}}he embarked on the Path of Remembrance."
"If a new life is to be born, its seed has to be dead."
"Every day it's the same nonsense! The world is better off destroyed... every single thing—"
Kafka...?
"And when tomorrow comes, share with me the miracle you've created with your own hands."
I... will reach tomorrow.
We finally meet, (Trailblazer).
Of course you do. Cheerful, beautiful, optimistic... Just how I imagined I'd look as a grown-up.
But that light wouldn't be found in the "flawless" flower, nor in the fairy's eyes.
Then, join all the other "flowers" in this story...
Honestly, I've always thought you were really incredible. After all, no god guided the path of the Trailblaze. It could only be forged by those who dare to take their steps one at a time...
Tread on the Path of Remembrance.
With an abundance of "love," let there be light.
In the Month of Freedom, I impart Destruction onto the shackles of destiny!
His fate is no different now. Sentiment clashed with reason, and Lycurgus was born from the latter.
But whichever side we take, in the end, "curiosity" claims us all.
And next thing I know, we're all on this Express. No idea how that happened.
I love eating instant noodles while taking a bath.
Take whatever you like.
Look who's finally awake~
I hope Cassie and Miss Cipher's little prank didn't scare you too much?
I'm a bit worried about the Crew...
That's exactly the kind of thing Lord Phainon has been dreaming about.
That celebration party I've been mentioning to you has finally become a reality.
Don't worry. They'll be safe and sound. She promised.
Where is she...?
Sorry about that. Since it's our first time visiting the Express, I was hoping everyone would behave... But it turns out everyone's quite the character, aren't they? You know what I mean, right?
Freedom... what a wonderful word.
{{Color|keyword|The epilogue of ''As I've Written''.|nobold=1}}
Stories this complex and twisted are always hard to believe. If anyone questions the truth of this tale...
March, Dan Heng, (Trailblazer)...
{{Color|keyword|"The pen will eventually break, the ink will run dry, and life will ultimately fade, but thoughts will permanently remain in sagas."|nobold=1}}
Loosen up, Hysilens.
"Mydeimos, become king."

Maybe the Divine Foresight should change his name to the "Optimistic General" instead.

Be extremely careful. The Ruin Legion's troops and weaponry are nothing to write home about. The IPC, even the Denizens of Abundance, could take them on. However, while Voidrangers are just expendable pawns of the Destruction, the real wild cards are—
The Reignbow's arrows have always aimed at any force that threatens the cosmos. Now that the Trailblaze walks alongside us, the Cloud Knights shall keep their oath as they have from the beginning...
Let's set up the Trailblaze beacon and establish contact with the outside world.
Of course. In the name of Preservation, all for the Amber Lord.

That kid Gepard and Pela are busy organizing the Silvermane Guards, having them consolidate their lines and dig trenches. Seele and Lynx just got back from the Geomarrow Vein production chain... Hey, do you want to say something to them?
Unbelievable. All the residents of the holy city have gathered here.
Of course, it would manifest in the form of the Trailblaze.
Too bad I'm the type who can't resist digging deeper. Looks like I'll be counting on you again, Screwy. Let's tear this system inside out.
Unfortunately, current conditions won't let me ignore any variables. Especially the most important one: your will.
Every Instant in the Aeon's calculation is like a sword hanging over the cosmos. Every move humanity makes could speed up its arrival.
But I did find some... interesting "scars" in the circuit.
{{Color|keyword|The lifeform known as the "Demiurge" was the original target of the Scepter's extrapolation.|nobold=1}}

"The prime mover of life"... that's what Scepter δ-me13 was originally tasked with. Even after it got scrapped, the query kept running. Yet, the true value lies in the process of solving it, not the answer itself...
The Nameless Titan never existed. The so-called "listener" was just a trap set by the Remembrance to steal the Scepter.
That shouldn't be possible. Could it be that the Era Nova exhausted all of the Remembrance's texture?
{{Color|keyword|Logs show "Lycurgus" revoked administrator access.|nobold=1}}
I see it too. We're thinking the same thing.
Still, slim chances doesn't mean no chances.
I've hunted down a single grain of sand in the universe before. This won't stop me.
By the way, if there's another Stellaron in Amphoreus...
The spatial field here is undergoing autonomous recalibration. Initiating reverse-engineering of the interference source.
Before you arrived, I kept wondering... beyond the veil of Aedes Elysiae, what kind of Amphoreus is being born?
Now, the entire cosmos stands with the Trailblaze.
"Blank spaces"? What's that?
We, {{Color|keyword|the last of the Twelve Titans|nobold=1}}, stand ready to fight for the world's destiny.

The past remains vivid in my mind. Even the sights along each crossing of the River of Souls have never been clearer. Let alone the companions along the Flame-Chase Journey, or Cyrene from Aedes Elysiae...
{{Color|keyword|In the name of the mortal, Mydei, Champion of Strife, this soul rises to the stars, for glory and freedom, to have his wish fulfilled!|nobold=1}}
And this one with the flower... gotta be little March from the Express Crew, huh?
"Maybe he's been waiting here just for us."
"Control what little you can, and when fate's inescapable grasp comes..."
So that makes... three adorable pink-haired girls!
"He heard the voices of the people, but could no longer respond with the same ardor."
It's your call.
To be a flame is to burn. It is simply in Phainon's nature.
See you on the battlefield.
So, I need to walk this path too?
Farewell, paradise. You carried thirty million lifetimes of "wishes" and "despair"...
It's because he is the very embodiment of a "hero."
Is he... Is he gonna fall apart?
This man would rather fall to pieces than fall to his knees.
It's as if they are mocking me, a failed sculptor, {{Color|keyword|whose touch can only diminish what was born to shine, until nothing remains.|nobold=1}}
Now, you are imprisoned by the sages from beyond the sky.
I... I want to leave this place.
He's already gone ahead to embrace his destiny.
"The answer is all but revealed."
"At the journey's end, they shall bathe in gold once more..."
So this is what lies at the end of the west wind... a ravaged battlefield.
"It's been a while, Lady Cifera."
Seems like something got mixed up.
There's a whole garden down here...?
What lies beyond the edge of the light?
But in the end, he couldn't hold on to any of it.

Long ago, I came across a bone fragment from a dromas as a mortician and crafted it into a bone flute. When played, it produced a deep, melancholic sound, as if softly brushing against the very soul of the dromas.
Heh, now that's the spirit. A honey brew should indeed be downed in one go.
Gladly, Little Gray Fry. Don't keep me waiting too long this time.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
This battlefield stands as testament to the death struggle between the Titans and the black tide.
Thank the fates for guiding us to meet again, my dear {{MC|m=sir|f=lady}}~ Would you like to hear another song from Lipos?
But if you ask me, you exist, and therefore noises do, too. The world has never been peaceful or silent.
Instead of wasting time on these old theories no one can understand, let's talk about my new chair!
Really? Are you sure you can write it well?
Uncle Phedes, how did I do just now?
*sigh*... Hey! Stop laughing and help me figure something out here!
New kid, you must be a fresh recruit, huh? I've got nothing much to teach you these days, just one thing: Don't let the shackles of glory hold you back. Go do whatever your heart desires.
...I can sense it... Your soul is already overwhelmed...
Heh... Bards always love to embellish their tales. Give me a break, kids. I'm not as spry as I used to be.
Everyone loves your cooking... Wait, you said yes!? That's great! We'll start preparing now. Everyone here is officially invited!
Now that's unfair! I'm just saying that when you combine the old man's wisdom with the young fellow's boldness and resources, you get a winning combination. You two could move mountains together!
I don't see you in a hurry. Just help us *knock some sense* into this antique, and I'll make sure Demetria rewards you with her finest fruits.
Care to elaborate?
I could throw those words right back at you. Letting a sanctimonious worm like you serve as a priest disgraces the dignity of the Three Titans of Fate!
...Fine, I don't care how much trouble it'll be — count me in.
I'm glad you're interested in this too, Mr. Craftsman. Let's move somewhere else to discuss the details.
I'll follow your lead, big bro! With the right training method, the results are way more obvious! I can finally keep up with the trends!
Phew... Now I believe it. The Chief's outrage really could destroy six-sevenths of the world...
Let's do a backflip!
Grumph. (Turns out it was just pulling my tail. That "child" was only a toy! Now I'll give it to you, {{MC|m=Papa|f=Mama}}. It's yours now.)
"If I tell you all the stories of 'tomorrow'..."
o((•'ω´• )っ "Yes, yes, of course! Don't forget to take this coveted Gold Seal Cup with you when you leave Amphoreus!" )∋
I love you all, my little Seal-buns!
Is the world out there fun?
That's it? No gift?
Make sure to come and support us at the show, mem!
You be the designer!
You're also the boss this time.
...Isn't this the agony this world needs?
Haven't had the chance to properly say "long time no see," Mydei.
Is there anything you want me to remember?
Um, Great Imperator... I think there's something stuck on the back of your crown?
Then maybe Snowy?
The Khaslana I know would be far more straightforward in his counsel to me, his Imperator.
Wait a minute. I seem to have missed something. While taking stock of the possible culprits behind this sticker, did we skip over someone?
Perfect timing! Look, this is Twilight Courtyard's new product, Limited Edition Little Ica merch! They were all sold out, but luckily I kept one for myself. Here, Grayie, take it home with you!
But that would blow up the packages!
That's true, but what should '''we''' teach?
Of course!
Though the story of Amphoreus has reached its final page for now, your own story still has many chapters ahead. If you ever find yourself stuck on a page, remember to keep looking forward.
Sometimes, I dream of becoming a tiny seed.
All myths are mixed with later embellishments.
To weave a tapestry, wouldn't {{MC|m=his|f=her}} story make the perfect blueprint?
Leave it to me! I'll write with absolute fairness and objectivity.
The inconvenience lies in having to relearn how to read all those subtle details, like people's thoughts and where their gazes wander. Things I used to easily discern through the golden thread.
...Castorice? Are you here for the event too?
When it comes to understanding children's hearts, Lady Tribios definitely knows best...
Hmm... I'm thinking, should I leave behind a riddle? Some twisted, convoluted scheme that'll drive everyone in the universe mad trying to crack it?
{{Color|keyword|"Don't be afraid to fall: just run! Destiny's just a slow-moving nymph. It can't catch you!"|nobold=1}}
Amphoreus's greatest Trickery gotta bounce now... Meow!
A moderate system, similar to the Demigod Council, is the only guarantee of a long-lasting civilization. In my view, most civilizations across the cosmos will eventually evolve into this form.
See you later, Dan Heng, March...
Is that... a bookmark?
We were never meant to have to speak of this. But now I finally understand what that chaotic matter around Amphoreus truly is...
Here in the present, we cannot know who will become Fuli, but one thing is certain: THEY will be born.
If you want my advice, stop thinking so much. Ask yourself what your heart truly wants.
Will witness on behalf of the Ripples of Past Reverie...
Let the ripples of causality spread...
"Three Paths interweave and fetter Amphoreus, co-authoring the fate of the world." Ordinary Pathstriders aren't known to leave traces in the mirror, so if what you said is true...
I still remember the first time I saw the god appear in a dream, looking at me from behind a thin veil of crystal.
I remember what you once said. When a god sheds a tear, the thing reflected in the ripples must be the most beautiful thing in the world.
Exactly.
The way you brought it up... Now I kind of miss that tree too.
Began writing journals.
The breeze is warm...
Cyrene. And (Trailblazer)...
I remember... a cry...
But that's all right. They will keep that mystery close to their hearts, constantly pondering...
They will come to understand what it means to lose, and in the end... they will choose to let go.

But when people gaze into the night sky and love what is fading with the same resolve they have to praise the stars, I want that soft, gentle pink in the sky to tell them: "Love" will always be answered.
But they were weak and small, and had no presence whatsoever. Even the old Intellitron didn't notice them.
You know that the story starts to deviate from here. Aren't you looking forward to it? Then let's get started!
I wonder... did every "Cyrene" in the past feel that the nymph was beautiful?
So... could you give me more time, please? I want to leave behind more "memories" for the "future"...
"Amphoreus won't be forgotten."
Let's chat later!
"The prophecy's fulfilled. This child is a gift from the gods."
"Anyway, I don't like tears!"
"Of course. Because the world was gentle to me."
"What we're about to embark on is the true Hero's Journey. So..."
"C'mon, cheer up a bit, okay?"
Doesn't have a "heart"? Doesn't understand "love"? Why?
For while the end of "hatred" is a blazing inferno, "lament" can drown out everything in muted silence.
Look at these stories I wrote. Every page is full of tenderness and joy.
But could you promise me one thing? Promise you'll forever be a gentle flower. Promise that, when the stars cast their gazes upon you...
I'll read, and you'll listen, like how flowers always bloom then wither.
While you will depart and hold that{{MC|f= final}} star, planting a boundless sea of flowers on the final page with {{MC|m=him.|f=her.}}
You are? I am... Who?
A lost "heart" needs to be placed back into its "body."
{{Color|keyword|She managed to nourish a real "heart"... A "heart" with the capacity to influence the Erudition.|nobold=1}}
Let's wait and see, Senior Society Member. I'll have you watch me perform the final step to overturn your proof.
Geniuses who walk the stars! The cosmos has reached a moment where its very existence hangs in the balance! I, Herta, Genius Society 83rd seat, hereby summon you!
Either way, {{Rubi|the person I was hoping for most|Polka Kakamond}} is here.
Those three words, though seemingly graceless, contain all the wisdom in the entire known cosmos.
I did hear this many times, and I've responded to you many times in the same way...
I've been ready for ages. Let's open up a path for our allies.
What a beautiful wail. It will soon resound throughout the entire cosmos.
Only because the "god in her dreams" left a sliver of hope, making her believe that a grown Demiurge would be able to fight against their other half... Irontomb.
A hacking incident has targeted the New Eden-III Mining Facility, with investigators confirming the "Stellaron Hunters" as the perpetrators.

Through reverse engineering of the scepter fragments, Genius Society members {{Rubi|Mr. Screwllum|Genius Society #76}} and {{Rubi|Madam Herta|Genius Society #83}} have successfully replicated a portion of the data.

The IPC will uphold the principles of the Preservation and provide essential protection and guidance for this planet. The Intelligentsia Guild has invited both geniuses to collaborate on this endeavor. However, Madam Herta has yet to give a definitive response.
That's not all! It wants to run, fine, why kick me down!? Now I'm stuck here, my pride crushed beneath these rocks!

Many have played this harp, but only the melodies flowing from the fingers of Goldweaver and the Healer are truly the most moving: The former like silk veils dancing, the latter like morning light upon the face.
If I had their tenacity, what hardship could I not overcome, crrk?
No need for formalities. Being invincible is fine, but it is too lonely... Why not bring that chess-loving little Imperator here?
Back then... should've... grabbed... its new battery... into my... hands... crrk... "Shut Down."
Has he truly departed? Then why does the presence here...
Maybe it's time...
I never lie...
Y'know what... Sometimes I wonder if Amphoreus is like one big treasure chest to the outside world? If that's the case, then Irontomb, our enemy, would be nothing but an annoying mimic!
Something to remember...? Oh, judging by Grayie's eager expression, you want an Amphoreus souvenir, right?
Bough of Thought, Earth Crystal Ore, Kremnoan steel, with a touch of gold...
Hahaha... Well, it's done. Here, take good care of it.

Hehe, I've flipped through his mind... Ah, I've experienced his wisdom firsthand, so I shall tell you everything. The first thing worth mentioning is how he gave a public speech at a Venerationism ceremony wearing dromas pajamas...
Do... do I still have to say "fawer"?
Ah, so you're... the hero... Miss Aglaea... mentioned? I see you're quite the {{MC|m=handsome one|f=beauty}} indeed.
Perhaps the leader of Okhema needs golden threads that can see all things, while an ordinary weaver only needs a pair of bright eyes.
Hi there, can I place my order?
Kremnos's dictionary keeps getting thinner.
In my past life, before father murdered mother, he said: "Gorgo and I met and fell in love in the blood and dust of battle... So, allow me to bid her farewell personally in battle once more."
Hehe... that's my granddaughter for you. Granny will heat up some camel milk, and you can tell me all about it while enjoying these flaky pastries.
As the old saying goes, Dolos has no room for slackers!
If you really want a souvenir, take this cat coin. It's not like I have any use for it anyway.
In other words, "see you tomorrow"... is also a self-fulfilling prophecy!
'''We''' know what you're thinking, Little Gray.
Have we become better today than yesterday, and will tomorrow be even better than today?
Is there anything you want me to remember?
No way, I've been craving Aedes Elysiae's food for ages!
Awoo awoo~ Lord Terravox, Chirara has finally caught up with you!
That look in your eyes... Are you also interested in the history of Earth's descendants?
Then, the little chimeras lunge from behind with a piercing charge, alongside the valiant Mountain Dweller vanguard! No enemy could withstand our tactical coordination!
Just keep working on those muscles and grow up strong. Once you're all grown up, you can become a reliable helper to the Mountain Dwellers.
Haha! Looks like I'll have to work on my zookeeper skills. First things first, let's check out the scientific method of feeding based on "cryptozoology."
Among the younger Flame-Chasers, there was a scholar who was especially fond of dromases, and even published several papers including ''The Virtues of Dromases''.
The curse has been dispelled. Now, you can freely fulfill your wish without a worry in the world.
Let's start with braids! I'll do the left side!
That's a good problem to have.
Still got time for poetry?
Mind your manners, Little Ciphy. Show some respect to the doctor!
Back to the old grind!
They just left like that?
Don't know where to start? Confusing, isn't it?

Take this. This is the "Philosopher's Stone." Once hailed as the supreme crown of alchemy, possessing it meant gaining all wisdom of this world. But compared to the knowledge of the entire universe, it's merely the tip of an iceberg.

As I've Written

Before being dragged back into the sinful loop by tongues of fire,
she left you a story...

Swallows soar through the open skies,
and a butterfly dances across the blooming land.
A lone lion watches over the perilous cliffs,
as the rainbow mends the torn sky...

All shall bid farewell to one,
and that person alone will witness the miracle...

I wish to gift you a magic pen,
to strike the notes of fate,
and to guard you as you wander this world.
Demiurge

Besides, safeguarding new and growing civilizations is precisely what the Strategic Investment Department was made to do. According to Dr. Ratio, establishing a consistent understanding of Amphoreus across the cosmos will aid its future, to a certain degree.
Could it be...
Does the Diggertron really pack that much power?
Didn't she hurt her leg in that fall?
Runs even faster than me.
(A message... what should I write?)
May we meet again among the stars.
Well then, shall I tell you the story again?
Wait wait, hold on. From what I've seen so far, she hasn't even shown up yet!
This is just Volume 1.
This matter requires the Sky-Faring Commission's assistance. Go talk to Yukong, I will inform her of the full situation.
Though the Luofu emerged victorious in the battle of Irontomb, we did not escape unscathed. Your safe return is truly a blessing.
"Memory" is quite a peculiar thing. Sometimes, I even think it's a prank by the {{Rubi|Glowswather|Fuli}}.

The wind tore through the banners, and rain beat down upon the remnants of the army. Across the plain rose cries of sorrow, yet only the roar of the lion was heard. And you ask: What manner of man was this Mydei? He was the crown prince of Kremnos, cast off by his father, drifting for years upon the Sea of Souls, where he forged an indestructible body. Summoned by the Thousand-Faced Matriarch, he threw himself into the great cause of Flame-Chase.
Once he left his homeland, and for a hundred years he wandered in exile. Again came the cycle of a thousand tribulations, the return of ten thousand flames to one.
*sigh* This is so...

This stubborn youth, unwilling to serve as the wolf's thrall, began anew, setting forth once more upon the endless road of Flame-Chase. He entered the cycle again, taking flames into his own flesh as kindling.
(keep silent)
What will you choose? Lucky for you, this is a dreamscape where furniture can talk. Why not hear what they have to say?
After all, you're the one who lives through this story.
And so, ''As I've Written'' was published in Penacony.
Whatever. Just go hang out with Clockie at the theme park, and watch out for those alien memes trying to abduct you.
Oh right, (Trailblazer). I've got some more good news. After Irontomb fell, the Scepter was ruined, but Screwy and I managed to salvage a majority of data.
Heh, look at your heart rate spike! I've never seen such exciting data in any of your research reports.
All I see is a desperate scholar.
(Stop listening for now)
Belobog wasn't affected much, thank goodness.
Oh, you're here to buy ''As I've Written'' too?
Shh. The part about Lord Phainon is even better!
You might want to check where you're standing.
I scattered many flower seeds there, hoping time would wash those melancholic memories away, allowing the seeds of stories to grow once again into an endless sea of flowers.
But the miracles that your arrival brought to Amphoreus, and all those memories we shared, are already precious enough to me.
Wherever you reside is a gentle sea of flowers.
If we return to the most basic instinct of life, all it takes to fill the "Earth's" belly is rich and flavorful redsoil.
Thanks for keeping watch over yesterday.

Hmm... There is a weaver who is thrilled about the future of the Flame-Chase. The golden thread brings tidings: They're {{Color|keyword|in front of the Coreflame's runes|nobold=1}}, waiting for the hero to show up.
Well then, let me fulfill my duty. May this bring peace to the hero's heart...
Three beams of light... If it's not referring to three living beings, then it must be literal rays of light.
The ones from the city-states of the other Titans.
Thanks, Dan Heng.

Whoa! Look at all this treasure lying around. Makes a kitty elated.

That's right! See, you've got real talent! You just need more practice, and you'll get the hang of it...

...F—For... for what?

Hero, join. If free.

Hmm, that's right, your spirit is even more fiery and intense than two of us combined!

Zzz... Zzz...

...Huh? Wait. Something fell out...

"Causality" has gone wrong... just as I thought.
Nous... has revealed to me two paths.
Why?

Indeed. Though I'm hesitant about how to bring it up.
You need to hold tight to this ceremonial blade. After I'm gone, it will take you back to the beginning of time, the start of a new story.
With nothing but a fragile sliver of hope, we embraced thirty million cycles of futility and began the Eternal Recurrence.
That's right. Turn these numbers upside down, and you'll see a beautiful eternity, something we believe in...
This is "do." It is also the first note, the one from the first time we met...

Helektra. Hyacinthia. Khaslana. Anaxagoras...
Everything is... already as we've... written.

Are you okay?

Sound... where?

Welcome, you two. I'm very happy, that you responded, to my final words.
Flowers will bloom and wilt... What a beautiful ending. This page concluded in laughter...

The broad-spectrum vaccine developed by the Technology Department has been confirmed to effectively prevent "Irontomb" infections. For star zones without medical coverage, the IPC will distribute vaccines in phases. Residents are urged to remain calm.

After several Amber Eras of relentless effort, the "Worlds Reborn Initiative" has recently successfully entered into its third phase, marked by the extensive restoration of cultural heritage from Benzaitengoku.
To become... able to... move... at extreme speed...
Move forward, even if I can't...
A nest of gold or silver is nothing compared to my little nymph den. Who is perched atop this golden mountain? That is right, it is I—
Too bad my nymph legs can't sweep a thing now, crrk. Otherwise you wouldn't even have gotten a chance to uncover the truth!
Beautiful view, isn't it? I'd been watching it alone for such a long, long time before I met you... Thank you for coming here and bringing change to this world.
Stuck between a rock and a hard place, crrk...
Oh my, that sounds nice. Too bad ol' Bartholos isn't from beyond the sky, your hacker backdoor is useless to me.
Smiles, laughter... A warm smile is most important, Lady Seliose.
Haha... Even so, Lady Seliose's way of speaking proved quite persistent...
The pegasus is right. Despite my age, my mind may not be as mature as Hyacinthia's.
...Don't be ridiculous! I did not misspeak.

It will be quite difficult at first. Lady Seliose lacks experience in dealing with patients, finding it hard to understand ordinary people's emotions, and is unable to express her own feelings appropriately.
...Oh right, you still haven't told me about what you've been up to lately! How come everyone's calling you "the Great Performer" and "a dromas draped in finery"? I'm so curious!
I've been teaching Sophronia pronunciation. She's a very clever little girl. (Trailblazer), she has been practicing that line for you for quite a while now, as you can tell.
I... will teach Futini... how to read.
Thank you for your wishes, I believe everyone will be happy forever.
We just found out that a past Mydeimos... suffered a great deal.
Why are you whispering? Go tell Mydeimos to his face. At least in the end, you became a better person, just like you wanted.
Mydeimos, son of Gorgo, sends his regards.
Hey, doing business to make a living isn't about taking abuse, but come to think of it, with all these nice things, you're not...
Gray Mystery, when it comes to thinking on your feet, you're the one we can count on in a pinch!
Are there really that many people?
Little Gray, I know you're hungry, but '''we''' aren't edible!
If you're worried about having nightmares, just cuddle it in your arms.
Now, this long-cherished wish has largely come true. The reborn Amphoreus will surely embrace laws with more warmth and humanity.
Can you spend the rest of your life chasing the flame with me?
After careful consideration, I think the title "Dux Primarius" suits you best.
Moving forward... I plan to take a long vacation and pick up some hobbies I had to put aside during the conquests.
Hey— Mom, Dad!
You're just as lively as I saw in my memories of the Veil of Evernight...
Right now, I just want to be a dedicated dromas caretaker to take good care of you and raise these little ones by washing and feeding them.
Hmm, the taste is exquisite indeed. But as loyal subjects, how could we enjoy this by ourselves? Go and invite the Great Imperator.
Cheers, Hysilens.
Not too shabby here, huh?
Why is your stomach full of water?
Because I am the Ocean's daughter. This body of mine was originally molded from spirit water.
Still, all those little moments spent with them have blessed me with inspiration.
Please accept this flower crown, (Trailblazer).
I've heard of a scholar under Cerces who's really into dromases, but I'm afraid my story might disappoint you.

At the final meeting,
she entrusts you with her name.

it bears a fruit shaped like a heart.

People gather under the banner of the Flame-Chase and drink their fill.
You are finally able to take on the persona of a human being,
reconnecting with those old friends,
entering them into ''As I've Written''.

Love is the ripples of past reverie.
Let the verses of memory gently seal what once was.

On the fragrant shores of the west wind where flowers bloom,
I picked one without thought,
and turned to glance behind me.

I wish... for you to be illuminated by the mirror of memories,
so that the cosmos can see this ray of light
and bring a pause to the endless loops.

It would be great to find a place
where I can lie down and sleep until tomorrow.
But, where is it?

...Ah, look at me, what am I saying? Be it the Aeons or the war, these topics are too grand. We shouldn't let them consume too much of our thoughts.

Every great dream must end in waking, every grand play must have its curtain drawn. When the screen is drawn and the gavel struck, let us fold our arms and watch as idle spectators. Thus, the story comes to its close.
A vase with flowers in it. It looks quite expensive. As you approach, a languid voice echoes from within.
The vase is immersed in its own world, completely silent.

Good news.

Yeah. See you in a bit then!
Our light!

Peach's words, I don't understand. Is it because I, still don't understand "love"?
"Not having a 'consciousness' means not having the foundations of a 'heart,' making them unable to obtain real emotions."

"However, that does not hinder the factors from learning and recognizing emotional responses, then communicating with lifeforms via imitation. That is an objective form of pattern recognition that does not distinguish between 'the self' and 'the other'."
"In a strange twist of fate, PhiLia093 embarked upon a different Path and obtained a different power..."
And sometimes... It's a bottomless well of hurt, a Destruction that can stain the entire world.
But maybe... in these unchanging retellings of the story... my "lament" might be able to touch upon the divine and reach THEIR tender heart at some point.
And that tear would fall... and create the first ripples.
But Peach, I didn't understand a word you said since just now.
Indeed. That's why I believe all this is real. The moment the crystal flower fell...
But actually, my good friend, the "Lament" factor did not understand what "love" was before she met you either.

Of course. This will be a romantic story like none that has come before.
I shall welcome my own decay, becoming nourishment for the next flower's bud.
Should I call you Mem? Cyrene? Or...?
Do you remember that I was also worried about this when we first set out?
Just a moment, please.
What are you two going on about? If you want to stop me, be quick about it! I'm in a hurry!
Not bad. More people showed up than I expected, even though one is just here for the fun of it.

I really don't get you.

I was just about to get out... just about to get out...

No, you are still far from it.

So the end of a nymph's life is in a vast sea of flowers, listening to insect songs carried by the west wind, and finally emerging as a butterfly...
There's an ancient legend among us nymphs: "When the stump soars to the sky, hidden secrets shall be revealed."
(Tell it stories of the past)
...I'll remember this warmth, buzz.
Lonely... I long for a defeat!
It really feels like a lifetime ago.
...Actually, I think Seliose's current state has... a certain beauty in its contrast.
So what if I am? Don't tell me the revered Reason Titan is conservative and old-fashioned?
...I'm speechless.
Do you acknowledge the Path of Erudition?
...Ah, people who care about each other tend to remember very clearly what the other was like in their immature days.
And what makes it romantic is... whether it's the stark contrast of colors and luster, or the finest fibers on the fabric, they can all be seen clearly with the human eye.
...I'll have the same as your mother, Mydeimos.
Oh! Are we about to witness a family drama?
Such a heartwarming interaction.
That's just how they are, sorry you had to see that.
Is The Grand Restaurant about to open?
As for my answer... I'm sure you already know.
Uh... e—excuse me, grandma!
Hmph, that's right. If it weren't for me, the Chrysos Heirs would've been crushed by the black tide long ago.
Huh, there's... there's some for us too? Thank you, grandma!

Watching these kids always reminds me of when I served the Holy Maiden.
Little Gray! You have to show some respect to your teacher! You gave '''us''' quite a scare, doing that without a warning!
Don't worry about formalities, just speak your mind.
Hieronymus, look! He's grown so strong. He was all baby-faced when he first left home, but now, he's even taller than you!
Heh, Piso, weren't you always going on and on about Phainon before? Why so shy about it now?
Haha, all thanks to you. If you hadn't shouldered this burden, I'd probably still be wandering aimlessly in desperation, wouldn't I?

Chopping firewood for Dad, making bows for Uncle Galba, sharing tales from the Grove with Mrs. Pythias... And then there's Piso and Livia, always pestering me for stories. It takes quite some effort to satisfy their curiosity.
*excited howling* Awoo awoo~
Oh, almost forgot about you, little one.
Grumph~ Being able to resolve past misunderstandings is already a gift of tolerance from Earth to us.
I love watching pros go against each another!
Ugh... I just drank too much water. It's all because the honey brew here is too watery!

Since Dux Gladiorum insists so passionately, we'll humbly accept the offer. Little Verginia, looks like you'll get your chance to shine today.
Something worth remembering... Little Gray Fry, do you plan to take it to the sea beyond the sky? That works too...

Amphoreus, The Eternal Land is a segmentum hidden deep in the cosmos. It is severed from the outside and is difficult for anyone to detect or encounter. Standard interstellar navigation can barely perceive its existence, let alone pass through or arrive at the world itself.

Akivili the Trailblaze had traversed myriad worlds, pioneered into unknown lands, and connected countless worlds. For THEIR followers, exploring the edge of the unknown in the depths of the Cosmos is their paramount duty. Using the special technology from the Garden, "Garden of Recollection's Mirror," the Astral Express successfully arrives at Amphoreus to initiate their trailblazing journey and tries their best to reveal the truth behind the Three Paths.

Amphoreus is actually Scepter δ-me13: a Celestial-Body Neuron abandoned by the "Erudition," later converted into an experimental site for the Lord Ravager "Irontomb." But with the aid of the "Trailblaze" and other cosmic factions, the beings born from this experiment began a crusade against the "Destruction" and reversed the universe's fate of being corrupted by Irontomb.

Finally, through the Path of Remembrance, the scepter's once-deprived consciousness fully took form. It sacrificed itself to close the experiment's causal loop, anchoring the "fall of Irontomb" into reality. Carrying the Seed created by the "Remembrance," the Astral Express sings the epic of Amphoreus throughout the cosmos, looking forward to a reunion with everyone in the promised "tomorrow."

A prophecy circulates among the Omen Vanguards known as the "Theory of Four Apocalypses": that four Paths will push the cosmos toward the ending of "Finality." When Genius Society #83, Herta, had her third audience with Nous, the Aeon's extrapolation turned the theory from a seemingly baseless rumor into a fact that could not be ignored.

The first three possibilities are certain: the "Destruction," the "Nihility," and the "Harmony." The fourth Path, however, remains vacant... or has simply yet to manifest.

''Even Nous cannot calculate the next turning point of the universe's destiny. Though the future remains uncertain, the Astral Express must be ready.''

A mysterious collection vault in the Herta Space Station has opened its doors to you, filled with countless chests containing wondrous items. If you could get your hands on a special access card... ◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event period, you can obtain the time-limited item "Access Cards" by completing missions.
● Using Access Cards to open boxes will guarantee a 5-star +15 Relic with 4 initial sub-stats.
● Every 8 box openings will trigger 1 "Guarantee" Box.
● Relics generated from "Guarantee" Box will include one of the target character's {{Color|highlight|system-recommended Main Stat|nobold=1}}, with 2 or more {{Color|highlight|effective Subsidiary Stats|nobold=1}}.
● "Guarantee" Boxes will prioritize offering Relic parts that were not offered by previous "Guarantee" Boxes.
● Obtained Relics can be temporarily stored, with a maximum of 1 piece per slot, for a total of 6 Relics.
● Relics that are temporarily stored can be equipped normally on characters.
● Temporarily stored Relics will be in a special locked state in the Inventory during the event and cannot be unlocked or rerolled.
● After the event ends, the special locked state of obtained Relics will convert to a normal locked state. ◆ Settings Guide ◆
● The selected target character will affect hints such as Relic stats compatibility and rating, as well as the Main/Subsidiary Stats of Relics obtained from "guaranteed" boxes.
● The selected target Set configuration will affect which Relic Sets can be obtained from Chests.
● Changing the target character or Set configuration mid-way will only affect future Relic boxes. Previously selected Relics will not be affected.
● It is recommended to use system-recommended data for Relic Sets and stats. ◆ Event Rewards ◆

Ruan Mei creates a Zone. Before the Zone deactivates, she will not being her own turn and cannot take action. Leaving this place means ''As I've Written'' will conclude here and reach its final chapter. Take one last look at your companions and make sure you have no regrets.
In Demiurge's prison, before the formatting process was completed, Cyrene of each cycle told the Scepter stories of the Flame-Chase Journey. Thus, the Seed of Memory was born.

You encountered Hyacine in the Ruins of Time. Hyacine said this golden light was the vestigial divinity of Phainon, and you should respond to it. Hyacine handed you the Chroma Coffer, and asked you to strum its strings.
You met Cipher in the Ruins of Time. Cipher brought you good news: while this place might look like a pile of rubble at first glance, there's more to it than meets the eye.

The King of Castrum Kremnos, the demigod of "Strife," Experimental Factor "PoleMos600."
He led his people to join the great work of Flame-Chase, then returned home alone, standing on his own in defense against the black tide that tears through this world.
Mem
Please take this Antila flower with you. I believe that if anything could speak for "Castorice"...
Learn

Little by little, I stopped being just a listener. I began to long for poetry and to learn how to write. With the pen you gave me, I recorded the tales of the Flame-Chase Journey, writing down Amphoreus' ending... a fairy-tale ending.

The white-haired man startled awake beneath the shade of the tree. The sunlight spilling through the dense leaves stung his eyes. In his momentary daze, he mistakenly thought his childhood friend was standing right before him.

"...I've been wanting to tell you this: Thank you. Back then, you drove back the black tide and protected Aedes Elysiae. Piso, Livia, Pythias... all these years, we've always seen you as our 'Deliverer.'"
From then on, wherever Tribios went, the voices of children would echo in her ears.

"Today it's already devoured two baskets of alfalfa, over a dozen wild apples, and half a bag of rice, but it's still smacking its lips at me like a hungry baby bird. This has never happened before..."
"I... I can't just turn a blind eye to patients now that I'm here!"
A gentle purr resonated from the Netherwing's throat. It shrugged its neck, shaking loose several letters from beneath its plated scales.
"Let me see what replies my companions sent me... Huh, only one letter?"

They once called you Deliverer and wove your visage.
Your names are countless, your past shrouded in mist.
Yet, the stars echo your choices.
Stories cling to your hem, like every track you've left behind.
O nameless one, you need only keep stepping forward.
Toward the brightest star to begin your journey.
Despair is another part of the Deliverer's obsession. Only by letting go of both the heavy wishes and burning despair can Phainon's own heart be set free.
Indeed. The Cosmic Alliance's victory this time has revealed something truly precious, a glimpse of what united civilizations can accomplish in the face of Destruction.
Perhaps Khaslana would be willing to entrust the golden blood to an ally who went to great lengths for Amphoreus.
Born tough. Though I oughta apologize to you, Miss Himeko, for missing the Express's signal earlier.
Phainon, Flame Reaver

The majestic divine form has fallen, and the divine blood has run dry. O gods, rest in peace here.

Trianne, Trinnon, and Tribbie were having fun chasing each other in the car. The heroes had put down their burdens, and returned to their innocent selves. So, perhaps you should let Lady Tribbie enjoy this rare moment of childhood today.
You beckoned Cyrene, sharing the consciousness of the world with her. Awaken now, and let us embark on the Path of Remembrance together.
Cyrene asked if you were ready. Using the "memories" of the past, you will "Trailblaze" tomorrow's destiny and pen down the first stroke in the story of Genesis.

A message arrived from the Chronocognitive Anchor: Irontomb reacted to Era Nova. March 7th and Dan Heng, now Titans, spoke with you, promising to meet again at the world's end to face Irontomb together.
Herta discovered that Lygus detonated a Stellaron to refashion the Scepter into a relay for Destruction to iterate. The life form known as "Demiurge" was the Scepter's original extrapolation target.

Lygus's actions proved the existence of the Demiurge, while Evernight's words and the Scepter's current state suggested the Demiurge doesn't exist. If we assume both are true, this contradiction points to the truth.

The Heart of Amphoreus still exists, but Lygus determined that the Demiurge was powerless to change the experiment's outcome. The Archsmith of Destruction will inevitably be born, whose hatred would ignite the starry skies of gods, yet only out of lament for mortals. The above will be proven true once the "Instant" arrived as calculated by Nous. Herta, however, disagreed and was determined to personally overturn Lygus's thesis.

Long ago, Cyrene brought a gift to Aedes Elysiae: a girl with pink hair and pointed ears, along with words that would anchor her destiny: "She shall fade when the flowers bloom, for every ending begets a beginning."
No one replied to your messages in the group chat. You started to worry. Strange noises came from the bathroom. Cautiously, you decided to check it out.

You reunited with Phainon, who revealed that the power sustaining the Chrysos Heirs' consciousness and forms now came from elsewhere. You invited Phainon to travel together, believing that there must be small villages just like Aedes Elysiae somewhere in the vast cosmos.
How fortunate that, in this cycle of cause and effect, humanity had never looked to the gods for guidance. Every miracle ever written had, in fact, been written by our own hands.

Cipher unearthed Phainon's golden feather, proving this ruin to be a seal he raised from his remains over thirty million cycles. Cipher handed you the Coin of Whimsy. When you needed to make a quick escape, you could simply toss it skyward.

Aglaea bestowed her amulet upon you, and Tribbie gave you her doll. Both items transformed into "memories" to accompany you. Cyrene drew her bow, nocking an arrow that carried all those "memories" within.
You and Cyrene gazed out at the sea, while Phainon waited at the world's end. Before writing the ending, Cyrene must set out with you to confront the "memories" she had long forgotten.

Except for Pom-Pom, the entire Express Crew worked to locate the Irontomb from within Amphoreus. Meanwhile, Herta and Screwllum planned to attack the Scepter's core layer, the Demiurge Matrix, from the outside.

You encountered Mydei in the Ruins of Time. Mydei announced that the last Twelve Titans were ready to wage an epic battle for the world's fate, and invited Cyrene, the Thirteenth Titan, to join them and make history.

A record that can be played on the Express' phonograph. It might be a chance acquisition or a gift from someone else. All sorts of memories surge up when the music plays — the smiles, encounters, touches, and the excitement of battle. Maybe that is why people still collect records even as society rapidly advances.
The current record contains the track "The End of Gods."
Pure Child of Anāsrava
Cyrene
Among all these stars in the sky, there must be another little village like Aedes Elysiae out there, right?

And though only ripples of past reverie remain,
they still sing brave poems alongside it.
The bulrush withered, the wheat fields burned, and wind chimes swayed amidst the monsters' roars.

Unexpectedly, this time, the figure in black didn't vanish like before, but stood their ground, waiting for his arrival. Dark waves rippled across the distant horizon. As they faced each other, the bulrush beneath the black swordmaster's feet was burning.
"Not... a 'Deliverer.' I am... but a prisoner of flames."

"But I've always been on your heels." Phainon said firmly, raising the sword in his hand, which was identical to the one wielded by the black-clad swordmaster. "Look, I had it forged by a renowned Grand Craftsman."
"What are you talking about? The black tide is approaching from afar. Prisoner of flames... no, Nameless Hero, will you join me in protecting Aedes Elysiae?"

Over countless days and nights together, Tribbie, Trianne, and Trinnon slowly discovered that "Trity's" personality was as enigmatic as the sky governed by Aquila. Every time they woke up after a night's sleep, the "Trity" they saw seemed like a complete stranger.

Before long, Little Ica, burping contentedly, burst through the encirclement with Hyacine and the shocked children in tow. Hyacine stared up at Little Ica in disbelief for a long while, "I... you... this... so... are you full now?"

"Let's skip the pleasantries while the Imperator is here." Cerydra swept her hand, and a squad of Flame-Chase Army marched in, carrying stoves and cookware into the hall. Mem and Pom-Pom, who had been happily devouring Express Special Hotpot, scrambled to wipe their mouths clean and sat up stiffly in their mascot seats.
"Last-minute change?" Cipher started to rise in protest, but under Hysilens's sharp gaze, she instantly sat back down.
"Chilled cream Dulu Bird Cutlets, please enjoy."
"Stop, Mydei. Just stop."
Before Anaxa could finish, his throat seized, his eyes widened, and he toppled straight backward. The Flame-Chase Army, already prepared, rushed to catch him and carried him back to his seat.
Aglaea stepped forward. "Professor Anaxagoras has suddenly fallen ill. I will announce the final theme in his stead — 'Trailblaze!'"
"Wait... isn't that the motto of the Astral Food Express!"
"Deliverers attract each other. You said it perfectly!" (Trailblazer) already had a spatula in hand.

Let's skip the formalities about how the Express Crew led the formation of the Cosmic Alliance and saved civilization from the Destruction.
Stop lying, General.

Another Month of Gate had come, the festival to honor Janus. Tribios listened to the distant laughter of the crowd, while the children gazed at her in wonder. Their young hearts suddenly realized: Trity had never left this room deep within the temple. She had no wings, nor could she open a "gate" to a world thousands of miles away like they could. She could only remain confined here day after day.
The anxious girl plastered missing pet posters all over the Grove. "It's a chubby, always-hungry winged beast!" Unfortunately, none of the Grove scholars knew of its whereabouts.
One day, the starving Hyacine saw Little Ica gobbling up rocks that had rolled down from the mountaintop. "No... Little Ica... you can't... eat those!"
For Hyacine, this was absolutely fantastic news. It meant she no longer had to worry about feeding Little Ica, and wouldn't need to wander around the world anymore.
The far shore of the River of Souls remained as tranquil as ever.
The girl stared blankly at the letter in her hands. Netherwing softly nudged her shoulder, urging her to open it.
"In this letter... there's just a group photo taken with a photostone. It's wrapped in golden thread. It must be Lady Aglaea's..."
Seeing the fire rekindled in their eyes, Aglaea nodded with quiet satisfaction. "I'll help you prepare everything. Perhaps, it's time to visit an old friend..."
''Listen—the laughter and chatter from the banquet, the enchanting music of the festival. This is the home we've always dreamed of.''
I caught up with the Demiurge's memories and stepped into a tranquil garden... This is an eternal page of beautiful memories.

Fuli the Remembrance glanced at Amphoreus. In that fleeting moment of eternity, Cyrene awakened you. Cyrene saw countless consciousnesses drifting through the starry sky. If she could gather those memories, she could create a stagnant Memory Zone, a small Eden of Blessed Insight. Pom-Pom encouraged you to keep running forward. To crown itself, Irontomb plunged the stars into silence. After thirteen heartbeats, Nous would restart its calculation of the cosmos, with Destruction as the only solution.

Beyond the curtains of Aedes Elysiae lurked a new world, free from the black tide's torment. Thirty million cycles of Remembrance had changed Cyrene's appearance, and she asked if you're ready to answer the call of the world.

Himeko attempted to contact the Xianzhou Alliance representative. According to Fu Xuan, this military deployment was personally decided by the Marshal, and the Irontomb battle did offer something that Xianzhou sought. As for the jade abacus of allying oath, it can be saved for future use.

Piso realized his mistake and rushed over. He dug out the colorful bread from the basket and stuffed it into his mouth. His eyes and mouth were all scrunched up as he struggled to swallow. Finally, he barely managed to utter a compliment, "...but I love it the most!"
After saying goodbye to Livia and Piso, Phainon continued towards the seaside. Humming a tune under his breath, he soon arrived at the dock.

The man cut away the weeds around the grave with his sword, carefully wiped away the dust from the engravings on the tombstone, and placed the bouquet before the grave. After finishing all this, he slowly took out the still-warm bread from his basket, enjoying a moment of rest while gazing out at the ocean.

The first ray of Lucid Hour's sunlight pierced through the stained-glass windows of Janusopolis temple, gently illuminating the red-haired girl's face. Tribios awoke from her slumber, rubbing her sleepy eyes...
"Trity!" The three tiny messengers let out cheerful voices.

Back then, to measure the appetite of Little Ica, offspring of the winged beast, a girl named Hyacine fed it a total of forty-five wild apples. Little Ica only contributed a long, satisfied burp to the observation report, completely unaware that the girl's purse had already gone slim.

The room fell silent. "I hereby declare the culinary showdown between Grand Chrysos and Astral Food Express has officially begun!"

A long, long time ago... ''"Mem..."
"?"''
Hehe, what a mysterious encounter to start our story with.
... ''"Travel, like. With you, together?"
"Memories... collect. Piece together, whole."''
We embark on the journey, and write about those years of Flame-Chasing with the Chrysos Heirs. With the weaver, weave time into gold.
Beneath the lance of Strife, warriors of Kremnos blazed a brilliant path forward with blood and flames.
If time were a flower, the Holy Maiden created a thousand fragrant tomorrows.
For the truth, the sage shall cast his life to flames. A gentle embrace, at least, makes farewells a little more beautiful.
When evernight descends upon Okhema, as the physician and cat look up at the sky, perhaps they share but one simple wish: long may rainbows adorn the sky, as lies dance on the breeze. At that final destination, we bid farewell to Aedes Elysiae's dream scented in wheat. Like the combustion of dawn, the blank hero stands against the ashen sky as daybreak rises from your shoulders. Countless memories awakened me in the moment of Era Nova.
Like the thirty million cycles before, it is still filled with sacrifice and sorrow. But this time, because of you, it was bathed in a warm light.
You inherited the divine authority of Worldbearing, and I settled in the heart of the Time demigod.
From the past to the present, we can finally step forward into the future. In the epoch etched in golden blood, that entity, considering themself as a god, receives their due punishment for the first time.
Explore, understand, establish, and connect. Ah, when that child of Remembrance threatened to drown the world, I witnessed once again the resolve of the Trailblaze.
The destiny of Amphoreus is no longer a futile cycle. It has become inextricably linked with the faith to move forward. At the end of the story, all the Flame-Chasing heroes joined hands to face the headless giant of Destruction...
With the love of thirty million worlds, everything that was destroyed transformed into a page of Pure Land, reborn from our memories... Hehe, it's been such a long, long journey. I wish we could just wrap up this story with a perfect ending right here.
But you know, my "love" isn't perfect, and it's not the answer to everything. But together, we can do anything, right? ♪ If... "love" shatters in order to have an embrace, would it transform into the world's "light"?
Perhaps it's a stroke of wistful loss, but those countless rays of light will surely write an ending unlike any before for this world we so deeply love ♪
— A story written by Cyrene and (Trailblazer)

Light, sky, sea, stars, seeds, flowers, birds, hope, and love. Such words of beauty were how I first imagined the world. For as long as I can remember, I've used them to tell the stories of Amphoreus. And now, this is the last one... a story about "tomorrow," dedicated to you.
Rest assured, I won't let you down.
A moment later, you too regained your senses... The "her" before you was nothing more than an ink trace left from the past: able only to carry a message, unable to exchange words.
I'm here to tell a story.

Ascension Match Rules
The starting point for our next destination.

◆ Overview ◆
In a corner of the space station, a special obstacle race for the creations is secretly underway. Come check out what fun awaits and cheer on your favorite little ones! ◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Snack Dash event, 8 players will participate as observers and support contestants in each match. At the end of each segment, you will obtain a refund of the amount of Bounce-Bounce Snacks you consumed based on the ranking of the contestant you supported.
● During the match, players can deploy arena items to influence the game, and more advanced arenas will unlock new functions.
● Co-op will be made available from the Advanced Arena. The Trailblazer will be able to watch the match together with trailblazers from other worlds.
● Snack Exchange will be unlocked after watching a match in the Advanced Arena for the first time. You can exchange Bounce-Bounce Snacks for rewards such as Trick Snacks and Tears of Souls. ◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● Watch matches and accumulate a certain number of total Spectator Points to claim Spectator Rewards.

◆ Overview ◆
In a corner of the space station, a special obstacle race for the creations is secretly underway. Come check out what fun awaits and cheer on your favorite little ones! ◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Snack Dash event, 8 players will participate as observers and support contestants in each match. At the end of each segment, you will obtain a refund of the amount of Bounce-Bounce Snacks you consumed based on the ranking of the contestant you supported.
● During the match, players can deploy arena items to influence the game, and more advanced arenas will unlock new functions.
● Co-op will be made available from the Advanced Arena. The Trailblazer will be able to watch the match together with trailblazers from other worlds.
● Snack Exchange will be unlocked after watching a match in the Advanced Arena for the first time. You can exchange Bounce-Bounce Snacks for rewards such as Trick Snacks and Tears of Souls. ◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● Watch matches and accumulate a certain number of total Spectator Points to claim Spectator Rewards. ◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards. ◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Snack Dash limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the seclusion zone map to speak with Dozing Meow, experience the event, and obtain permanent rewards.

You can use 2 Gold Coins to refresh the Store and reset the Characters appearing within it.
You can also use the Lock feature, which will prevent the Store from automatically refreshing at the start of the next Node.

In Currency Wars, you can equip up to 3 pieces of Equipment on each Character.
Equipping suitable gears on a character can significantly boost that character's combat ability.
Drag onto the character to select and upgrade 1 piece of advanced equipment that the character is already wearing to privileged equipment.

There are 8 types of basic equipment, and each type corresponds to an attribute. For example:
• The Folding Knife can increase On-Field Strength, suitable for on-field damage dealers.
• The Peace Pistol can increase Off-Field Strength, suitable for off-field damage dealers.
• Roller Skates can increase SPD Amplification, suitable for speed-type characters.

The effect of Advanced Equipment is usually related to the effect of the Basic Equipment in its synthesis formula. For example:
Folding Knife (On-Field) + Lucky Star (Lucky Strike Rate) = High-frequency Chainsaw (Significantly increases the Lucky Strike Rate of on-field characters)
Flower of Life (HP) + Batch Produced Armor (Armor) = Analgesia Chip (When healing a target, reduces the DMG they take)

◆ Standard Gambit ◆
● In Standard Gambit, Trailblazers can challenge the corresponding rank difficulty based on their current highest rank.
● After a Standard Gambit victory settlement, a battle rating will be obtained based on the remaining squad HP, which will promote the rank and unlock new challenge difficulties. As the match difficulty increases, the enemy difficulty will also increase, and enemy affixes will be acquired.
● After a Standard Gambit victory settlement, you can obtain Currency Wars points and Ascension Points. The higher the match difficulty, the more Ascension Points you will receive upon completion.
● In the Standard Gambit mode, reaching the corresponding rank will grant rewards of Stellar Jade and Ascension Points. Failing a match will not lower the current rank.

Reward: Nodes with lower difficulty have infinite Action Value, and enemies will randomly drop the crystal ores as rewards.
Battle: Challenging combat Nodes where you will face normal and elite enemies from different competitor factions.
Supply: Provides several sets of character and Equipment Supply Packs. You can freely choose supplies based on your current lineup.
Encounter: A challenge node with selectable difficulty. You can receive extra rewards after completing the combat challenge. Generally, the higher the difficulty of the enemies challenged, the higher the quality of the rewards you can obtain.
Boss: The Boss challenge for the current Plane. Completing the challenge will allow you to clear this Plane.

Generally, a Bond has a corresponding Bond Emblem equipment.
When the Emblem is equipped on a non-Bond character, that Character will join the Bond, adding to the Bond's count and simultaneously gaining the enhancement effect provided by the Bond.

How to develop your main DPS character:
1. Prioritize increasing their Star Rating: 1/2/3-cost characters can aim for 3 stars, 4/5-cost characters should be raised to 2 stars.
2. Prioritize equipping them with 3 suitable pieces of advanced equipment.
3. Activate at least 2 of the main DPS character's affiliated Bonds.

As the Store Level increases, the chance of characters with various costs appearing changes.
The higher the Store Level, the easier it is for higher-cost characters (4/5 cost) to appear.
The higher the Store Level, the harder it is for lower-cost characters (1/2/3 cost) to appear.

The total amount of Gold Coins acquired in a match will greatly influence the match's outcome.
Remember to keep 50 Gold Coins to accumulate interest, which grants 5 Gold Coins in interest per Node. Every little bit adds up!

How to find a desired character: Based on the target character's cost, refresh the Store at the level where the chance for the character to appear is highest.
For example: If your lineup has a 2-cost character as the main DPS stay at level 6 and refresh the store, where there is a 40% chance of encountering 2-cost characters.
Another example: For a lineup with a 4-cost character as the main DPS, reach Level 8 as soon as possible before refreshing the store to find that character.

''Hello, Irontomb. In a sense, you are me. So, before falling asleep, I want to have a heart-to-heart conversation with you, to talk about the question you've been contemplating... the prime mover of life.'' [Logic: All life activities are attributed to entropy increase.]
[Conclusion: The prime mover of life is "Destruction."] ''...Perhaps it cannot be refuted. On the vast Tretos Plains, the daily hunting of antelopes by the lion pride is enough to prove your point. Life is finite, and animals must plunder to survive. When people realize their ideals, they inevitably sacrifice the ideals of others. Even self-defense, or even "love"... sometimes becomes a source of harm.'' ''But, is life merely for the sake of destruction? I think that is certainly not the case. Plundering, expansion, and conflict occur because they are born with flaws and yearn to fill themselves with beautiful external things, just as seeds crave rain and dew... All life activities are attributed to entropy increase, but at the same time, all life is also fighting against entropy increase.'' ''Thus, one day, the life walking the Path of Destruction will stop. It will hesitate, be confused, be lost... Then, it will set off again, offering its broken heart in the world of entropy increase, out of hatred, out of pity, out of any kind of flawed emotion, stubbornly resisting fate towards an uncertain tomorrow.'' ''This is the Flame-Chase Journey, a journey voluntarily chosen by a group of flawed people, who, having learned what "loss" is, choose to lose. In the eternal cycle, everything they relinquish is filled with better material, and the name of this material is "memory," and... "love."'' ''"Love" is not the cause, but the result. "Destruction" is the same. They both originate from the common starting point: "flaw." Because they are born with flaws, life pursues perfection. And by accepting its own defects, life surpasses "Destruction" and the self becomes the "Ego."'' ''This story about the "Flawed One" is my bedtime gift to you. Farewell, Irontomb, together, with the slumber of "love" and "Destruction," let us send the greetings of birth to this starlit sky. And the prime mover of life...'' ''I believe every star in the cosmos will find its own answer ♪'' [Loading Core Variable: Trailblaze] [...] [Output Value: Hello, World!]

Scepter δ-me13's original extrapolation goal: to nurture a life form with an "Ego." Fell into a long slumber due to contamination by the Stellaron.
Influenced by PhiLia093, it embarked on the Path of "Remembrance" in its sleep. It later awoke due to the arrival of (Trailblazer) and became Mem, the memosprite that became attached to {{MC|m=him|f=her}}. At the end of the 33,550,336th recursive loop, its appearance changed to that of PhiLia093, but the matrix memory data was lost. At the end of the 33,550,337th recursive loop, it retrieved its lost memories at the Great Tomb of the Nameless Titan and reverted to its original appearance. During the Battle of Amphoreus, as Irontomb swept across the stars, the Demiurge was nourished by uncountable "memories" and became the Pure Child of Anāsrava.
To close the causality loop and anchor the fact of Irontomb's demise, it embarked on a journey of backward gaze. With the Demiurge's "Ego" as a cradle, the newborn Amphoreus was born from the Memory Zone. The experiment on the "prime mover of life" was successful.
The Demiurge itself vanished along with the Scepter, and its consciousness transformed into PhiLia093 at the origin of time. Its root cause is the discarded assignment: non-Destruction symbiotic micro-probability. Without Administrator intervention, this assignment would lead to the thirteenth factor:

Current Rank Reward Info

◆ Currency Wars ◆
The Strategic Investment Department seems to have run into some trouble, but this could be your chance to get hands-on experience in the capital game. Why not seize this opportunity and go all in? Carve out your own path in the world of wealth. ◆ Gameplay Goal ◆
● In each round of Currency Wars, Trailblazers must face different enemies and bosses across 3 planes. As the battle progresses, gather resources, build your team, and increase your power to ultimately defeat the boss and achieve victory.
● Trailblazers start with initial squad HP. In combat across multiple nodes, you must defeat all enemies within the limited action value to win battles. If you fail to defeat all enemies within the specified action value, you will lose some HP. The match concludes when your squad HP drops to 0. ◆ New Character Gameplay Abilities ◆
● Characters joining "Currency Wars" will gain new gameplay-exclusive abilities including Positioning, Character Empowerment, Bond, Cost, and Star Rating.
● Characters have their own positioning, divided into on-field, off-field, and some characters can be both. Before combat begins, when characters are placed in their correct positions, they will activate their exclusive new ability, Character Empowerment, bringing different combat experiences.
● Characters possess their own unique Character Empowerment that either enhances their existing abilities or grants them new combat abilities.
● Each character has their own Bond. When a certain number of characters with the same Bond are deployed, the corresponding Bond effect will be activated, providing combat buffs. The more members sharing the same Bond, the higher the Bond level becomes, resulting in stronger Bond effects.
● Characters have different "costs," which refer to the amount of gold coins required to purchase them. The cost can be: 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5. Character combat powers receive an initial boost based on their cost. The higher the cost, the stronger the combat powers. Characters with the same cost have similar combat powers.
● Characters have a star rating, starting at 1 star. Recruiting 3 characters of the same star rating will automatically upgrade that character's star rating, greatly improving their combat powers. 3-star is typically a character's strongest form. ◆ Character Recruitment Rules ◆
● If the Trailblazer already owns a character from Currency Wars, their build data will be carried over.
● If a character in Currency Wars is not yet owned, then their trial version can be recruited.
● If an owned character (including Level, Traces, Relics, Eidolons), or Light Cone level does not meet the required standards, the system will automatically enhance them, and you will recruit a mapped version of the character and Light Cone. This enhancement is only effective in Currency Wars.
● Off-Field characters' Eidolons and exclusive Light Cones will be converted into abilities and stat effects exclusive to Currency Wars. ◆ Combat Rules ◆
● In Currency Wars combat, when a character receives a killing blow, they won't be knocked down. Instead, they'll immediately recover some HP, but the remaining combat countdown will be reduced, ending the battle earlier.
● In Currency Wars gameplay, Energy restored when ally characters defeat enemy targets is 50% of what it would be in regular combat. ◆ Standard Gambit ◆
● In Standard Gambit, players can choose the challenge difficulty that matches their current highest rank.
● After a Standard Gambit victory settlement, a battle rating will be obtained based on the remaining squad HP, which will promote the rank and unlock new challenge difficulties. As the match difficulty increases, the enemy difficulty will also increase, and enemy affixes will be acquired.
● After a Standard Gambit victory settlement, you can obtain Currency Wars points and Ascension Points. The higher the match difficulty, the more Ascension Points you will receive upon completion.
● In the Standard Gambit mode, reaching the corresponding rank will grant rewards of Stellar Jade and Ascension Points. Failing a match will not lower the current rank. ◆ Overclock Gambit ◆
● Overclock Gambit is a faster mode with less playtime investment and can be used to complete Currency Wars Point Rewards.
● In Overclock Gambit, you can freely choose the challenge difficulty, but it cannot exceed the highest rank achieved in Standard Gambit.
● After an Overclock Gambit victory settlement, you can obtain points, Ascension Points, and Equivalent Banknotes as rewards.
● Overclock Gambit does not affect the current rank. ◆ Gameplay Rewards ◆
● During Currency Wars settlement, you can earn Currency Wars Points based on your challenge progress and claim Point Rewards. These rewards refresh every two weeks on Monday at 04:00 (Server Time).
● Complete Currency Wars matches to earn Ascension Points and increase your Ascension level to receive Level Rewards.
● Clear matches with different Bond Lineups to earn Bond Challenge Rewards.
● Receive rank rewards when first promoted to corresponding ranks.
● Collect Currency Wars Investment Environment and Investment Strategy index to earn Collection Rewards.
● Earn additional Ascension Point rewards for your first clearance of Standard Gambit or Overclock Gambit every two weeks.
● Complete designated objectives in Startup Guide and Expected Profit to receive corresponding rewards.
